products.title: Gikfun Eletronic Hourglass led DIY Kits Welding Practice Board Blue Ray EK1886C

productreview.author: Ron Swanson
productreview.reviewTitle: Missing a few parts but still a good little kit
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Good kit, very straightforward & don't really need instructions (all the parts & values are printed on the boards) and came together quickly.  That said it was missing a couple of parts (one 2.2K resistor and the variable 104 resistor), fortunately I have a well stocked tickle trunk so could still fully assemble. A couple of assembly modifications you may want to consider: -I added a two position terminal block (item inside the white circle in the last picture), it makes it easier/quicker to add the power source when in use.  They're very inexpensive and I add them to all my projects. -I install the 4x8 pin connectors last.  Will install/solder the female connectors first, place the male connectors into the female and THEN dry fit the other board.  Once the two boards are aligned and square then solder the male connectors in place.

productreview.author: SolomonDort
productreview.review: Bought this as a beginner project kit, I'd never soldered before and didn't really have any past experience or knowledge. The instructions are useless besides trying to squint and follow pictures. The kit doesn't include a battery pack or wires to actually turn on your creation once you're done. I spent 5 hours putting this thing together, I ended up doing a ton of reading online while building this thing because nothing is explained to you in the kit. All in all it was satisfying to turn on my creation after pulling apart an old clipper set to steal it's wiring and battery pack, but it was a very stressful introduction to soldering. For beginners, a project like this would be great, if it had detailed instructions, and for experienced solderers, this is a very basic and pointless project. I'd recommend spending a little bit more money for a better kit. A radio project kit I ordered came in today with full instructions and a booklet that explains the who, what, when, where & why's of soldering. That would have been much better to start with.

productreview.author: Matthew Garland
productreview.review: This is the best practice board that I have found by far. Everything came that should have, everything worked. There are tons of solder points here, it has got the most practice for your buck. It does not some with a power cord, but honestly learning how to cut up an old USB cable to make it work was part of what made this kit fun. If you are looking for something to practice/learn to solder, buy this.

productreview.author: The End User
productreview.review: This kit is great for the beginner that wants to practice soldering through hole components. Once build, we used a couple of 3v coin batteries in series to power it.

productreview.author: Adam
productreview.reviewTitle: A fun kit at a good price
productreview.review: A good kit that actually serves a purpose once you’re done. Everything in my kit was quality, it went together well with simple instructions. More of a soldier practice kit than an educational kit like some others, which I enjoyed. If you are looking for a cheap way to practice your skills this is it!

productreview.author: Michelle Philippot
productreview.review: the soldering kit is awesome, but the instructions were unclear for the most part. inferring the details is crucial to complete this kit. the components all seem to be of good quality as none have broken unless I made a mistake. the board itself is sturdy and doesn't feel cheap. overall a good product, but again the instructions aren't the best.

productreview.author: Tinkering With Terrius
productreview.reviewTitle: Very densly packed through hole soldering practice kit
productreview.review: This was one of the more interesting kits I've put together. It operates well and is a good project for practicing densely packed through hole soldering. I only wish it had come with a schematic or guide, but even without it was fairly easy to figure out.

productreview.author: Tristan B
productreview.reviewTitle: good solder practice but not impressed.
productreview.review: It was a fun project to assemble after not soldering for quite awhile. My main complaint is the packaging. Many of the leads on the chips were bent and I had to spend a lot of time to make them straight enough to put through the board. Also a few of the LED's were chipped.

productreview.author: Jeffrey Young
productreview.review: I wouldn't say this should be your first soldering kit to practice with.  Lots of semi-tight soldering will increase your soldering skills. But it sure is a nice trinket "prize" to have when you finish.

productreview.author: DaddyFixIt
productreview.review: nice little soldering project.  would look great once i 3d print a casing for it.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Was sent two identical boards. LED board was missing.
productreview.review: I would not recommend. Missing the LED board so I could not complete the project. See image.

productreview.author: R. Leonardo
productreview.review: No instructions included for the first time assembler.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: No need for instructions. it's fairly straight forward to assemble and it works as advertised.

productreview.author: Tyler MacLeod
productreview.review: Great soldering practice. Works great, decent instructions.

productreview.author: kevin
productreview.review: Besoin de trouvé les instructions sur internet mais super le fun

productreview.author: claude andrew
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2019
productreview.review: Bought a dozen for an electronics club (10-12 years old). Assembly has a few gotchas with orientation of the parts but if you read (look carefully at) the supplied printed instructions (I failed to do that) you should do fine. Definite pros: printed instruction; really cute and daft; cheap! Cons: Power supply not supplied.  We used some USB break-out boards and a couple of short pieces of solid core insulated wire.  If you don't have the USB break-out, you might just cut the end of an unused or broken (device-end) USB cable, find the 0V and 5V wires and solder them in place. Really a lot of fun. Club members had very few problems that weren't the good kind.

productreview.author: Hawk eye
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
productreview.review: First and foremost- This kit assembled didn't work for me, but it's entirely my fault.  I rushed through this kit, and I installed the IC's on the incorrect side of the corresponding PCB- so I effectively put the IC's in backwards.  Again, my fault entirely, both PCBs have pretty clear silk screen patterns- which is a bit surprising to me considering how heavily populated they get. So while I can't comment on how this kit functions as a completed unit, I did enjoy putting it together and although the instructions I got were hazy (hazy broken English and hazy from faded printer toner) I never got confused while assembling this. You might be thinking "Never got confused?  You put the ICs in backwards!".  Again, I was in a rush.  I was reminded of some Christmas gift business, and rather than simply stop working on this kit and resume at a less busy time, I rushed through it and in my hurry I just threw the ICs on, noting their orientation but not paying attention to the side of the PCB I soldered them to.  A lesson learned that in addition to driving, you should never build electronic devices while distracted I suppose! And touching back on the PCBs, again, they're marked with a easy to read silk screen, and the kit either had just the right amount, or a bit more of the parts needed to make this hourglass.  I have numerous other soldering kits to work on at this time (when I'm not distracted, of course!) but I may buy this again one day and assemble it correctly.

productreview.author: J B
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
productreview.review: I was really looking forward to this kit from all the good reviews, but the directions were a little spotty. There was no 2.2k resistor, the directions kind of skip around in a weird way. Not very organised in the way they are written. Its a fun kit though in the way that you get to do alot of solder points. I noticed something was wrong with the performance of mine even though i followed the directions to a T, so i looked at the pictures of peoples in the reviews and noticed another guy that did one side of the solder resistors in a different directions than the instructions and his worked perfectly which just further confused me even more. Good practice though i guess...

productreview.author: Terry Morris
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
productreview.review: I used this to help teach my nephew how to solder (he did a smaller kit first with help then this one mostly on his own) the issue is the instructions are bad. Nothing really show where components go but a photo (most kits will have a drawing of the board with component numbers and part description next to it. This one did not even show how the LED's go in, a first timer might have thought they were non polar and just stuck them all in random ways. Also note it takes 5V but does not include anything (no cable, socket....) you are on your own to have a wire to hook up and find a 5V supply. If this had better instructions and had come with at least a USB cable to hook it to power I would have given it 5 stars.

productreview.author: headtrauma
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2020
productreview.review: Fun kit to get started soldering with. This was my first build after buying a soldering station. Note that it doesn't come with a power supply. I connected a 2xCR2032 holder to mine to deliver the required power. You could also add a AA or AAA battery holder or just add leads to connect to a bench supply. I broke the adjustable trim pot on mine, make sure to note the limits of the adjustment (<1 full turn) that adjusts the speed of the hourglass so you don't make the same mistake. I was able to order a replacement trim pot, desolder the old one and replace. Build time is reasonable, all components are through hole, no SMD.

productreview.author: Ryan W.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
productreview.review: First soldering project. Worked perfect. Instructions are semi broken english, but you can still easily figure out what they are trying to say. Keep in mind this DOES NOT include a power source. I had to cut open a USB cable and solder on the red/black wires for power.  Could of used a battery pack but all mine are only 3v from 2 AA batteries.  I was given 2 extra LED's, no other extra parts, but everything worked! Took about 3-4 hours on and off to finish it.

productreview.author: Sam
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
productreview.review: I don't have much experience with circuit soldering and was a little overwhelmed with this kit to begin with but it didn't take long to figure out and it went together and worked perfectly.

productreview.author: Erica
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2019
productreview.review: Fun kit. Close solder points make for great practice. Whole project only takes a couple hours to complete. Doesn't include power cable as the others stated, but cutting up an old USB cable works well.

productreview.author: Stevo
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
productreview.review: Easy to follow instructions, but you have to solder you own power source. It would have been nice to include a barrel plug or usb jack

productreview.author: Michael Faucher
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
productreview.review: Works like it’s supposed to. The instructions were a little hard to figure out, but I got it. I was a little disappointed with the power options. I ended up cutting a old USB cable and soldering it on.

productreview.author: Eber Ochoa
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020
productreview.review: The Instructions have you mount the LEDs backwards so if you follow them you would have to flip the top board over

products.title: DataComm Electronics 50-8823-WH-KIT Biss, White

productreview.author: Kevin
productreview.reviewTitle: It does what I wanted it to do, but installation was a little frustrating
productreview.review: Just like everyone planning to buy this, I have a flat screen tv to mount on the wall, and wanted a way to run wired behind the wall. In my case, I have a fireplace below the tv, so it wasn't as straight forward as running up and down the wall. And it was on an exterior wall, so I had insulation to deal with. General set up was fine, but ran into an issue with the electrical hookup. Which in my opinion is the most important part! See attached photos. The instructions show push in connectors. The outlets supplied do not have this type of connection. I was able to figure it out, but it left me uneasy since the whole point of this system was the electrical component. Then, because of this, I connected the wires to the outlet, before threading it into the box (back cover). Problem: once the cable is pushed into the back of the outlet, you cannot take them out! Literally says once time use only. So I had to remove the wiring from the wall, thread it into the box from the other side, and re-fish the wire through my wall. I got it done in the end, but had to double check everything several times to feel like I got it right. Everything's done now. And looks decent. Unfortunately, some of my hdmi cables are not long enough to cover the extra distance through the wall, so I'll be ordering longer ones. I bought this at $71.82. It's a little pricey for what it is. And I would have expected a smoother experience. But in the end, things worked out.

productreview.author: Stakman1
productreview.review: This is a good solution for running both low voltage (audio and video signals) as well as AC current. Running an AC power cord through a wall from a TV without something like this would be very dangerous as those cords are not rated for being inside a wall. I found installation fairly straight forward but I've got a fair bit of experience. While as their advertising points out you don't need to be an electrician,  you will be responsible for making  AC line voltage connections that if done incorrectly could cause a fire, injure or even kill.  Read and follow the manufacturers directions and you should be fine.  Here are some installation tips that might make it easier. 1. This unit would be best used on an inside wall.  Use on an outside wall especially in a cold climates, will break the vapour barrier which could lead to condensation moisture in the wall. 2. It is very important that you don't cut the openings too close to a wall stud as the cams on the box and the cover-plate need to be able to move to be secured to your wall. 3. Try using small pieces of painters tape to hold the pattern to the wall then trace around with a pencil. 4. Lightly scoring the outline with a sharp razor knife before using the drywall saw can minimize tearing and breaking. 5.  Make sure you are mounting the bottom box low enough where it will be fully concealed by your furniture.  When I did mine I wish I had dropped it a couple of inches and I also forgot to take into account a cross bar that is right in the centre of my component stand meaning my furniture is farther away from the wall than I'd like. 6. Once you are done, you defiantly deserve a beverage of your choosing and some unrestricted binge watching of your favourite show!

productreview.author: Aramis
productreview.reviewTitle: Great Product with one installation issue
productreview.review: The product does a great job of hiding cables to a TV including providing a power outlet at a higher level.  However, most TV's these days have a transformer between the outlet and the TV rather than the old fashioned direct 110V cable supply.  In my case I used electrical tape to attach the transformer and cable excess to the wall mounting device, something that can't be done with all. Installation issue concerns screwing into the plastic tabs that affix the switchbox to the drywall,  The crews should be worked into the plastic tab BEFORE trying to install or you will never manage to do it.  I used Jigaloo to ease the cutting of the thread into the tab and made sure the screws were easy to tighten.  After that all was smooth.

productreview.author: Michael Raymur
productreview.review: I think this is a great kit, but I wished the outlet power cord was a couple of feet longer. Nonetheless it is useful if you're hanging your TV and hiding audio cables. I like the product, but knocked off 1 star just because the power cable/wires were not long enough and I had to go out and purchase a longer cable myself.  The power cable in the kit works great if you're power outlet is just below the tv, but if you're hanging above a fireplace as I had to, the cable has to route sideways and then down and the power cable was shy of about 2ft for my set up.

productreview.author: Kostu-san
productreview.reviewTitle: Very easy and fast installation, end result looks professional!
productreview.review: I was first-time installing a TV on the wall by myself and went for this model over other less expensive variants because of the claimed simplified installation process. As advertised, the hardest part was to find perfect spot for the installation and avoid the studs, but once we were through that, setting up the plugs themselves took literally around 5 minutes! As a bonus, the finished setup looks very professional, and the wall plates match well the other outlets in the vicinity. Will recommend this to all my friends!

productreview.author: Helphin
productreview.reviewTitle: Nice kit, easy to install, works well.
productreview.review: Nice little kit, easy to install, electrical is hard wired but really easy to work with and all wires labelled so if you aren't familiar with electrical it's really hard to mess it up. Cut 2 holes in drywall, hook up electrical connection between the two, pass your other wires and then screw the plates on (built with retaining clips that move into place behind the drywall as you tighten). It was really simple and easy to install. Bonus is you can plug the electrical into a surge protector so whatever you plug into the outlet will be protected.

productreview.author: MLW
productreview.reviewTitle: Great product then some bad luck.
productreview.review: This kit was fairly easy to install and its design was functional. The wire provided was sufficient in length and it is stamped with CSA approval. The missign two stars are for the missing wire connector caps from one of the kits I ordered. The same kit’s faceplate was scuffed and clearly a returned product. Its packaging tape seal was also opened. I did not want to wait for an exchange. Pros: Great product, material strength, instructions, and design. Cons:  Poor quality control; I took unexpected time to the hardware store to buy some wire connector caps.

productreview.author: The Janissaire
productreview.review: Installation Tips: !With Power Off! 1. Work Top Down 2. Cut holes 3. Run wires (through both wall and plastic pieces < both the boxes and their white inserts) 4. Connect wires - to connectors 5. Fix top box (the electrical and white one) into wall < make sure the connectors for your TV/Monitor are easy to get at. 6. Connect your TV/Monitor (including tv plug) and mount it to wall < I assume you have a bracket already there 7. Push (or pull from below gently) any excess cable into the wall behind your TV. 8. Mount / connect (NOT THE POWER CORD!) the bottom box - leave excess cable sticking out (i.e.) HDMI/Coax) alone. 9. Connect HDMI etc, to devices, move furniture back and push any excess cable back into the wall at the bottom end. 10. Plug in the power cord to the wall socket, test and you're done!

productreview.author: Tyson Hein
productreview.review: Really enjoyed installing this.  The fit was simple enough and the plug on the bottom was a real time saver.  I've cut open walls in previous homes before to run wires for wall mounted TV's but this was even easier!  Such a cool product and well designed -- though I did use my own, larger gauge, higher quality wire to use behind the wall.  Now all my wires are hidden and it only took a few minutes to install (after cutting the holes).

productreview.author: Marty C
productreview.reviewTitle: Hide those ugly cables now, this is an easy DYI project that takes an hour!
productreview.review: Cables were an eye sore that I finally decided to get rid of. I initially made the mistake of purchasing the other kit that doesn't have electrical. Hiding electrically cables is a bad idea as it could cause a fire behind the walls, also your insurer probably would have an issue with it. Then I purchased this kit. Easy to use and the template is spot on. The dry wall cutting could be done with a simple knife, but I used the drywall cutter and it made my life very easy. The electrical bit was great as they colour code everything. Pros: - Sleek and appeal visual design - Install was simple - Electrical setup for dummies Cons: - Minor if any, larger than expected

productreview.author: AlexJ
productreview.review: This organizer has two compartments, one for the electric cable and one for the rest of your cables. This is great because it is up to standard. It comes with a power cord that runs inside your wall. The quality is very high. The installation is not that easy (you need some tools to do the job). But, there is a video on Amazon the describes all that you need and all the stages of the installation.

productreview.author: Daniel
productreview.review: The install took me about 2 hours and a half. The result is really nice BUT it came after many sweats... The main problem is with the electrical junction box (and my walls). The gray plastic box where you attach the electrical wires together is too deep in my opinion. In fact, it is something like 1,5 times the depth of a regular electrical connection box. In my case, on my 1962 house on a wall that has fiberboard as insulation or vapor barrier behind the gypsum (garage on the other side), I had to be creative. In fact, I had to cut half of the depth of the connection box to make it fit because I didn’t want to make a hole in the board. I also had to cut a bit of the plastic part where you put the HDMI cables because it was also too deep. This product would be perfect for a clean new installation in a new house or one that is heavily renovated... With an existing house of a couple of years, there might be surprises such as the ones I encountered. On a more positive note, this product also fits on thick walls. Mine was about 3/4 of an inch thick and it worked. I easily made 3 HDMI cables and an audio cable pass through without any problem.

productreview.author: Jamie Deck
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect for Cleaning Up Cables Between Components and Wall-Mounted TV!!
productreview.review: A little pricier than some other solutions; however, this kit includes everything you need to clean up unsightly wires from your components to your tv!  Only took an hour or so to complete!  Looks much better now. Best part was still being able to plug TV in to surge protector, without having to purchase a separate surge protected outlet for behind the tv.  These can be ~$40!

productreview.author: Andre
productreview.review: This thing is awesome! I set it up myself, but I must say the instructions do not make sense. I had to watch a video and it still didn't make sense to me. I had to figure it out on my own. Please improve your instructions, or make a video explaining everything. Electricians are not the only ones that install this. Great price for an amazing product!

productreview.author: maurice cormier
productreview.reviewTitle: Kit de rangement pour câble TV à écran plat avec solution d'alimentation
productreview.review: Faire attention car c'est pour des murs avec solive de 2 x 4 . On devrait le dire dans la description. J'ai été obligé de tout modifié a cause de cela. Si cela avait été dit je n'aurais pas eu de probleme et J'aurais donné une meilleure note. Mais quand meme trop cher

productreview.author: Paul Jorgenson
productreview.reviewTitle: Good product but beware, doesn't always fit
productreview.review: Product seems good and seems like it would be a good solution for many people. I live in a condo building and when I sawed open my drywall, I found out that this product wouldn't fit in the gap between this drywall and the next room's drywall.  If you live in a condo building, you may want to check to make sure or look into low-profile alternative.

productreview.author: Mr. Steez
productreview.review: used this for the tv. great product was a pain to install but not because of the product just the nature of the job.  the end result was worth the effort though. everything you need comes in the package and the instructions for wiring the plug were helpful. will buy again when i do other displays in the house.

productreview.author: D Bell
productreview.review: The product is excellent.  Well designed and achieves exactly what it was made to do. My only negative is that all the videos show it being installed on an interior wall, my situation was on an exterior wall so there was insulation and vapor barrier behind the drywall. Called the company 2 times to ask if this product could be used in this application but never received a call back. In the end I went ahead being very careful to not cut the vapor barrier. Had to push very hard to get the product into the opening due to the insulation. In the end I was able to but it was a bit of a struggle. A slightly less deep product for exterior walls would be ideal.

productreview.author: krishan
productreview.review: LOVE THIS KIT. It's pretty close to perfect, but installing it in a wall with insulation behind it can be a PITA.  Make sure you get some oversized vapour barrier housings, like these: https://www.amazon.ca/Globe-Electric-90118-Vapor-Barrier/dp/B00EAR9KNC But then you can't cut an oversized hole in the wall, as the wall plates use the cutout for stability, so you've gotta do some clever work by squeezing it all through the hole, and taping the vapour barrier box in with small pieces of vapour barrier tape. It would be nice if they made the holes in the back of the kit larger, as I can barely manage to get the cables all through.  I got (3) HDMI's, an optical cable, and an ethernet cable through mine.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Good product! Just not happy with the toggles that tightin to the wall. Needs to be upgraded to make it stronger. Too easy to over tighten! Toggles break too easy. Also need to cross wires behind the wall as they do not run straight over each other!! Not good when running a long distance! Comes with everything thing you need! That was the bonus ! Overall good system just needs to be improved!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Keeps your install clean, and helps keeps you to electrical code
productreview.review: Probably going to purchase another one as well for my other tv. Did the trick, exactly what I was looking for now I can sleep at night knowing I don't have a "live power cord" run directly through my drywall so now we are to code. Keep in mind if you have a fireblock in your wall you may have to cut a hole in your drywall about half way down to jump through it (there are youtube videos out there of people doing this, cut drywall, drill through the fireblock, run the cord through, fill with fire-resistant sealant, patch wall back up). Was pretty minor but keep that in mind that you may have to patch your drywall.

productreview.author: Cookie
productreview.review: This is awesome! Stencil is perfect, very clear instructions. -Note- do NOT connect the electrical wires at the bottom before fishing them in the little box provided. Overall, your job will look really professional. I recommend using a piece of drain pipe (like that on you washing machine) for your cable management.

productreview.author: Anibal Ibarra
productreview.reviewTitle: Awesome product. Easy to install. Anyone can do it.
productreview.review: This product is freaking awesome.  It is easy to use. They even have videos on youtube that walk you step by step on how to do it.  It was easy to install.  I was able to now have an A/C outlet behind my TV on top of my fire place.  You don't need to know anything about electricity or be an electrician to do this. Anyone can do it.

productreview.author: Mike
productreview.review: Fairly easy to install if you do not mind cutting into your dry wall. Hardest part for me was maintaining the vapor barrier as it was on an outside wall - I needed to remove some installation and rebuild the barrier with Tucker tape and spare vapor barrier. If doing on an inside wall it would be very easy to do. A little pricey for what it is.

productreview.author: WH
productreview.review: Product appears to perform as advertised, however inconveniently assembled with low quality parts.  The cord intake and cord outtake are essentially backwards (as manufactured, intake facing up, making cord insertion more difficult, with an insulated wall).  Screws to fasten electrical boxes to drywall stripped quickly, and i purchased replacement screws after trying a few other in home strategies (looking for replacement screws, bore out clips to allow larger screws to fit, cutting screw heads for a flat head screwdriver on the strippers, all of it a waste of time).  Final installation appears to function as advertised, but odd manufactured configuration and poor quality screws increased installation time to "great, i can't get those hours back.....".

productreview.author: Papa Bear
productreview.reviewTitle: Provides nice, professional  look to installation.
productreview.review: Mounted TV on wall. I didn't want cords hanging down. This worked great. I was able to keep the bottom TV mount stand on the TV and use it as a platform for the DVR box. All cords are hidden from view behind the wall mount stand. I did have to buy an AC plug adapter (Home Depot - fairly inexpensive) to turn the plug-in 90 degrees to fit the bulky DVR power cord adapter into it.

productreview.author: Jeff He
productreview.review: Considerably less then what local big box stores were charging for the kit.  Possibly could have bought the individual components cheaper, but it was worth the extra for the convenience.  Would recommend.

productreview.author: SB
productreview.review: Purchased  to hang TV after completion of basement reno. Unfortunately decide not to hang tv on the wall. So never used the product and  couldn't not return.  Past the return date :(. However all good , all parts there nice quality product , seems pretty easy to instal. Wish  I could send back though. Expensive purchase that I can't use.

productreview.author: Marcus Allen ( Black n Silver)
productreview.review: It is perfect, mine was not easy because hug my new 55 inch TV over fireplace I had to open up the wall to get around the studs, very happy with the outcome after doing drywall repair and some painting.

productreview.author: Alexander Clayton King
productreview.review: Very good value. My female plugin was upside down on arrival but very easy to fix. I wish the bottom and the top lined up but they make the wires cross inside the wall. Very small detail but i think for the price range it should be a feature. I have no electrical or drywall experience and it took me less than ten minutes to do this.

productreview.author: mustafa hassan
productreview.review: 1 year after receiving this product I installed it and only because  we moved out TV to another location of the family room. I had no plug in this wall so I ended up using this product. Initially hard to figure out how to install it. Also if you dont install it in the correct steps u might end up damaging the product.

productreview.author: Kim L
productreview.reviewTitle: perfect product for a critical need
productreview.review: Installed it in about 90m, was easy and everything fit well. The smaller bottom one required a firm push but that was no problem. Agree completely with others -- leave space at left or you will be cutting another hole. Best to go dead center of 16" space between studs. Can't say enough about it.

productreview.author: Cire
productreview.review: Exactly what I wanted, if you are planning on installing this unit next to an outlet and are electrically inclined I would just run wiring straight from original outlet to outlet behind tv. But unit is great, instructions are clear highly recommend

productreview.author: Rob
productreview.review: This was great for a clean look when mounting a TV on our living room wall. Even worked well on an outside wall that was insulated. Best to use fish tape when running wires to each end though.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Not as easy as depicted in the video, I had a fire block in between so we had to drill a hole through the fire wall in order to pass the wall, thankfully my dad is an electrician or else it will be difficult. Just by watching the video I thought that I can finish this relocation myself but I was wrong. So before buying this item make sure to scan the wall to know if there are fire blocks or not!!!!!

productreview.author: Kyle
productreview.reviewTitle: A good product with a tricky install.
productreview.review: It does what it says it does. Once installed it looks clean and it allows you to run a lot of cabling if needed. The included extension cord is a nice touch. It isn't perfect though. The instructions are not clear and leave a lot to be desired. The drywall bracketing is easy to break and it is very hard to tell if it is secured properly. Be very careful when installing.

productreview.author: M. Santos
productreview.review: It's okay, does the job. The locking tabs are very weak and mine broke with very little force. Now I have to figure out how to get the face plate to stay put.

productreview.author: @TheJeffChase
productreview.review: Great solution for wall mounted tvs. I hate having cables showing. This is a great way to conceal them and get power to the tv without the need for an electrician. Read the details of the product. Ensure your wall cavity is deep enough to support this product.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I installed this wall pass-thru myself relatively quickly with no problems. It's simple enough with clear instructions and all the components you need. If you happen to have difficulty, there are many tutorial videos online that can help you along in the installation process. After completion, I'm very satisfied with the professional aesthetic.

productreview.author: Taylor
productreview.reviewTitle: Mixed up plugs but overall happy with finished product
productreview.review: The outlet holes on the two electrical boxes were installed incorrectly by Datacom. I had to remove them and switch them in order for the cables to be able to flow through both units. Other than that I was happy with the product. Someone who is unfamiliar with electrical outlets may have trouble if the same issue happens to them.

productreview.author: Kevin in Petawawa
productreview.review: This item gives you a very easy way to run cables inside the wall, leaving a clean wall instead of a mess of visible cables.  Make sure to check the wall for cross-braces in the stud bay though.  Fortunately I could remove the cross brace I ran into when installing this in the basement family room from the furnace room side of the wall.

productreview.author: Mark
productreview.review: DOES NOT INCLUDE WHATS LISTED/PICTURED! ORDERED TWICE, BOTH TIMES MISSING ELECTRICAL WORKBOX EVEN THOUGH IT SAYS ITS INCLUDED RIGHT ON THE BOX AND HAS A PICTURE OF IT. THIS WILL ONLY WORK IF YOU ALREADY HAVE AN ELECTRICAL OUTLET BOX. I SUPPOSE YOU CAN BUY ONE ELSEWHERE, BUT DON'T LIST IT AS INCLUDED AND SHOW IT IN THE PICTURE WHEN IT'S NOT IN THE BOX!

productreview.author: Fabian Lim
productreview.reviewTitle: Installation is easy, but you will have to ensure you know what's behind the drywall.
productreview.review: I installed between the two studs which were picked up by the stud finder, but for the bottom panel I found a horizontal wooden piece that would not let me install the panel.  I had to make another hole below it to ensure there was enough space.  Happy with the product, there online videos available in youtube that help with the installation.

productreview.author: RON SCOTT
productreview.reviewTitle: A must for hiding Tv and accessories cables
productreview.review: Installed this kit in about half hour. Tested it before I mounted it up and worked perfectly. Highly recommend this kit !!!

productreview.author: LTP
productreview.review: It comes with everything you need. I used for 1 HDMI and 1 Ethernet cable, but probably could fit another two or three cables. It would be better if the female end of the extension cord was a 90 degree angle instead of straight, so it would not stick out so far from the wall.

productreview.author: Nelson
productreview.reviewTitle: Meets code, clean install and no visible wires in 45 mins.
productreview.review: Has everything that's needed to hide wiring for wall mounted TV. Exactly as described. The outlets secure to the dry wall without needing studs next to it and it looks like a professional install job. Took about 45 mins to have everything done so very easy to set up. Can easily fit about 5 HDMI cords

productreview.author: Tyler. C
productreview.review: Very happy with this. Took maybe a hour to get it all sorted out. Came with a long wire so just had to cut and strip it. All in looks great.

productreview.author: dispatch2009
productreview.review: Things didnt go well! I was missing 2 screw! So i got to use some of mine, plastic clip the one that grip on the jips wall are too flimsy to grab correctly....

productreview.author: Allan Reilly
productreview.review: Worked exactly as descibed. Watch for center bracing in walls. Will need to drill through it or mount this below it in order to get cables through.

productreview.author: keithman
productreview.review: Worked great! The only thing I dislike is that the plug in wire at the bottom sticks out about 2 inches and you can't push a display case very close to the wall.  A redesign with a lower profile plug would make this product perfect.

productreview.author: Ricky
productreview.reviewTitle: Mount it in the centre between the studs otherwise it ...
productreview.review: Mount it in the centre between the studs otherwise it my be too tight to install the wiring connection cover on the bottom box, definitely works to hide the wiring.

productreview.author: Ray.
productreview.review: Not many setups like this...it is fast to install, and good quality, but a little on the expensive side.

productreview.author: Jason Dinn
productreview.reviewTitle: This product is excellent can’t say enough good things about this makes for ...
productreview.review: This product is excellent  can’t say enough good things about this makes for A clean and tidy job  Absolutely a excellent product .

productreview.author: Ryan S
productreview.review: The plastics tabs the hold into the wall break very easily so be carefully when tightening.  Other than that it worked great.

productreview.author: AmzonCan
productreview.review: The perfect solution for flat screen TV installation. These kits are dummy proof, never need to hire an electrician for such a simple fix. Excellent quality, simplistic design, and suitable for almost any space/TV

productreview.author: Donna
productreview.reviewTitle: That it makes the TV cords so much cleaner
productreview.review: The product works well  plus I went on YouTube to look for a video that people have made with any helpful hints for installing ! I totally recommend it!

productreview.author: RayofSunshine
productreview.review: Straightforward to install. Was missing small caps for wires. Otherwise good.

productreview.author: AmazonCustomer
productreview.review: No more wires showing under my wall mounted TV. Used YouTube to install.

productreview.author: Jeff Loucks
productreview.review: Haven't installed yet but fast delivery price was pretty good looks to be easy installation thanks

productreview.author: Hugo Lopez
productreview.reviewTitle: Excellent solution for a wire-free TV setup
productreview.review: Bought this for one of my clients, works like a charm, and if you know how to set it up the final setup is super neat.

products.title: LCD Writing Tablet, Richgv 12 Inch Colorful Update Digital Electronic Graphics Tablet Ewriter with Screen Lock Handwriting Pad Suitable for Kids and Adults(2 Battery)

productreview.author: mhin
productreview.reviewTitle: Great product to keep the kids busy
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Overall, the product is great.  But it doesn’t come with a clear instruction on how to turn it on.  The color is not very vibrant but still a good writing pad. It can be erased easily.  The pen should come with a string though so it doesn’t get lost easily.

productreview.author: Maya.lg
productreview.reviewTitle: Fun to use and really practical and ecofriendly
productreview.review: I've always been on the lookout for eco-friendly products, and one of the most "wasted" things in my home is paper, whether for making to do lists,  and especially making drawings with a 4 year old kid. He practically draws only a few lines in a blank paper and wants to use another one and though I know he enjoys that, it makes me sad to waste all those paper. And here's an excellent solution, an LCD writing tablet! Ever since we received this item, my kid is obsessed with this, doodle then erase, and repeats the cycle several times in a day! I might need to buy another one for myself to use. Lol.. I love that we can "write in color", and the tablet itself is big and we can write or draw a lot.. I'll probably buy a smaller one for my kid and use this for myself and stick it to the fridge for my reminders. The writing is practically crisp and clear, and the lock-in mode is also great. I use that lock mode to encourage my kid to use all the spot before erasing the doodle. This is a great product, and I can this being used all the time and will last for years. Definitely recommended!

productreview.author: Lucasmom
productreview.review: This is a great product. I bought it to start writing with my kids. It is useful because they likes to draw. Also, they can makes sketches without using paper. They are entertained without the need to use an electronic device all day.  Echo friendly, no need to waste papers.  Our little one practices printing on it.  It does have a button on the bottom to switch off so you can't erase the screen. If you switch it the other way, you can press the button to easily erase the screen. Great for in the car and on the go to keep the kids busy.

productreview.author: Dan
productreview.reviewTitle: Lots of giggles, no writing on the wall
productreview.review: Saw this on a flash deal for $13, decided why not and picked it up for my 2yr old. He instantly loves drawing on it (and demanding we also draw on it) At first I was worried as he kept pressing the clear button a lot but he soon realised that it removes what he's drawing and now only presses it when needed saving the battery life. This drawing tablet is always on but acts like e-ink and only requires electricity when the clear button is pressed, this means it will still be good for power no matter how often he presses that button. Even then the battery is easily replaceable. The screen isn't too scratch resistant so when the little guy was playing outside on it and it got some dirt on it, it then scuffed a little bit but nothing noticeable. The colours are set, so if you draw in one spot it will come out green, another blue etc etc so if your child asks for a certain colour you won't be able to get it unless you choose the specific area of the screen where that colour is. All in all my child loves this, he can throw it around with no worry and then demand I pick it up and "cuh-wer"

productreview.author: Client d'Amazon
productreview.review: The light is a little dull compared to other brands. I thought the battery was running low so I replaced it and came to term with the fact it wouldn’t be as bright as expected. My daughter didn’t seem to mind much and she likes it so much I think I could have gotten away with getting her only this toy for Christmas 🙈 she’s two but her older cousins all wanted to try it out so I think it will grow with her. My only other negative point is the battery door screw it is ridiculously tiny you need the works smallest screwdriver head to change the battery. I’m pretty well equipped with tools and still had to go out and by a jewelry and small sized Electronic screwdriver set at the dollar store

productreview.author: WanderingFather
productreview.review: Normally, I will talk in my videos but today my throat hurts, so if you watched the video but are still wondering what I think here goes. The LCD panel is really smooth to write on, Like the stylus just glides over it. Very very satisfying. There is a lock button which you can use to prevent the LCD from being erased, and was fun for me, as although, i played with this quite a bit, i am giving it to one of my sons for Christmas. With the lock button I was able to leave him a message he will see when he opens the LCD. Overall, this just made me smile. It didn't cost much, and was really nice to use.

productreview.author: MIKACHU
productreview.review: They are about to turn 2 and right now cognitive development is key, so we're getting them to use puzzles, play with soccer balls, really anything to get them using their extremities and the hope is that we have the next Picasso so our entire family can get on that generational retirement plan. That, or an NHL player. Either way, excellent tablet, they love the colors and using it.

productreview.author: Claudia Petre
productreview.reviewTitle: My kid did not like it and he loves to draw
productreview.review: It is not bright enough to keep the kids entertained. my son loves to draw (plain draws, imagination) on my husband's phone with the creyon. but this tablet, hiiimmm he was not interested and he told me it's so faded he wants to really see what he's drawing so he put it away and never touch it again(he's3) and i had to return it. He is not an electronic zombie tough, he does not watch tv or use ipads, the only thing , he loves to draw on his father's phone. I guess you can give it a try just be aware it's not bright at all as it shows on the pictures.

productreview.author: K.G
productreview.reviewTitle: Ideal Writing pad for school age child
productreview.review: I bought this writing pad for my son who loves to draw and sketch things. Using paper makes his room untidy and to resolve that problem I bought this writing pad. This writing pad comes with a stylus and 2 batteries that would help to use this in out of the box status. It has to erase ability with one button and works perfectly to remove this that written over it. It takes very less battery power and after 2 weeks of work still, battery is working fine. My son loves this wriring pad.

productreview.author: Candace
productreview.reviewTitle: Useful for any age group, good quality
productreview.review: This arrived quickly, and this has been great addition for work where I scribble down what I need to do for the day without wasting paper.  It has a holder for the “pen” which is great, and touch if a button to erase. Thinking of ordering a 2nd one for the kitchen to prep out meal plans for the week, or when I’m making sourdough to perform 6 sets of folds, good to have this to check it off.  Great for when my nephews come over to play tic tac toe, Pictionary etc...

productreview.author: H.C.
productreview.review: I have bought 2 writing tablets before, both were ok at the beginning but later it gets broken and scratched. This one is 12 inches and its is pretty soft on the pen touches, and it feels great when writing on it. It comes with some colors so it is not just black and white. I like this tablet. Highly Recommend.

productreview.author: Twyx
productreview.reviewTitle: My Daughter and I loves it!
productreview.review: I bought a small one for my daughter a few weeks ago.  Love how it actually helps us save paper at home.  So I had to buy one for myself but had to be a bigger one.  And I got this!  Which is perfect size for me.  I use this to write down my to do list for the day, and other daily reminders.  I keep it displayed in the kitchen where I spend most of my day.  Awesome tool!

productreview.author: Misha
productreview.review: It is so light totake it everywhere and easy to use. Previously I used sticky notes, small dry erase boards, and I even covered my desktop with dry erase paper. But, sticky notes were everywhere, the dry erase boards were messy for daily notes or better used for drawing out thoughts. The best part is just pressing the trash button and it vanishes.

productreview.author: Brett
productreview.review: My kid loves playing this and having me draw pictures for him. My one complaint is that it is actually quite flimsy. I am afraid that if I ever accidentally stepped on it as I am walking around a room with inadequate light that it will be a goner. It works perfectly and has brought hours of enjoyment to me and my child. I just wish that it didn't feel as flimsy. But I don't know, maybe a person could have a barn dance on it and it would survive.

productreview.author: Amelie R.
productreview.reviewTitle: Really simple to use and tons of fun!
productreview.review: This little tablet is SO COOL! I thought I would have to plug it in or put batteries in it to make it work, but it doesn't need any of that and works right out of the box. I'm always looking for cool new activities since my nephew and my niece visit me pretty often and I know this will be a winner.

productreview.author: K
productreview.review: Fantastic for scribbling, writing notes, it has a switch, you can use, so you don't accidentally erase your scribbles, if you want to keep them for a while. The lines you draw on this are pretty fat though, (like using a 6b pencil), so it's difficult to draw small details or write with small letters. I use this to practice writing chinese letters and my kids use it for scribbling and practicing writing words. It comes with a spare battery, too :)

productreview.author: Jake B
productreview.review: This thing works great! I love the button erase function, so handy! Honestly brings me back to child hood. This was actually a gift, but of course I had to sneak into the package and try it out first. Writes great, the rainbow color is neat and the instant erase is wicked. Even has a button to stop you from accidentally erasing.

productreview.author: yadong sun
productreview.review: i was plan use it as a board to write something to help my memory, but when i open the box and my two years old son just standing beside me, then i found my son like it, he just learn how to use erase button in second, i have to say ,this is very great one can save my thousands of paper and my living room wall since my son know how to use pen......

productreview.author: Marianne Greenberg
productreview.review: This tablet came with an extra battery.  Wouldn't you assume that you had to put it in.  Took 2 adults, the world's tiniest screwdriver and 40 minutes to open the battery tab only to find out it already had a battery!!  Expected the colour to be brighter.  It is for my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter to work on her letter recognition but she has not tried it yet.  Very disappointed.  Don't  waster your money!

productreview.author: Barney
productreview.review: My kids loved it. Easy to use and there no edgy points from the product, its perfectly safe for kids. We bought this so they can save paper from doodling and it worked. Its an eco friendly i guess instead of buying lots of sketch papers for kids and its easy to clean too.

productreview.author: Chilly
productreview.review: My 1 year old can use it.  My 5 and 3 year old nephews were fighting over it on a recent visit.  The 3 year old dropped it numerous times and it held up just fine. Good purchase.

productreview.author: David
productreview.reviewTitle: User friendly!!  Kid learn it fast!!
productreview.review: The writing tablet is very easy to use. There is only one button, same button for on and off. The LCD has multiple colors which creates better drawings. It is suitable for ages 2 to 80. The pen that comes with the tablet is very smooth to write on the tablet. You can also use other stylus pens. I used it to teach kids with homework or take quick notes for work. Tablet is easily carried in a handbag as it is very slim. Great product and recommend.

productreview.author: Linda Lavoie
productreview.review: I was really surprise to see the well build of this product, it was strong and easy to use.  It reminded me of a product 40 years ago and it was very pleasant now my grandchildren can have fun coming to my home and the price, unbeatable, thanks Amazon.ca.

productreview.author: Ayan & Kenny
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect gift for kids stuck indoors
productreview.review: Got this for my niece as she's stuck indoors all day. She loves to draw and is quite young so I dropped this off at their door. They gave it a try and she absolutely loves the gift, it does the basics of being able to be drawn on and erased with ease.

productreview.author: ash.cl.t
productreview.review: Bought this and gave it to my son on his birthday Aug 3... by Aug 4 it was no longer working. We tested the battery and it still has full charge. It was really nice and he loved it, very disappointed it stopped working. Hoping someone will see this review and replace it.

productreview.author: maria
productreview.reviewTitle: Worth the money .. keeps my toddler entertained
productreview.review: We ordered this for our long car rides .. and after using it for third time today on our trip .. I can honestly say this is the cheapest and best money I’ve spend on my toddlers items ... he’s thinks it’s magic lol ... keeps him entertained for a while !

productreview.author: xtek
productreview.review: I bought this for my kid. It is a very good decision.  This little tablet was a lot of fun to play with the kids. Very easy to operate, just one button to erase the screen. We could make drawings, writing and anything else for several times by saving paper. I made lots of fun by using it with my kid.It has a removal pen and the tablet last time. All my family members like it. It is good for developing creativity, It is an educational toy.

productreview.author: Basil
productreview.review: It's very easy to use my baby girl nit even 2yrs yet can use it. She even knows how to erase the stuck she draw on it and start over it's that easy to use. I'm happy with the purchase bcuz she always wanna draw but this gives her an avenue to do it with ease and not drawing all over the house

productreview.author: Hui xiong
productreview.review: My daughter is very like drawing, problem is wasted a lot of paper every day, that why I bought this,  is great, there are three colors, for a two year old child is also very simple to use. PS:I used some rubber bands to keep the pen with tablet together to make sure that my little one didn't miss any of the parts

productreview.author: Jstone44
productreview.review: Got this on deal of the day! Great buy! Kid loves it. I do wish it had a string for the pen. We added a string ourselves so she wouldn't lose it. It is all by pressure, so if lost you could figure something else out instead.

productreview.author: Jenna C
productreview.review: We live this purchase! I bought it for my daughter who is 2.5 years old. She loves writing on it and I love how light it is so we can take it anywhere

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: The writing is hard to see, I bought this to have my daughter practice writing , the visibility of the writing is not clear, not sure why but it’s not as seen in the picture. Its very dull I thought it was suppose to be a neon bright looking colour, very disappointing.

productreview.author: Melissa
productreview.reviewTitle: Fun to use but be gentle with the pen.
productreview.review: The pen broke in half the 1st day we used it. Very disappointing as the tablet has just been sitting on the table unused, ever since. It was fun to use but the materials are quite flimsy and the tablet and pen quite thin and not durable.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Zone stars for this product. (It’s making me pick 1 star) once we received it my daughter opened the box with excitement to then see that it was used. No problem I thought we will click the button and you can use it. Well it didn’t work. Thought maybe the battery was bad, so changed it with the other one that was provided with the pad. Still nothing. Just didn’t work. My daughter was disappointed. Don’t order.

productreview.author: Brian
productreview.reviewTitle: Very nice product and a great price
productreview.review: I was happy to see how light and easy to handle it is. Especially for my young 3 year old nephew. He can easily hold it and draw pictures. Envoirnmently friendly and safe on his eyes as there is no blue light.

productreview.author: Nitin
productreview.review: I liked the amount of surface area the slate provides to write. Good for kids. It doesnt look to be durable but dont go by the looks. My son has used it roughly in past couple of months an no issues at all. Definitely recommended at this price.

productreview.author: Vishal
productreview.review: Nice product, my kids love it. But screen in too sensitive while writing we obviously rest the hand on the screen while holding the pen. That rested hand causes unnecessary marks (erased when we erase the entire screen) But overall great product.

productreview.author: Kaydie
productreview.reviewTitle: Your kids will spend hours exploring their creativity with this one!
productreview.review: My 2.5 year old is obsessed with his drawing board! We take it everywhere. In the car, to the library, when we’re visiting family. He spends so much time drawing and then quickly erasing his masterpiece only to draw something new again. It is so lightweight for little ones and allows them to really explore their creativity. Best part, no mess!

productreview.author: Omer
productreview.review: I bought the board to practice with my 6 year old son math exercises. He really likes it and it's really useful Instead of wasting loads of paper pages. Great for travel too and just drawing and playing.

productreview.author: Art
productreview.review: I bought this for my daughter and after 2 days of using, it suddenly wont erase,i itried buying new battery but still not working. I email the seller but never responded. It will suddenly end up in the garbage I do not recommend this product to anyone. Its a worst of all item i ordered from amazon.

productreview.author: Linda Valentine
productreview.review: I bought this for my son's birthday and he loves it. It was speedy delivery and great service. I would recommend this to others who have children to encourage them to write more often.

productreview.author: ckern
productreview.review: Works fine, but does feel quite cheap. The kids like the larger multi-colour screen, but I would prefer something more sturdy feeling like the boogie board.

productreview.author: Trish
productreview.reviewTitle: Try first may not delete.Lock is best feature
productreview.review: Gift for grandchild going on trip.Prompt delivery.Love lock button as she uses mine without this feature and deletes my grocery list.Also purchased in pink and does not delete.As these are Christmas gifts I'm glad I tried first.May have to return pink or change battery first.

productreview.author: Nimeera Maredia
productreview.review: Order one for my daughter from different store, was so impressed, ordered this one for gift , light in weight, affordable, great for gift, came with extra battery which is great

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Entertaining for kids. Very easy to use. Lightweight for children to hold. Screen scratches easily, so just be careful to only use the provided pen with the product.

productreview.author: Matthew Butler
productreview.review: Product arrived in a box which had been opened, and resealed. None of the usual protective plastic over the item in the box. It was clear this item had been purchased before and returned for some reason then resold as new in the same box.

productreview.author: Peter
productreview.review: Bought this for my 3 year old daughter to practice her writing and drawing, works perfect. Bought a couple more to gift for her friends for their bday as well. The writing could have been brighter but its still ok.

productreview.author: Sandra
productreview.review: My son has a blast with it!  The colours are nice and bright and easy to use. He likes to draw with it, and is actually excited for school so he can use it for homework. A great and fun tablet!

productreview.author: Horsing Around
productreview.review: These are great. I bought two for my grandkiddies and one for myself. If you loose the stylus you can also use your fingernail or another stylus.

productreview.author: Sunny
productreview.review: It’s not quite as bright as I expected but its not ridiculously dark either. It works great. My kids are playing with it. Seems pretty durable.

productreview.author: Umama
productreview.reviewTitle: Amazing way to keep toddlers busy and make them learn in an exciting way
productreview.review: The product is amazing in many ways.. my toddler is completely obsessed with lcd writing tablet and its a great and exciting way of making them learn. Easy to use too... the only issue i had was that the battery wasn’t as long lasting as i thought it would be and the colours on the screen aren't as bright.. but overall i loved this purchase.

productreview.author: gang
productreview.review: No longer will you have to find random pieces of paper for your kids to write on, and random pens, too. Save some trees and your sanity. Don't forget to attach the stylus to the tablet with a string (not included) or else your kids will lose the stylus and back to square one.

productreview.author: Cynthia D
productreview.review: Colours are hard to see. Not very vibrant. Works well otherwise. Light and I like the addition of a tie so you don’t lose the writing tool.

productreview.author: lisa busse
productreview.review: The screen came with marks on it almost like finger prints in the LCD. The ‘clear/erase’ button did not work and so those markings or any others made would not ‘erase’. Very disappointing as this was a Christmas present opened by one of our children.

productreview.author: Michelle
productreview.review: Got this one for my son to use as a sketchpad, low-tech drawing for fun and to use as a whiteboard/chalkboard for virtual school. It's working out very well so far.

productreview.author: Ann-Marie Lupenette
productreview.review: I bought this for my 6 year old for Christmas and she loves it. The only criticism I have is that the screen can be dark. When you write on it, the writing shows up in different colours and doesn’t create a very sharp image. It is still a great board though.

productreview.author: P.Yeh
productreview.review: It’s a fine product but not Very suitable for kids, but good for older kids. It’s very thin and fragile. unlike the transitional drawing board it’s more like a drawing pad.

productreview.author: Ed
productreview.review: I was disappointed in the quality of the product.  The screen brightness was very poor, nothing like it was pictured in the video advertisement.  The unit was supplied with a spare battery, but it was impossible to remove the battery cover which is held in place by such a minute screw that could not be removed!

productreview.author: Angelina
productreview.review: Perfect little drawing pad I found the colours to be good and easy to use worth your money for sure came with two batteries so I have a back up .

productreview.author: jessica
productreview.review: Product had markings on the screen that would not erase when we receives it and Battery did not work. We went out and bought a new battery only to discover it's not the battery but the product in itself that is faulty and damaged.

products.title: ColorCoral Dust Cleaning Gel Universal Dust Remover for Keyboard Cleaning Car Dashboard Detailing Home and Office Dust Cleaning Electronic Dusting Slime Putty 160G

productreview.author: Rick
productreview.review: Very convenient and useful, I keep one in my car now for easily cleaning. The gel itself is forgiving on most surfaces and will pickup everything it touches without leaving residue. I use it on my car and PC, it's even replaced my air duster. The gel is also very mesmerizing to use. My only gripe is that it can't be washed out, but there's very little anyone can do about that considering the nature of the product.

productreview.author: Marusech
productreview.reviewTitle: Very helpful customer service - Ridiculously fun
productreview.review: Has a light fresh scent to it which I think is wonderful especially when cleaning out your car. My first order had a punctured seal, but they had a brand new one sent to me by next day (free of charge). 10/10 customer service! As for the cleaning, I find it ridiculously entertaining to roll slime over everything I own - my desk has never been so clear of dust

productreview.author: Jessamine
productreview.review: I LOVE IT!! For someone who's a clean freak (me), I am so happy to have this. It makes it so easy to clean the hard to reach spots in my car. I've been using small portions of it until it turns greenish so it's really worth it!

productreview.author: M J.
productreview.reviewTitle: Dont leave it out in the sun or on the dash.
productreview.review: Great product but DO NOT LEAVE IT IN THE SUN. Works great and as advertised. However this is my second time buying it as I left the first one on the dash in a hot car and the sun destroyed it. Melted the outer plastic on the jar and everything. Long as you dont do that, you're fine. It's the only thing that gets the cracks around the cupholders that vacuums can't get.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Left a gooey mess. Hard to clean the goop off.
productreview.review: The cleaning gel was way too soft and gooey. When I pulled it out of the container it basically was like runny goo. I had a hard time removing it from my hand. Tiny strands of the goo would come off and stick everywhere. The gooey gel was basically unusable. I think it had degraded.... I had to throw it away as it would’ve left bits and pieces of goop everywhere. What a mess. Don’t waste your money people.

productreview.author: Aristotle Abarintos
productreview.review: Very fun to use. Just vacuum first excess debris and then use this for final cleaning.

productreview.author: crystal
productreview.review: It cleaned so damn well! So happy with it. Hate the texture as I hate slime... But it works... Just not sure how to clean it? My car was dirty and it got it alllll haha

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Amazing stuff,  perfect for cleaning fan blades on my pc but do not drop on carpet, it picks up stuff the vacuum did not

productreview.author: Carbon
productreview.review: Could do without a scent, but it's not very strong to begin with. It does work very well though. Picks dust up from all places. Will be getting this stuff again. One note, it did leave somewhat of a shine, not sure if thats just initial use and will dry up!?

productreview.author: john c.

products.title: Freenove Ultimate Starter Kit for Raspberry Pi 4 B 3 B+ 400, 434-Page Detailed Tutorials, Python C Java Code, 223 Items, 57 Projects, Solderless Breadboard

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: The the tutorial is helpful, but the quality of the component should be improved
productreview.review: I bought this kit to practice my technical skills since I am an engineering student going to my master study. I like the tutorial provided since it's detailed and well organized. However, when I tried to implement the ADC module using the PCF8591 chip, the pi could not detect the address of the chip (using I2C communication). Then I found that the chip was not soldered properly. If this issue could be avoided in the future, the product would be better. If the user could not address the issue, they will be really disappointed after wasting lots of time trying to reconnect the wires and change the code. Just my suggestion.

productreview.author: igor topalov
productreview.reviewTitle: It is like a dream of my childhood!
productreview.review: The best pack to prepare one to dive in into world of IoT!  (and brush up on programming skills - especially with C) Two remarks: - boards are not very convenient -  and the way to create wires with soldering iron - is not a very efficient and neat, - it makes sense to port Python code to Python 3. (as it it more up to date) But overall - for this price - great stuff and (if you dedicate time and efforts) fully worth it.

productreview.author: Bernie & Amber
productreview.reviewTitle: Came with many bent prongs unfortunately, Great value for money otherwise
productreview.review: I was really looking forward to this, recently starting programming with a new raspberry pi 4 and wanted to extend my toys. All parts came as expected but unfortunately someone during packing pushed some of the board into the case in order to make it all fit and bent many of the devices prongs. Hopefully this is just a one off.

productreview.author: SH
productreview.reviewTitle: Big kit, not sure about quality though
productreview.review: The kit is very good overall with good tutorial and lots of parts/projects.  My issue is the same as a previous reviewer that the quality might not be top notch.  For us the GPIO breakout and ribbon did not work.  These are key parts in our decision to buy this kit.  Better quality control would have saved a bunch of time and frustration trying to figure out why things weren’t working as expected.

productreview.review: First I made a mistake I took everything out of the case and couldn't get it all back in There is nothing negative about the kit. All parts needing ant-static bags were in them. productreview.review: Excellent kit with everything needed to work on Raspberry Pi projects. Thumbs up to the seller who sent me a replacement case, at no additional cost, as i received a cracked one. Highly recommend this kit!

productreview.author: D. Haigh
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 12, 2018
productreview.review: Fantastic starter Kit. I bought this not to learn electronics (I am already a qualified electronics systems designer) its also not really to learn about programming, again I have been programming for 30+ years now in industry. I bought this to learn about the raspberry pi. It is this that this kit does really well. The manual is very clear (though has the odd word of chinglish in there). The experiments are interesting. But most importantly the manual shows you how the Raspberry pi communicates in Python and C to its GPIO port and external electronics. This is exactly what I was after.

productreview.author: Eccentric Inventor
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 19, 2019
productreview.review: Frankly, I don't know how they can provide this at the price. It comes in a 6" x 9" plastic case, crammed full of various quality bits and pieces - so full it's like a puzzle to get them all back in! The associated pdf tutorial (available to download on the Freenove website) is almost 300 pages and seems pretty comprehensive, has plenty of very clear colour illustrations of the 'this-goes-there, plug-this-in-here' type to get you started. There are basic informative wiki's on things like LED's, motors and stepper motors, and basic electronics. It also has circuit diagrams, and full listings in both 'c' and Python for the supplied program files, even a how-to on getting a Raspberry Pi going in the first place (but note the Pi is not included). Device datasheets are also provided. That said, I'm not sure it's for a *complete* beginner, if you have been using a Pi for a while and ideally know a little 'c' and/or Python, it would help. And it's fun... I wish I'd had one as a teenager !

productreview.author: M E Soons
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 1, 2018
productreview.review: Amazing plastic box with loads of quality components. The downloaded tutorials are superb ,easy to understand and work you through step by step. The only fly in the ointment was that the bar led didn't work so presumed it faulty. Contacted Freenove and had a prompt reply and help and are in the process of replacing it for me. There are no labels on the items so takes a bit of working out what is what. I first off started to write the python script in but found that spacing are so critical that it takes quite a bit of messing about altering the script in order to make it run. I have resorted to running their downloaded code which is really easy to get things going but not so good in teaching Python coding. I wholeheartedly recommend this kit for anyone interested in learning small electronic projects using the Raspberry Pi and Python code.

productreview.author: P. F. Bailey
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 4, 2018
productreview.review: Really great kit, great price and no cheap components. Very pleased with the neat case it all comes in and the amount of projects you can make with this kit. Most items carefully packed in anti-static bags and the LCD panel is brilliant. Would absolutely recommend this if you want to build and test lots of different projects with the Raspberry Pi.

productreview.author: Daniel S.
productreview.review: I purchased one for each of my kids and first impressions are good. The GUI is simple and fast, and they are a blast. At 10 I would have lost my mind to get one of these to play with rather than a bouncy ball on a paddle. The only negative so far is that the speaker is very underwhelming for listening to mp3's etc.

productreview.review: Really good watch for kids. My daughter played with it for a week then she was bored of it. But for long car rides and for a kid that gets bored easily it's a good thing to have. The watch itself was great but for a older kid it's to simple. I'd recommend for a kid under the age of 6

Il fait tout pleins de photos, video et il l'aime vraiment beaucoup. Ce n'est pas de la haute qualité mais pour un jeune de 7 ans c'est très bien! Ce fut son cadeau préféré!

productreview.review: I have purchased this watch as a gift for a little girl. She was very excited and happy with it. It worked as expected for about a month. Then it stopped charging. Although the charger is plugged correctly and no parts are broken, the screen remains black. Very disappointed with the situation and money wasted.

productreview.review: my daughter loves it. Got it for her 5th birthday and she is overwhelmed.  I like the fact that you can limit the watch/play time for the games. I contacted the seller when I couldn't figure it out and they replied instantly. Amazing buy!
