Also, i find the pictures of this set to be misleading because it shows both 'halves' of the box side by side as if it was opening like a 'book' but it's not. They have taken pictures of both the front and the back and put them side-by-side to make it look like it's opening like a book. If i knew this i would not have buy because it is not practical to have to flip it back and forth each time you want to change accessory while working with it.

productreview.author: Wayne
productreview.reviewTitle: Litterally has everything a screwdriver set needs and more
productreview.review: I got this screwdriver set because I realized my current set doesn't have enough bits to be used for everything and I'm the kind of guy that wants to have ALL the bits just in case I ever need it. And oh man, this set is the one to get. One day it just popped up on my Amazon page and when I saw it and saw the price I was shocked at how much value I can get for around $20. So I immediately bought it! When I first opened it I was so impressed by the amount of things it came with. As you can see from the photos it comes with TONS of different bits and even comes with an extension tool that makes the screwdriver longer. And some of the other tools it came with I have no idea what it's for but I'm sure I'll find some use for it when the time comes. I've owned it for about a month now and have used it quite a few times since then. I used it to fix my computer, projector, open cabinets and other things around the house and I can say that this is truly a screwdriver of all trades. Any screw you can think of this screwdriver set has something for it. The only downside is that after using it for a while I can start to feel it breaking apart and getting worned out since it seems like it's made from cheap materials and the built is a bit flimsy. So hopefully it won't break on me anytime soon. Overall, if you use it carefully it will be the only screwdriver set you'll need.

productreview.author: Christina
productreview.review: I'm very happy with this set. The screwdriver is a good weight and the bits fit perfectly and securely into the magnetic slot. There is a free moving end to rest on your palm and freely rotate the screwdriver which is easily my favourite part of this set. It moves so nicely. The bits came slightly lubricated which is very nice and shows attention to detail. There are more bits than I will probably ever use and they are all very clearly labeled with their size laser etched on each bit. There are clear symbols on the case to indicate the type of bit that is in the slot so it's very easy to find the bit you need. The bits are all held into the case magnetically but are also easy to take out. I love this set and at around $18 I am beyond thrilled. I bought this set to work on my 3d printer, which mostly has hex. I have more than enough sizes for this. This set has made it much easier to work on my 3d printer :)

productreview.author: K.G
productreview.reviewTitle: Electric  Screwdriver set, Versatile home improvement acessory
productreview.review: I wanted to get an electronic screwdriver set to ease my home improvement work and decided to give this new product a try after going through its specifications. This electric screwdriver set consists of 55 precision bits that can be used for any work needs and good quality sturdy material. This main unit has the ability to recharge it and use it with the electricity to have easy functionality. This screwdriver has led lights in the top of the device and it helps to clearly visualize the work area. Since the main unit has magnet on the top of the unit it is easy to attract screwdriver head over it. Because all are made up of sturdy metal this set can be used for any occasion. This comes with a handy carrying case and its very versatile to use in any location and I keep this item in my car trunk. Overall I am really happy about this.

productreview.author: tzcnd
productreview.reviewTitle: Just what is needed for electronic repairs
productreview.review: Just received the set and have already used it to replace a broken screen in a laptop.  When you have the right tools it makes the job so much easier to accomplish.  Have never replaced a laptop screen before but 15 minutes later the laptop is good as new. The magnetic bits make dealing with tiny screws a breeze.  No more dropping the screw and never being able to retrieve it or even find it.  The handle makes removing and reinserting these tiny screws simple.  The included magnetic screw memory map helps you to organize the tiny screws you removed and insures that they go back into their proper hole. Can't comment on the longevity of the kit but so far I am very impressed.

productreview.author: Brian Sonntag
productreview.review: While this kit has many bits, they are not all perfectly fit in the driver. Some are hard to push in and pull out, some are flimsy. Some bits do not precisely fit in the screw's head either. The chromium coating is of poor quality and I'll update this review once I'll do a load test. The organizer box is a bit of stupid design. It it has two lids on opposite sides. While all the bits are in one side of the box, the screw driver and other tools are in the opposite. So, you'd better to get tools ready before you start looking for a bit. This set has many rear bits and I'll keep it just for this reason. Otherwise, it would go back to seller.

productreview.author: M5CS
productreview.review: I'm rather pleased with this purchase, from the driver to the bits and right down to the casing. I've had about a dozen of these so-called precision driver kits, I've brought another kit along with this one from another vendor, seriously. But by far this is the one that speak volumes on quality. I'm very critical of what I brought with my hard-earned money hence why I've a dozen kits, but 5 Stars it is.... I'm still looking forward to using this kit, I've so many....

productreview.author: b1ack1otus
productreview.review: This is a very nice tool that feels good in the hand as well. The aluminum case and all the bits seems to be strong enough.  I do put my set inside my toolbox so it does scratch from all the other tools i have in there but that's not an issue. Durability wise I think the bits will last very long for me. I do not frequently use this, however, the hinge where you release the bits from the case seems to be made from some kind of material that I do not think will last as long as the bits and handle. would recommend this to anyone looking for a full bit set.

productreview.author: Emily L
productreview.reviewTitle: Sad to Have to Return It: Received Defect
productreview.review: For this price, the precision screwdrivers are actually pretty decent. The materials are alright enough for this price, and the materials for the bits aren't the kind that would strip either. It's compact and simple, but the tray would occasionally pop out. Forced to Return: I would love to keep this, but my screwdriver set was essentially saturated with grease/chemical on the tray along with a pungent chemical smell. Upon contacting the seller, they were kind enough to offer me a 20% discount and apologized for the defect. I tried to clean up the chemical but it wasn't too effective, so I ended up having to return the set.

productreview.author: Michael Wood
productreview.reviewTitle: Absolutely Fantastic for the occasional DIYer, but probably garbage to a Pro.
productreview.review: The bits seem to have fairly good tolerances, with a very positive lock from bit into screw on the Tx5.  The driver could use a little bit of work, as rotating the driver shows a significant wobble in the driver itself.  Having said that, most of this precision work is done at very low speeds so it's not really very significant to me, the bits are more important.  This is my only super-precision set, so my needs are quite modest, but with the huge selection of bits I imagine this will be my go-to for delicate work for a long while.  If you use these tools daily, this kit will probably drive you nuts.  For me as an only occasional user, it will probably last me a lifetime and be a life-saver every (infrequent) time it's required.

productreview.author: Jooliee
productreview.review: My go-to set. I love to tinker and this is the set I bring with me when I need to fix anything. Pros: - Fast - it was delivered quickly. - Value - best bang for your buck. - Heavy & Durable - a quality set. - Organized - easy to find bits, stays in place. - Compact - double sided, easy to carry. - Magnetic - easy to pick up small bits. - Bits - a variety of quality bits in this set - Comfortable - rotating cap helps do the job comfortably did not realize how great the rotating cap is until now. - Case - simple and clean looking. The two part clicks together. Cons: - Case - the clicking works well to keep it together however if you shake it hard enough it tends to slide out but no biggie. - Wished the symbols were engraved cause I thought they would wear off overtime but they haven’t after a year so all is good. Also had a quick question and they were quick to reply. Great customer service. (Update) Overall: I would recommend buying this mini precision screwdriver set if you want a sleek  affordable set to repair your everyday items.

productreview.author: Maximus
productreview.review: I love that this screwdriver set has all of the bits magnetically attached to the case as well as magnetically lock into the driver itself. Also the locking mechanism is really good as my previous tool sets have the lid lock broken. The only issue I have is that the bits doesn't have a lot of magnetic strength to hold a screw on the tip. But it may be just my screws. Overall solid built product

productreview.author: Manon Parent
productreview.reviewTitle: UN KIT QUI PEUX VOUS SAUVER DES $$$$$
productreview.review: De nos jours, faire réparer un appareil électronique en boutique, juste parce qu'il vous manque les outils, peut vous coûter plus cher que l'appareil lui-même. Cet ensemble d'outils est une petite merveille. Des tournevis aux pointes tellement petites, des pinces et autres articles qui sauront faire la différence si vous avez la main bricoleuse. Si vous savez des connaissances et qu'il ne vous manque que les outils pour faire vos réparations...C'EST L'ENSEMBLE PARFAIT POUR TOUTES CES BRICOLAGES. QUALITÉ-PRIX...HONNETEMENT CA SE RESPECTE.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Having had a 66 piece precision set but not completely satisfied with it, I wanted to pick up a new set with more bits.  This set was a great price and offered far more bits than my previous set.  The bits are easily removed from the case for use, unlike my previous set which required using needle nose pliers in order to get the bit out of the case. The quality also seems to be great and should last for a very long time.  I cannot speak to the other accessories as I have not used them yet, but the screwdriver and bits are worth the price for them alone.

productreview.author: Dr. Roger S. Harrington
productreview.reviewTitle: Impressive collection of drivers in a durable, compact case
productreview.review: Overall, compared to the chincey driver sets that come in plastic cases that always break, this is an awesome deal! Metal case is compact. Beware if shaken while open, driver bits will drop. Aside from that, the bits seem robust and the selection is a HUGE. Fit and finish seems excellent I’m pretty picky about my tools/instruments so despite the low price, was “WOWED”

productreview.author: Jordan Alba
productreview.review: It is definitely not the greatest quality but it does what its supposed to do! For the price I am extremely pleased with what I got. If you plan on using these tools for heavy duty there's a chance something might break so think about investing in a more solid set. In my case I only needed these for my Arduino build which are small electronic devises so this set worked like a charm.

productreview.author: Orle
productreview.review: Had so many extra pieces compared to most sets for this price, would highly recommend. The screw driver itself is decent, the options and extensions are amazing! The plastic part on top feels a bit cheap and is hard to spin sometimes. The grey plastic parts in the case that you use to pry open things seem to break a little easily but I’m not very gentle either.

productreview.author: Olive
productreview.reviewTitle: I just wish the bits were more durable
productreview.review: This feels study and well-built, but I've had a couple of the bits strip out on some light disassembly tasks already. In my opinion, a Torx bit should not ever strip out on you unless you're using the wrong size or excessive force. Still, I like the case, and I like the driver. I'm sure I can find replacement bits that will last longer.

productreview.author: S.M.
productreview.reviewTitle: Great mini screwdriver set. You can't go wrong.
productreview.review: I needed a mini screwdriver set for my family's electronic devices and for my kids' toys. This is set is perfect for my needs. It is small, well organized and very user friendly. The screwdriver bits are magnetically attached to the carrying case which is solid and compact. It is very handy and can easily and conveniently be carried with you in a jacket pocket or backpack. Having 48 different bits or heads is nice. I would buy this again.

productreview.author: George Y
productreview.review: This is a great screwdriver set for a lot of different uses. The interchangeable bits are easy to switch, held in place with small magnets, and are sturdy when in use. The case is very durable and is very portable. I've even been able to use them to screw the small screws on a pair of glasses. I would highly recommend this screwdriver set!

productreview.author: Dennis S
productreview.review: Very well made. Case is push to lock/unlock so the kit will stay together. Also the case shell is metal. I think aluminum as it is non-magnetic. Bits are magnetized and are magnetically held in place so you do not have to struggle to un-clip a bit which is a problem with most other sets. Bits look well made of hardened steel. Definitely recommend this set!

productreview.author: Gavin
productreview.review: The bit to the left was used for laptop screws and it's been twisted out of shape (you can see the vanes are curved). The phillips was wearing out really quick on wood screws, which shouldn't be so tough on the bit... Really low quality. The magnets on some bits also weakened so I can't turn the kit over without some falling to the ground. Overall, the experience quickly goes downhill

productreview.author: Sabrina
productreview.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
productreview.review: For the price and the amount of versatility of screws and combination it is amazing. The screws are nicely organized which i very much appreciate but for the life of me i cannot get the screws to properly insert in the screwdriver. I have just accepted that it does not fit at all. The only time it does fit is in the bendable extender that comes with it. The tips do not have a very strong magnet, it barely picks up the nuts and bolts you unscrew.

productreview.author: brbo
productreview.reviewTitle: Great Hobbyist Set with tons of bits/sizes !!
productreview.review: Amazing little kit - a must have to repair any small items - Allen Torx Philips Flat - great little telescoping driver w/extensions etc. + CHEAP $$ -1 star due to cheap plastic handle and chrome type material of bits looks cheap and chippable coating in the future - not the top quality for everyday use - but perfect for any hobbyist

productreview.author: I C
productreview.review: It contains all screwdriver bits that I need for DIY laptop repairing. The repair tool kit consists of all the premium features in a good price such as aluminum case, magnetic screwdriver and bits. The bits and the screwdriver do not fall off from the case and the case is easy to carry with premium feels.

productreview.author: Jim
productreview.review: Got this for my dad after I finally got tired of his old sets (missing various heads of all sizes and shapes). This thing has it all, every size and head shape you can think of. The metal quality seems very solid and I think this can easily last my dad many years to come (provided he doesn't lose it)

productreview.author: Bruce
productreview.reviewTitle: Good design but single use material.
productreview.review: This kit is a single use tool. Used it to fix 1 gadget and the tips got worn out immediately. It's too bad, this tool's design is very neat with great features. If the manufacturer would invest in standard grade materials I would make an amazing product.

productreview.author: D. Griffiths
productreview.review: If you’re working on electronics, this set should have every bit you need to get into every device you have, from proprietary Apple screws to tri-wing and other unusual tips.  Nice having some extra components too like plastic spudgers to help open tight enclosures and such.

productreview.author: Moonrunner
productreview.reviewTitle: Good in a pinch but not great quality
productreview.review: Basic bits will do their job, but for example, security bits are almost useless. I could barely get the screws off on a German-made piece of equipment. The spudger is made out of very soft plastic, so it may last you a single phone repair, but nothing beyond that. The bit-holder is decent for the money, though.

productreview.author: Cyrus T.
productreview.review: Literally has all of the screwdrivers you need in there. Enough said. The magnetic function is great because sometimes you drop the screw in a very deep place and it's hard for you to get it with your bare hands. Very sweet function. The case is built very well. I love how you have to pressure pop the top in order to open the case. The screwdrivers themselves have excellent quality. 5/5 would buy again.

productreview.author: Simple Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Best option considering value for money
productreview.review: This set is surprising considering the price. The quality of the screwdriver, tips and the aluminum case is excellent. The indication of the format and the shape is engraved on each bits which makes it possible to keep the whole organized if one uses several pieces at the same time. The only negative is in the plastic ends that serve as a locking mechanism, I doubt their durability. Cet ensemble est surprenant considérant le prix. La qualité du tournevis, des embouts et de l'étui en aluminium est excellente. L'indication du format et de la forme est gravée sur chaque embout ce qui permet de garder l'ensemble organisé si on utilise plusieurs pièces à la fois. Le seul point négatif se trouve dans les extrémités en plastique qui servent de mécanisme de verrouillage, je doute de leur durabilité.

productreview.author: Mihail A. Popa
productreview.reviewTitle: Very happy, works great on Macbook Pro.
productreview.review: After spending lots of money on cheapos and expensive sets, I think this is the one. It's magnetic, it has and excellent storage case and layout, cool and practical design. I have already used the pentalobe and torx 1 to open the infamous macbook pro. Pulled screws without a glitch, even a couple that seems to have been over tightened. Very pleased, highly recommended.

productreview.author: Vincent Adultman
productreview.review: Awesome set and just what I needed for electronics. Quality is great, the screwdriver feels perfect and the case is sleek and easy to use. Tips are held in magnetically, so don't drop the holder once it's out of the case as the tips will all fall out.

productreview.author: C. P.
productreview.review: Okay overall product. Some of the heads have already stripped, but I'm not really using them as intended on small phone or computer parts, so it may just be my fault. Overall value is really good and I am happy with the product. Price was cheap, so worth it.

productreview.author: S
productreview.review: I’ve been looking for a precision screwdriver set for awhile and needed one that had most of the bits I needed.  This kit has every bit you could possibly need. If you’re someone who constantly takes things apart or makes repairs, this kit pays for itself.

productreview.author: Tyler Garvey
productreview.reviewTitle: A definite must-have for tinkerers who repair their own small electronics
productreview.review: It's a nice, compact, handsome little carrying case that takes up about as much space as a TV remote, yet has just about every bit size you could ever need to take anything apart for repairs. It has a bit for pretty much everything, with the only exception being the bits used by old NES consoles. I've found myself using the hex bits in it more than anything else since I utterly despise allen keys.

productreview.author: Daniel
productreview.reviewTitle: Good product for the cheap price.
productreview.review: It comes with everything it said giving you a variety of tools you may not have. The whole reason I bought this product was for the three/tri point head however, after viewing the other bits in person I noticed a number of bits I could use that I've only seen once or twice in my household. Obviously this is a budget kit and you not going to get the same quality that you would from a $60-$100 but it gets the job done for the low price point. Overall would recommend especially if this a just convenient purchase without breaking your bank.

productreview.author: nick podolsky
productreview.review: It arrived with the near majority of driver heads fallen out of plastic holders.  I had to sort them all back into place.  I would strongly recommend tightening up mold of driver head base so that they actually stay in place.  You can pull them out with minimal ease... Other than that - good product and decent price.  Arrived on time.

productreview.author: Ssmirage
productreview.review: Nice little kit,includes bits I have never seen but at least when you need it its there in that Kit. Seems to be of good quality but its hard to tell until you really neef to use all of those bits.

productreview.author: Eric
productreview.review: Had everything I needed to repair my laptop! The case is sleek - it's magnetic so nothing can get lost. The place where the driver normally sits can also be used as a magnetic screw tray so nothing rolls around on your desk and gets lost. Additionally, the entire case is slimmer than most phones (with cases), meaning it can easily fit in my back pocket.

productreview.author: Glenoran1
productreview.review: I needed to tighten the tiny screws on prescription glasses and sunglasses. With the marking beside each one to show what shape the head sported, it was easy to find the right one. It slipped into the holder perfectly, and did the job just as I wanted it to do. Love it!

productreview.author: Jintal
productreview.reviewTitle: It has all what you needed for day to day repair
productreview.review: A very complete set. I wanted a screwdriver set that have everything for my day to day repair. I needed - removing hard drives Open laptop and computer , tightening kitchen door and kitchen utensils etc. It will be useful in all. Good quality for the price. Recommended for everyday small to medium size jobs.

productreview.author: Dave Laurendeau
productreview.review: Je voulais un petit tournevis électrique pour mes différents travaux. Celui-ci est bien, mais pas assez puissant pour mes besoins. Malgré tout, il fonctionne très bien et la pile dure assez longtemps pour moi. Les nombreuses pointe sont excellente il y a un peu de tout. La boîte de rangement est bien aussi.

productreview.author: Dancinglemur
productreview.review: Great price for the amount of screw heads you get. I love that they're slightly magnetic so that they're easy to stick into the little screw handle. The only (minor) issue I have with these is that the metal is on the softer side so you have to be careful with certain screws and aligning them into place. Can't complain a whole lot for 20 bucks though!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I needed a mini Torx bit, and this set had the right size. The case is made of aluminum and did not have any logo or branding on it - heard this was a problem with others that had ordered the set. The screwdriver itself is solid, and the bits are all stamped with the size. The holder for the screwdriver & bits has magnets in it, so everything stays in place, and the specific bit type is silkscreened onto it. Great set for the money, and great quality.

productreview.author: Christer Hedman
productreview.review: I've bought a lot of cheap precision screwdrivers in the past and I strip the heads on anything that doesn't turn easily. These will be the last ones I'll ever need. Love the storage case and the way it's spring loaded to open/close. LOTS of bit selections and the magnetic holders in the case stop them from accidently falling out if you tip the open case. I've used it on a tough philips screw and it worked flawlessly. Love it!

productreview.author: Electraglide02
productreview.review: This has all the bits that you are likely to need for those small finicky repair jobs. The quality, sizes and types of bits appear to be very good and you should have the right bit for almost any electronics repair/upgrade etc. Recommend.

productreview.author: caever
productreview.review: J'ai utilisé se produit plusieurs fois et tout est normal... le tournevis réussit à dévisser des vis serré mécaniquement sans dommage des douilles ou du manche mais les accessoires en plastique son JUSTE une bonne base pour commencer, la finition des outils en plastique est pas très propre, mais ont peux s'en contenter parfaitement si ont en a besoin une ou deux fois par année mais si ces pour une utilisation de démontage régulières il va falloir d'autre outils comme seux en plastique plus "professionnelle" comme des ifixit

productreview.author: Zlatan Fazlagic
productreview.review: I was very impressed with the quality of the product. The screwdriver and the bits look very precise and the case is super slick and functional. The only thing that could be improved is that the screwdriver could glide a bit smoother under the finger.

productreview.author: Jojanco
productreview.review: Broke 1 day before return window closed. Not enough time to ship back to claim refund. Does not clip closed anymore, mechanism broken.

products.title: LCD Writing Tablet, NEWYES 8.5 Inch Electronic Writing Board Doodle and Scribble Board Magnetic Memo Notes for Kid & Adults (Blue)

productreview.author: P. G.
productreview.review: Was enjoying the product but stopped working last week (bought late April 2018).  It will not erase the screen.  I have replaced the battery numerous times.  I have contacted the manufacturer and hope to work something out as it still under warranty. UPDATE: So I contacted them and within an hour or so they responded and arranged a new one for me.  Incredible service, very impressive.

productreview.author: gabriel j. banc
productreview.review: My wife and I love this tablet and it's making our lives so much easier. I often get notes from my wife on what to do or pick up and me being me I usually loose them..... Not on purpose ;-). With this I'm not worried about loosing notes again and I also don't have to run around anymore trying to find a pen and paper to take a quick note. I gave it to my toddler to draw but he lost interest fairly easily since it's not a car he won't really play with anything that's not a car for now. You can see the writing very clearly without any problems and it's also very thin and light which gives it a nice clean look. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for  a reusable note taking or if you have a child that loves to draw. This will save you money on paper and pens!!!!

productreview.author: Monica S.
productreview.reviewTitle: It is cheap looking/ feeling but does exactly what is says
productreview.review: When it arrived I though it was very cheap looking and not worth the $16 I paid for it. It does what it says though and everything is as shown , just expect a light piece of plastic. The pen doesnt hold in the slot and falls out most of the time. But it serves it purpose and we pay just as much for a silly surprise toy so I still prefer to give the kiddo something which is more "educational". This is a good way to make writing fun for kids, especially those in JK who can associate learning with fun. Pretty sure this can be beat up a bit also. I purchased for a 4.5 year old.

productreview.author: Arin Iglesias
productreview.review: I bought a smaller pad as gift, then I found I need one myself. So I got this bigger and bright green version. The color is exactly same as picture. It’s super convenient for me to write down any note , especially the shopping list. This actually works really well. Smith and clear. It had a lock that prevents work from being erased when you press the middle button, but if you want it erasable, you just unlock it and the button works to easily erase everything

productreview.author: BG
productreview.review: I bought 2 of these. One for myself and one for my son. First off I love it. It's simple and easy to use. I have mine on my desk for jotting notes. I have reduce my paper consumption significantly since buying it. My son loves his. He brings it to school for doodles on his lunch break since he likes to draw. I strongly recommend this for anyone with kids or just to reduce paper consumption!

productreview.author: Daniel C
productreview.review: This pad is very good because it replaces my sticky notes. Many times I only wrote down one item on it and dispose after few minutes after I finished the information. Now I can just press a button and it'll be erased! I also enjoy the lock button which can lock the data written on there to avoid accidentally deleting info. The button is at the top, but I use it at the bottom like a tablet.

productreview.author: Tom & Monika McMahon
productreview.review: I use this at work as the weather is not that reliable . I take the info I need then I transfer it to the proper form in the office,I save a lot of paper and I do not damage the form.It is so light that after a while you do not notice you have it.When I retire I will put it on the fridge for notes.

productreview.author: Dante Fadelle
productreview.review: I would have given it a 5 if it was Brighter. The colors on it are very dark and dimmed for me unless I have it under direct light like a desk lamp or the sun. It's really easy to use and fun to draw and doodle on and erase right away. But you can't fix your mistakes in a long etched drawing. It's basically an Etch a Sketch with a stylus.

productreview.author: Dani
productreview.review: It seems like a really good idea and then it’s like our tablets and iPads already have apps that you can do this thing on you just need a stylus and so I was thinking that it’s a little bit wasteful to have one of these so it’s not worth it.

productreview.author: Alicia M
productreview.reviewTitle: Love it and especially love the stretchy cord!
productreview.review: I purchased this for my son. My daughter has the "named brand", which was double the price. After using it, my daughter wishes she has this one instead! The colours are vibrant and they liked that it had a lock feature. My favorite part is the optional stretchy string that comes with it! Everytime my son borrowed my daughter's, he would misplace her pen. We don't have that worry with the string!

productreview.author: VP
productreview.review: As someone that uses a lot of post-it notes to write down stuff, this is very useful. There are 3 colors (the text changes color as you write down the screen), and a lock button so you don't accidentally delete what you have written down. I'll be buying a second one.

productreview.author: JoJo
productreview.review: I ordered 3 pink ones for my grand daughters for Christmas.  They arrived very quickly after I ordered them.  They are a perfect size for the girls.  They write great with the pen and erase very easily.  Can't wait for them to open their gift. Thank you

productreview.author: Bianca
productreview.review: As expected. It's thin and lightweight. A great alternative to the more expensive options out there. I do wish it was a bit brighter, but writing more slowly helps make the lines thicker. If you're looking for a writing tablet and don't want to dish out $20+ for the more expensive options, this is a good buy.

productreview.author: Bella
productreview.review: Package received as described, light and handy, fit for little child and easy to draw. I tried it before giving to my niece .The color is amazingly nice.It’s a perfect choice as a gift. I may consider buying a white one for myself.

productreview.author: JN
productreview.reviewTitle: Pretty good for what it is.
productreview.review: Pretty good for what it is. I love the fact that it has 2 magnets, we keep it on our refrigerator to make notes. The kids love it too, so ordered a cheaper one for them, will see how both of them compare. I took of 1 star because it isn't as bright as I hoped it would be. Recommended!

productreview.author: monique pilon
productreview.review: Pour donner en cadeaux à deux enfants de 5ans et 6ans !!! Ils aiment beaucoup écrire et faire des dessins!!!.... Et même ils les apportent partout où ils vont ! Pour moi bonne achat de cadeaux!! Merci....

productreview.author: Shirley
productreview.review: This drawing board is really good,  the weight is light,  my boy loves drawing very much,  and he think it is similar to a ipad.  He said I got my first ipad!!

productreview.author: CathTristis
productreview.review: Parfait, payer vraiment pas cher avec un rabais supplémentaire. Qualité numéro 1. Parfait pour mes gars de 4 ans. Ils sont émerveillés par la capacité de la tablette.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Very much disappointed with the brightness and the quality of the product. The display light doesn't match with the picture advertised.

productreview.author: W C.
productreview.review: Bought it for my little grandson. He loves writing and drawing all the time. It is lightweight and handy that he can carry where ever he goes. It can be erased just by pressing a button and locked when you do not want to and no more paper waste.

productreview.author: S.M
productreview.review: Originally bought to work with individuals suffering with aphasia and so for so good. It has been effective and the price was amazing.

productreview.author: Angelpear
productreview.review: Great gadget to keep entertained. Clean and no mess. You can even lock the screen so the picture or words you put on won’t be erased easily. Great for kids at any age.

productreview.author: Kristal
productreview.reviewTitle: I suggest saving up for a Boogie Board - you get what you pay for
productreview.review: We.bought this to replace.our broken boogie board but it is just not even close to as good. The writing is very thin and faint and not nearly as smooth to write on.

productreview.author: Liselle
productreview.review: Just bought two of these for my kids to doodle on. I love them specially for school work and practicing there spelling words and math, it saves a lot of paper. There really light and easy for them to hold. I may even have to get one to stick on the fridge for my list of things to remember.

productreview.author: Jammiesk
productreview.review: Works as intended and great for writing memos, just wish there was a magnetic backing so I could stick it to my fridge.

productreview.author: Stef Ferland
productreview.review: Pratique, mes enfants s’en servent beaucoup ( Colle moins  bien sûr le frigo )😕 Pour le reste c’est parfait

productreview.author: Mike
productreview.review: I purchased this tablet for my daughter. She absolutely loves this. The pen is accurate when writing or drawing and when you press the erase button, the screen clears instantly.

productreview.author: Client d'Amazon
productreview.review: L'écriture pourrait être plus foncé mais ce petit tableau fonctionne très bien! Bon achat! Les enfants aiment beaucoup écrire et dessiner dessus.

productreview.author: gary
productreview.review: Perfect for my 2 year old son to doodle on. No more messy crayons or color marker

productreview.author: DELUDE
productreview.review: ecrit seulement en vert, aucune couleur, mais mis a part ca fait tres bien le boulot

productreview.author: Jessica Roberts
productreview.review: This is perfect for writing quick notes, quick calculations ( in your head) or recording something temporarily that you can access to.

productreview.author: kristelle roy
productreview.review: I had bought this for my work instead of wasting papers. Love having this writing tablet. Received a lot of complement about it. Everyone wanted to purchase one.

productreview.author: asdf
productreview.review: Kids like this painting, when I driving, they painting and have fun, good product. I like it very much.

productreview.author: Carrie Brown
productreview.reviewTitle: Makes a great gift for kids of all ages.
productreview.review: My 3 1/2 year old absolutely loves this. Great for practicing spelling, she likes it much more than a pencil and paper. Thinking of giving as gifts to her friends.

productreview.author: Natalie Li
productreview.review: We use it as a to-do list, shopping list or to leave messages for each other. Excellent product - works with fingers but best with the stylus supplied. The button at the top clears the screen. Great value for money.

productreview.author: Frank
productreview.review: magnet cannot hold the tablet but the rest is superb

productreview.author: Joan
productreview.review: Nice small thing, easy to carry, quite bright. My LO loves it.

productreview.author: Will71
productreview.review: Very thin and cheap looking. It works great though. The pen would be better if it was attached. It’s small,thin and easy to lose.

productreview.author: K
productreview.review: The writing is not as bright as I thought it was going to be, which is why it got 4 stars, otherwise it's what I wanted

productreview.author: Sammi
productreview.review: Extremely impressed with this paperless tablet. It helps my girl do her homework without having to use any scrap paper and reduces waste of paper.

productreview.author: Joyce
productreview.review: The writing/ drawing is only in green on the one I received, there are no colors like it shows in the picture! Also, it shows up very very faint...disappointed : (

productreview.author: michelle
productreview.review: Very light good to scribble and doddle on and won’t waste papers.  Good for kids to play with. Good for gifts for kids

productreview.author: Mona
productreview.reviewTitle: This is better than a tablet
productreview.review: Definitely a great gift for any kid. If you don’t want them using tablets or iPads but can’t find something to replace their needs with. This is definitely the one. It’s colourful and perfect size for their small hands. It’s also lightweight and clean. So after their done writing or drawing, with a touch of a button, everything gets erased.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: This review will be a little premature as I gave this to my little granddaughter only today.  She absolutely loves it.  Hopefully it works for a long time and she gets lots of good use out of it.  I removed a star only because, especially for little hands, it's too easy to lose the stylus.  In our case dropped on the outside deck floor and fell between the slats (no man's land -- no one wants to crawl on their belly under the deck to try to find it in the spider-infested dark).  I think it would be a great solution to attach the stylus to the drawing tablet with a cord.  This would prevent the loss of the stylus.  I'm trying to find something inexpensive to replace the stylus but so far am not having much success.

productreview.author: Mohamed Berrachdi
productreview.reviewTitle: Very Easy to Use, Perfect for kids
productreview.review: This writing tablet is much better than using a classic pen board, The ease of use is aw3esome, you just scribble and press the button and it goes away. Also, there is a locking button to keep stuff written from getting accidentally wiped which helps a lot with little ones. My daughter is using this for drawing and scribbling and she loves it. They have also included a second battery in the box which is very convenient since you won't spend two days looking for a button battery when it will run out.

productreview.author: Nicole B
productreview.review: comes nicely packaged with protective pouch (would make a great gift for children). Includes extra battery and instruction sheet. It is lightweight and easy for my children to hold onto. The lock button is handy if you want to save a picture from being accidentally erased. The button at the bottom quickly erases any drawings or messages with a simple press. The pen writes smoothly. Great for road trips and camping to keep my children entertained without the use of electronics

Now she doesn't need the picture board I sent.

productreview.author: Jean-François Tremblay
productreview.reviewTitle: Great chair, super comfy for long gaming sessions
productreview.review: Great gaming chair, other people in my home have Cougar gaming chairs and I can say this one is more comfortable, more cushion on the base where you sit on. Great chair, easy to assemble, decent quality, love the blue color design. Shipping was a bit late, but I can mention this was ordered right before COVID-19 caused amazon shipping delays. Unlike some gaming chair this one's armrest do not rotate but its not a necessary feature, very comfy and ergonomic armrest for long gaming sessions, I play 8-10+ hours often.

productreview.reviewTitle: The back support of chair is not same which was shown when I ordered it.
productreview.review: I ordered the chair it is different from which I ordered, the armrest were attach to back support and seat has curves from side. Looks like the chair is same company but different versions. Thought it’s fine. I don’t want to be in trouble of replacing it.

productreview.author: Jacques
productreview.reviewTitle: Good value for money, but don't expect the equivalent of a $500 chair.
productreview.review: After working from home for an extended period of time due to the pandemic, I decided my budget computer chair wasn't cutting it fir an 8 hour workday. I also didn't want to spend $500+ for a brand name ergo or gaming chair. This is the perfect middle ground. The chair is comfortable to sit in, fairly adjustable (except arm heights) and at half the price of high end chairs. I no longer get lower back pain at the end of the workday. CONS: Fairly easy to assemble but the instructions could be a bit clearer. The footrest option is a nice touch but it doesn't feel like it's firmly attached to the chair which makes me hesitate to rest the weight of my legs on it.

productreview.author: Xmodsthespot
productreview.reviewTitle: Great chair for the price with all the features, instructions could use some work
productreview.review: honestly for the lightning deal of $150 CAD the chair is great quality,pretty  comfortable and has more features then others at this price range, finding chairs with padded arm rests is already pretty hard regardless of price, so the fact you get firm memory foam arm rests(covered in a smooth leather) , adjustable/retractable leg rest and  neck /lumbar support pillows is crazy for the price, with all the good comes some bad, i have seen people on here with slightly damaged arm rests, and one person had a rip in the leather  aswell i seen that someone else's arm rest had completely snapped off , this wasn't the case for me, it was on time and came in basically perfect condition (that said i have only had this chair for about 1-2 weeks now, i will update this review if anything happens) my main gripe is the instructions, they are 3 pages long, with about 5 steps, its usable but sorta confusing. i'll give it 4 stars due to the instructions, and the fact some others here have had a few issues i like the chair and it goes very well with my set up, try to snag on lightning deal if possible as for $150 you can't go wrong with this. though even at full price of $200-$210 its still a good deal since it has the features many chairs skimp out at this price range. A clear recommendation from me.

productreview.review: If you’re looking for an affordable gaming chair. This might be the product for you. It was great overall but I found the armrests extremely uncomfortable while gaming on mouse and keyboard as they were way too high and I was forced to lift my shoulders up which is terrible for my neck and back. I saw another chair under the same company with adjustable arm rests which I highly recommend over this one

products.title: LCD Writing Tablet for Kids and Adults, JONZOO 8.5 Inch Electronic Colorful Doodle Board Drawing Pad with Screen Lock, Suitable for Home School Office

productreview.author: Christine
productreview.review: We are homeschoolers and use the (name brand) Boogie Board nearly daily for math or just for playing. We've had ours for over a year and it's in rough shape with some scratches on the screen making it a bit of a mess to write on. I ordered two of these so each of my kids had one, but also so we had a spare. Pros: Size - We bought the 10" and both kids were excited at the extra doodling space Price - I do think with some shopping around I could have gotten cheaper, but with the reviews and cost, it seemed like the least risk for the best price. Battery - They each came with an extra battery, which I appreciate because it's not the kind we usually have on hand. The pen - *Really* snaps in there. It's basically guaranteed to not fall out unintentionally. Cons: Strength -  Without a case, I wouldn't give this one to children under 4. It's not as tough as the Boogie Board, but is still decent if your kids will not be dropping it a lot or storing it under their toys. I'm regretting not buying one with a case. Brightness - While it's not as bright as the Boogie Board, it's still fine. No complaints but is noticeable. The Pen - Didn't come with a string to connect it to the board, which would be fine, but the "pro" of it really snapping in, means it kind of flings out when you push it out. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and I expect it to meet our needs as my kids are 6 and 8 and will be more gentle. I love having LCD boards on hand to save paper and for quick scratch work.

productreview.author: Umair
productreview.review: I bought it for my son as we are doing home schooling. He always use to run behind my note but since I bought this for him, he is very happy and always kept himself busy in writing and drawing different things. The size of the tablet is very good that gives extra space to write and draw. It comes with an extra battery that is very good as it is not the one that we usually always have at home. It is very easy to use and gives feeling that you are writing on chalk board without any mess. The best part is that it is not an electronic tablet and there is no fear of radiations that is usually not good for anyone but specially for kids.

productreview.author: Jasmine
productreview.reviewTitle: Ideal for kids learning to write. No radiations or back lighting.
productreview.review: This LCD Electronic tablet is a great gift for my kid. She just started to learn writing and she really enjoys these tablet. This dry erase works very well and it erases  quickly with one button. The pad is good for my kid to improve the handwriting and she keeps over writing to learn new words. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and didn't had any battery life issues. One of the reason for buying this, as it mentioned that it is radiation free and no back light as they are bad for small kids. This tablet pad has super low energy consumption and does not require any charging. It can be used on fridge to take notes, We don't  use it on the fridge though. It comes with a magnet which can be applied on to back to stick it to metal surfaces. Overall this product is easy to use and great for kids learning to write.

It isn’t as bright as I’d expected like in the area where she colours, but she doesn’t seem to mind at all. She tells me she is busy working and writes away lol. Nice to have a somewhat green way of practising our pre printing skills. She didn’t touch her tablet last night and this morning went right for this board instead, hurray!

products.title: Kenuo Digital Photo Frame 10 Inch 1920x1080 High Resolution 16:9 Full IPS Display Digital Picture Frame Auto-Rotate Image Preview Electronic Picture Frame Video Calendar Clock Support SD Card,USB

productreview.author: Erickos
productreview.review: Awesome picture quality, i upgraded my old digital frame who has a lot of pixel and this one is much better. It came with a microsd card 32gb with sd adaptor, so no need to buy one separately. It is not to big and not too small, just perfect size for bedroom desk. Hour and calendar function are great with small picture slideshow next to it. Remote work well too and power cable is long enough to reach power outlet easily. The frame feel solid and is of good quality.

productreview.author: SWINCAN
productreview.reviewTitle: Crisp and clear screen and good all around performer
productreview.review: We were on the hunt for a small, discreet digital photo frame with a IPS high definition screen that didn't break the bank. We also specifically didn't want any branding or designs other than mimicking a traditional photo frame. We originally looked at ones at our local london drugs and best buy and what not, but most of them were either more expensive or just didn't seem to be made well. This so far has checked all those boxes. The build quality feels solid and not economical, and most importantly the screen is rich and vibrant. The viewing angle is wide as we can view it from the sides and it doesn't deviate much. Thus far it has had no issues playing a plethora of formats that've we've put in from photos (we've put in 4 different formats) to music to video (have tried 5 formats). The auto rotate has worked on cue, you would think it's a easy function but some of the previous units we got somehow failed at it. We have it on the desk using the horizontal stand but there are mounting holes if we choose to move it to the wall. There's a remote control included, whether or not we have use for it, but the 32gb micro sd card that come with it sure is a nice bonus. All in all a affordable and well made unit with very good clarity in screen performance. Ps. if you're wondering if it can serve as a standalone movie player - yes it can actually, since it plays video files and outputs sound.

productreview.author: Pari
productreview.review: I got this photo Frame colour is really nice. I downloaded my last 10 years photos and videos now I am enjoying it each day or else no time to see old photos now I can watch that and enjoyed my past dates. I can controls with remote to change the Photos and videos and also use the calendar with our photos best thing is got with Microsd card . Also use the USB drive to use the photos. Screen quality is good and has voice to watch the video with sound .

productreview.author: Dirk Mittler
productreview.review: I purchased one of these in the beginning of 2020, only to find that it would constantly freeze. Next, I reformatted all my JPEGs, which are the only file-type I ever tried to display as the slideshow. I reformatted them not to be larger than 1920x1080 pixels. Again, that picture frame started freezing. Next, near the end of 2020, I purchased a second frame, belonging to a new batch, which this review is about, hoping that my first one was merely a coincidental defect. But now, the second picture frame has also started freezing, 1 day after my having received it. I am not happy. Dirk

productreview.author: Noah S
productreview.review: Wanted to free up some storage on my phone while still retaining the memories in some form and my friend recommended this to me. I would like to say that I was really shocked with how good of quality the pictures are on the screen. The device is slim and crisp looking and blends in well on my coffee table in my living room. It comes with a stand and remote and the cable which is long enough to reach a good distance. I really enjoy how it’s a media player as well with the music and slideshow options. You can decide how many pictures you want per screen and it self rotated and pictures which was what attracted me most. This digital photo frame does it all and it even comes with an SD card which was an added bonus. For the price and what you receive, I am beyond happy with it. Would be a great personal gift item to a loved one this coming holiday season!

productreview.author: ThatGuy
productreview.reviewTitle: Frame is nice but FREEZES CONSTANTLY
productreview.review: I purchased two of these frames and while they look very sharp and the display is great they FREEZE CONSTANTLY!!! I've tried adjusting the resolution of the pictures but no matter what they BOTH freeze up after several hours. Kind of defeats the purpose of having a picture frame to display various pictures if it freezes up all the time! There is no way to contact the seller and there is no web page to go to for downloading a firmware update. Very disappointed. If the seller can solve this problem I will revise my review but otherwise it will stand at a disappointing 1 star review even though it could be so much better.

productreview.author: JSMtl
productreview.review: The picture quality is great (10 inch model) and it’s a nice device, but the user manual is deficient, the operation non- intuitive, and there are many unanswered questions. How to go back from a sub menu? Does it support cable transfer to the memory card? Why does it sometimes play the same don’t twice on random? Why does it always start with the same picture/song when it’s in random? Other than these usability issues and the non-intuitive interface it’s a really nice product.

productreview.author: Sabeen
productreview.reviewTitle: Great memories with a digital album
productreview.review: Good digital frame, I wanted to put all of my babies photos in an album but then I came across this digital album and I thought it was pretty cool to just have all the pics on slideshow so I can watch it all the time instead taking time out and going through the album. It was kind of hard to upload photos since they are on my Icloud so then I had to find a laptop that can read the SD card and upload the pics. It's pretty straightforward to use. You can also just use an iPad but this album would always just stay on. I think it is a bit pricey but is a pretty good digital album. I would have preferred if pics can be downloaded to the album through wifi or something that is more used now.

productreview.author: Fanny
productreview.review: La qualité d'image est meilleure que notre ancien cadre photo, (je suis vraiment impressionnée) peut lire de la musique, des vidéos et des photos.  Cela fonctionne très bien. Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est mettre une carte SD, on peut aussi mettre une USB puis les images commencent à tourner. J'aime sa variété d'options Vous pouvez mettre vos photos au hasard ou dans un ordre, aussi ajuster la durée pendant laquelle vous souhaitez voir la photo de 3 secondes à 1 heure. Il est livré avec une télécommande: facile à utiliser et fonctionne parfaitement. Je suis satisfait de mon achat et je trouve qu'il vaut bien la valeur de mon argent. Je le recommanderai assurément.

productreview.author: SD
productreview.review: I got this digital frame as an e-frame to display my family portraits in the family room. It is also suitable for as a gift, the way it’s packaged. Retains and display the quality of my pictures and does not distort images. Perfect addition to any coffee table in family room as a dynamic photo frame. This does not have any inbuilt memory and nor did it come with SD card. So purchase of storage card/USB is required (extra cost).

productreview.author: UnboxingArmy
productreview.reviewTitle: It plays movies and music too!
productreview.review: This picture frame  has a remote control thats super helpful. It Looks like a tv screen, it's nice and bright and sharp. I tested it to plays mp3s , waves music files, mp4 and avi video files. Play movies on the go camping via powerbank . It has everything except wireless streaming,  but for the price I'm happy. It has controls on the back of the frame and can be powered by a usb bank as well as power outlet.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Bon rapport qualité prix. Très facile à paramétrer et à faire fonctionner! L’écran de 10’’ est parfait pour utiliser le cadre sur un meuble. Peut-être un peu petit si le but est de le fixer au mur. J’ai trouvé que la transition entre chaque photo n’est pas de très bonne qualité. Aussi, le temps entre chaque photo n’est pas constant. Si on sélectionne 15 secondes d’affichage pour chaque photo, parfois c’est 15 secondes, parfois 30 secondes. Donc certaines photos vont rester affichées plus longtemps que d’autres. Si le temps d’affichage est plus long, exemple 15min pour chaque photo, je suppose que la différence n’est plus si importante. Somme toute, très bon achat et parfait pour offrir en cadeau !

productreview.author: Adrian E Milford
productreview.reviewTitle: Freezes and issues with simple images
productreview.review: Using it just for simple JPEGs, the frame would freeze multiple times per day and would need to be unplugged to be reset. For some reason images would fail to load fairly regularly and the frame would just display a black screen for 15 seconds before moving on to another photo. We tried using other memory cards and the flaky operation and regular freezing continued. I returned the frame and will be ordering a different one from someone else. The photo quality and size for the 15" frame were nice, but its not worth the $200 pricetag for the persistent issues

Remote has good coverage simple to use. For the looks i would say its attractive.

productreview.review: Don't buy it.  Random pictures isn't so random.  Same set of pictures show up.  It doesn't matter if it's random or sequence.  Same pictures.  Also, certain pictures, for some reason, are sideways.  If you are running a sequence of pics and you want to go into menu, when you come out of menu, you start at the beginning all over again.  I have a lot of pics and I'll never see the ones towards the end.

productreview.author: Prospect Projects

It is very multifunctional, from watching movies, to listening to music and having music play while it flicks through your pics!! Very happy with this buy and gives my wife and I a chance to see all our photos, rather than them being stored on our phones and laptops

productreview.author: Can-dice
productreview.review: Very impressed with this photo frame I'm excited to give it to my father in law as a gift. He is always taking pictures and then never knows what to do with them. Size is amazing it's big but not crazy to look like a small TV. Comes with all the pieces and a memory card. You can either hang it like a normal picture or it comes with a "leaning stick" Very impressed I want to purchase another for myself

productreview.author: Danomite

Just load up photos, videos and music on a memory card and insert it into the frame, press start and you're ready to view well lit and sharp images.

productreview.author: SinduJT
productreview.review: The perfect digital photo frame to display pictures in a slideshow and with multiple features. Some of these extra features are autorotation, clock, alarm, calendar, plays music and videos. I have multiple videos in different formarts and they can all be played on this digital photo frame without changing the format and saves me time. Great giftable item.

productreview.author: Benoit l.
productreview.review: This review is for the 15" model. The picture frame offers great resolution, the colors are vibrant and the viewing angle is good. I like the fact that it comes with a 32 GB microSD with an adapter to SD so no need to buy separate memory. The only thing I find missing is a random feature i.e. it doesn't play the pictures randomly and since it's a picture frame, I think it should have the features of a picture frame before playing music and videos. The build quality of the remote is very low, it feels like a dollar store gadget, I'm not sure how long it will work. I did not try the music nor the movie features so I have no comment on the sound quality.

productreview.author: kanishka batra
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect digital photo frame with great picture quality
productreview.review: This is a wonderful digital frame with great picture quality. Much better than what I expected. It comes with a 32 gb memory card and remote which is great, so, I didn’t have to buy the card extra. It’s perfect for office table or side table. Because it works with adapter, so, you need to put it close to a socket. All in all great buy at a good price

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Overall i'm impressed but...Wall Hanging sucks
productreview.review: I love the quality of the display. i would like it better if i could keep my pictures in their labeled sub folders but its not a huge issue. It would also be great if i could schedule a on off time based on weekdays vs weekends instead of just by time of day. The wall mounting options does such if you only want to use the hanger holes as there is no template for hanging.

productreview.author: Amazon customer
productreview.review: I returned this frame as the remote did not work and the pictures were blurry. The location of the buttons at the back of the screen made it difficult to use because you can’t see what you’re pressing while looking at the screen. I got this for my parents and they had a difficult time with that aspect. I also found the settings and set-up to complicated. I returned this and got the Nix which is a better fit for me.

productreview.author: Silvaran
productreview.reviewTitle: Product specifications are misrepresenting the actual frame resolution
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. The product listing describes the screen resolution as 1920x1080 and this is absolutely false.  I manually prepared a photo collection with each photo measuring 1920x1080.  The photo frame displayed black bars at the top and bottom, indicating that the resolution is not as advertised. The actual resolution is nowhere to be found in the product description, packaging, or manual, and I'm immensely frustrated at the amount of time and effort I wasted.

productreview.author: HD
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Photo frame is great quality and easy to use. I had to purchase an ad card and download my files onto it. It came with a remote control that I don't really use and store in my drawer. Photos display in loops on an hourly rotation. Overall I am enjoying this product.

productreview.author: Ari
productreview.review: The 1080p screen on this is very sharp and bright, basel is narrow and has no distractions on it, remote control works and is used to turn on/off or set the functions of the frame. I am surprised how good the screen on this is, I bought to return if I dont like the screen quality but it stayed. I highly recommend this

In my previous Digital Photo Frame, I can group my pictures into folders and can select the folder for the slide show. However, this Digital Photo Frame doesn't have that convenient feature. Other than that I am quite happy with this product.

It has a lot of slide shows stored in it that we can use for our pictures, like Clock, Calendar, etc. I did not have to charge it for 2 days. Very good battery. I recommend this digital photo frame.

productreview.author: Martin
productreview.review: Utilisé hier pour la premiere fois avec Foreflight sur Ipad dans un gyrocoptere, le tout a bien fonctionné. Si vous voulez utilisé ceci en aviation, je vous recommanded’acjeter plutot  le DUAL XGPS170D ADS-B / GPS BLUETOOTH TRAFFIC & WEATHER RECEIVER qui vous donnera Dans Foreflight les cartes météo ainsi que la position des avions équipés de transpondeur.

productreview.author: Burni
productreview.review: Small and very easy to use. Very accurate and refresh more than 1 per second. I use it with an Ipad mini 2, tools me 5 minutes to set it up the first time and now it always connect it self alone. Very happy !

productreview.author: Kevin K.
productreview.review: I use this as a navigation tool when sailing, paired to an iPad running Navionics.  It works wonderfully, but the battery life is claimed to be “up to” 8.5 hours... and it has never lasted that long. Another problem I’ve seen is when running any of the anchor watch programs.  After a period of time, it seems the gps unit decides that we’re not moving and stops sending location information despite being left plugged in (see previous mention of battery life).

productreview.author: Ronald Y
productreview.reviewTitle: Works well with iPad and google maps.
productreview.review: I wanted to have a unit that works with Google Maps and my iPad mini in the car and this one really works well.  I have it 'permanently' on the dash board and the Bluetooth connection to my iPad is very reliable.  I don't use the battery on the unit as it is in the car so I just leave it to run down the battery when I turn off the car.  It seems to restart every time and connect immediately. I switched from a stand-alone Garmin to the iPad/google maps approach and think each has its advantages but that is not for discussion here.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: This thing is accurate for a minute, then less accurate than the phone gps, then disconnects with a error box indicating it’s not compatible with iPhone/iPad. Very unreliable and a liability to use. I’d return it, but I’m past amazon’s return date because I naively took it on a 6 week trip. Garbage.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Once charged it is good for the entire day
productreview.review: Although I can use my IPad using ISailor as a backup to my onboard navigation system without additional GPS input, when blue toothed linked to the XGPSA the plotter becomes much more stable and accurate.  I wouldn't be without it!  I can sit on the bridge and monitor my speed, GPS coordinates and plot my course on my IPhone or IPad and know within a 1/2 meter or less where my vessel is.  It matches up perfectly with my on board system that cost well over $7500. Once charged it is good for the entire day. Can't say enough about it.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: works well - rubber holder could be stronger.  It ripped when putting it back in.

productreview.author: Rabbi Goldstein
productreview.reviewTitle: Very disappointing. I returned it to Amazon for refund.
productreview.review: Very disappointing purchase. The first thing I noticed was that the instruction booklet supplied is way out of date. For example, it gives instructions for trying to pair this receiver on android phone using android version 2.0. (Of course today, we are up to version 8). So, how many years have passed since this outdated book that was published? Secondly, it turns out that the receiver itself is not simply plug-and-play, at least on android, but rather requires a separate app to be running at all times on the phone. Of course, using up battery. This so-called helper app, also available on the Google play download, is recommended in the printed manual and also the company's website support section. You would think that at least the online support of the Dual company, could get it together to post an up-to-date instruction manual for this device. But no, it has the exact same PDF version manual which I received, referring to android version 2. Next, on the support website, under this device, it says one must download the helper app from the Google play store. It provides a link. However, clicking on the link, produces a "page not found" error message. So again, I believe there are plenty of indications that the Dual company is not supporting this device by any stretch of imagination. Next, when I manually went to the Google play store and examined the app called Skype Pro GPS,, the reviews are horrible. Nobody likes it. Complaints include freezing locking or crashing of the app, inability to connect devices, etc. Am I seeing a trend here? I think so. Next, I could not get this XGSP150A device to connect to my top of the line android phone (Samsung Galaxy S9+). The device was recognized by Bluetooth and paired, but regardless could not  connect. I also noted a number of Amazon reviews, perhaps mainly by pilots I think, who also complained the receiver has sometimes “disconnected” without warning.  So, what the heck use is a GPS device that you can’t rely on?  Forget it! I spent a good deal of time googling methods for getting this device to work, but, aside from seeing a fair amount of complaints from people who gave up trying and were unsuccessful, the few suggestions I was able to find did not work on my phone. So, here again we have an extra hour wasted of my time. I emailed the company on a Friday, and I do not expect to hear from them at least until next week. Which doesn't do anything for my weekend plans for using this device. So, to make a long story short, I have returned this device for Amazon refund. If you need a GPS device, I would suggest you get something else that is a dedicated GPS device, perhaps a Garmin. But not this “Dual XGPS150A” !!!

productreview.author: Sebastian Ionita
productreview.reviewTitle: Solid product but ... Customer service? Never heard of it...
productreview.review: Received the product, great packaging, great instructions, paired with phone and added to Harrys Lap Timer without any difficulty! Really easy to use. However, it came shipped with the old firmware and upgrading the firmware is impossible. At the current frequency (3Hz) it makes it only slightly more precise than my phone GPS. There seems to be a problem with the required drivers to install the firmware. A problem which I flagged to their customer service which were quick to reply saying it was probably my fault (even though there are quite a lot of forums describing problems with the installation of the Prolific 2303 drivers need to recognize the XGPS). I replied with a very detailed e-mail outlining my steps (on 3 different machines, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 and Windows XP) and I have yet to get a reply. Sent a reminder a week ago without any luck. With the right firmware this would be easily a 5-star product. Very well built and easy to use with the exception of the firmware updates. EDIT: Seems customer service woke up. I will be shipping my GPS back to get one with the proper firmware!

productreview.author: Howard W
productreview.review: Satellite capture is quick and strong. At first, I used the Skyhawk app for Android. This marginally improved GPS navigation but Sygic and CoPilot still jumped around and seemed to get "lost" sometimes. Even though I had mock locations enabled, I wasn't sure that it was working properly. Whenever I launched my navigation app, the GPS icon would still show up in the notification bar on my phone. I suspected I wasn't getting true guidance from the XGPS150A. After a week or so, I switched to Bluetooth GPS to link with the XGPS150A. Navigation was much more smooth with this setup and didn't seem to get "lost". Also, the GPS icon was not visible in the notification bar, which tells me that the phone was not using the built-in GPS, but only the XGPS150A. Much better to use Bluetooth GPS and not the Skyhawk app.

productreview.author: Mars
productreview.reviewTitle: It is a good GPS. Can not set point tracking to a ...
productreview.review: It is a good GPS.  Can not set point tracking to a user controlled setting. e.g.. 1 point per second, per 5 seconds, per 10 sec. 1 point per 5m change, or 10m change etc. Seems sensitive enough, and the high rate of tracking would be nice for high speed driving I suppose, but produces way to many points for normal work usage. Seems fairly accurate.
