products.title: Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker, Black

productreview.author: Gail Di Pietra
productreview.review: I did read reviews that coffee had plastic taste but our first cups were great. Then next morning yep there it was that plastic sort of smell and taste. Was going to return but we finally figured it out!! It’s when the water sits in the reservoir. We get same taste sometimes if water sits in our water jug in fridge. Now we just add the fresh water before we make our cup. No biggy really and I’m glad as it’s very cute and great size for my kitchen.

productreview.author: The Tech Guy
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect Keurig for Smaller Kitchens ... Compact Size - Full Size Performance
productreview.review: This is the Perfect Keurig Machine when counter space is limited. We have a full size Keurig K50 machine at home however the kitchen at our lake cabin is a lot smaller and counter space is at a premium. This Keurig K35 machine is about the same depth as the K50 machine but 30% narrower.  The water reservoir is at the back of the K35 machine instead of the size and is smaller.  You get two full large cups of your favorite beverage before needed to refill the reservoir. If you're having company and need to make several cups of coffee at a time then the full sized Keurig K50 machine is probably a better choice since you will not have to refill the reservoir as often.  If you have a small kitchen and only need to make one or two cups of coffee in the morning and occasionally throughout the day or evening this compact K35 would do the job while saving you counter space.  Other places where the smaller K35 would work best .... apartments, campers, trailers, cottages and anybody who only drinks a couple of cups a coffee a day. Take a look at the pictures.  The Keuring K35 machine similar in size to a large roll of paper towel. Compact Size with Full Size Performance  ...  Highly Recommend.

productreview.author: Anonymous
productreview.reviewTitle: Great taste, great tempurate, great size.
productreview.review: 1 year later: I use this machine every day, up to 3 times a day. I make coffee and tea (no k-cup, just water). I live in an area with hard water. I never use filtered water in my keurig, but I do clean with out with a vinegar+filtered-water solution every 3 months. After over a year, the machine still works great, though it is noisier than when I first got it. I absolutely love this coffee machine! A regular sized Keurig is too big for my counter. This coffee machine makes great tasting coffee super quickly. This one makes coffee that is plenty hot enough for everyone. I love hot coffee so this compact machine perfect for me (my boyfriend doesn't so he actually has to wait for his to cool down!) Some people complained about plastic taste even after running hot water through the machine. What people don't realise, though is that you should take the reservoir out and wash it thoroughly before running hot water through the machine. I did this and had no taste issues.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Makes hot coffee that tastes fine
productreview.review: I can't speak to durability, as I only got this yesterday.  However I was quick to wash the reservoir out with dish liquid, as one previous reviewer had suggested, since there were many complaints that there was a plastic taste.  (Post production grit cannot just be rinsed off - you have to wash it, like you'd wash any dishes.)  I've had a bad experience with a much earlier Keurig model that did not brew hot coffee.  I need my coffee hot, and this is more than sufficient.  I think a hundred bucks is steep for a coffee maker, but as compared to other Keurig models, it was the best price for one that had such high reviews.  The reservoir is a bit of a pain in the arse, being located on the back.  I can't take it in and out to refill very easily, like I could with my old Keurig that had a reservoir on the side, so I have to refill it from glasses of water - but not a deal-breaker.  All in all, happy with my purchase.

productreview.author: Karl A Plesz
productreview.review: My old Keurig K60 finally died after 7 years of almost daily use. I wanted something with a reservoir but it didn't have to be big. This model seemed to suit our needs. This model works just fine. I did notice that the pump is a bit louder than my previous model. It seems to heat up faster, but I can't be sure. Overall, this is great for a couple as the reservoir is really only good enough for 2 big cups of coffee before you'd need to refill it.

productreview.author: Tony
productreview.review: Unfortunately mine had the common problem of plastic taste.. tried to get rid of it but it won’t go away.. had to return it

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I like the fact that it is simple and no-nonsense to operate. 3 months and no problem at all. One small thing... The top edge of the reservoir in the back is shaped like a crescent curved downward. So it is hard to see if the water will overflow during re-fill ... specially hard to see under the kitchen cabinet.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: The Keurig K35 Compact Hot Brewing system was EXACTLY what we were looking for to fit in our apartment; we saved space while still able to receive the perfect coffee within seconds!  I was afraid to choose one of the many versions available, but I now know that this was the perfect match for me!

productreview.author: George H
productreview.review: Warning if you are going to buy "warehouse inspected".. they don't inspect anything The unit came disaligned on casing, I took it apart and put it back correctly. Not it disaligned anymore. Few clips were broke, back water tank doesn't fit properly.. and whole unit was soaked, including inside, which can't be good for any electrical. Makes the strangest noises, (I've heard a keireg and tassimo) it's like it's on its last legs. Not impressed at all.. I won't be buying "warehouse inspected" again.. what a shame.. but I was warned, Soni saved 40$ and got a unit that will likely break within the week

productreview.author: Me
productreview.reviewTitle: Might be a larger appliance than you thought
productreview.review: It turned out to be a lot bigger than I thought it would be! Most of the size is at the back of the machine though, where the water vessel is housed. Pretty easy to use from the box. Remove transport tape, rinse water vessel, do short run-through with water first. Takes 3 minutes for "initial set-up" then so easy to use for coffee! Bought as a gift for my mother. Uses same Keurig  pods that my other Keurig machine at home uses. Easy and makes great coffee fast!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Keurig makes sub standard coffee machines
productreview.review: I ordered a Keurig coffee maker that was exactly like the last one I had (which wouldn't allow me to press the brew buttons). When I received the new Keurig, it looked exactly the same as the last one, but it would not allow me to use the reusable coffee filter pods which I had used in the previous one. I have had to buy at least 4 or 5 Keurigs in the past 5 years - they do not last long, but I love the idea of having a fresh cup of coffee each time... It seems to me that Keurig purposely changes their machines so that you can not use parts/filters from previous ones. They just want to make money, not satisfy the public. I will no longer buy any Keurig machine - very disappointed!

productreview.author: Valentina Steigenga
productreview.reviewTitle: Works perfect for family of two people!
productreview.review: I read a lot of reviews before I bought it. Some reviews were positive, some negative. We have a small kitchen downstairs and haven't had a coffee machine there and when we spend time there watching TV or working at the computer we always run upstairs to get a cup of coffee.  So, when I saw this coffee machine I was sure it was exactly what we needed for family of two people. And it works perfect for us. It is small but enough for two cups of coffee and it fits our small kitchen. Some people wrote that it was a plastic smell, but we rinse it as instruction said and there isn't any small. We are pleased, satisfied and love our small coffee machine.

productreview.author: Darcy Grant
productreview.review: I purchased the machine for my office. After the first use, water was leaking from the base and created a huge mess. Amazon customer service was helpful and put me in touch with a Keurig customer representative. On the phone they said all the right things but when it came down to replacing my machine while still under warranty, they made it incredibly difficult to get a new one. Excercise caution when buying Keurig. I have yet to receive my replacement.

productreview.author: Jennifer L.
productreview.review: I am a casual coffee drinker and this has lasted me a couple years now.  It's a good smaller compact machine and doesn't seem to take much room in my limited space kitchen.  I can get about 3 or 4 large cups from a tank of water.  I use a stainless steel reusable Kcup with it for sustainable options and I love this system.

productreview.author: Marie
productreview.review: Honestly...have you ever gone days without coffee? I did...2 to be exact. When my coffee maker (not a Keurig) decided it was over worked and underpaid, much like myself, it decided to quit. Luckily, I found this beauty on sale and it was at my door step only 2 days after ordering. It's gorgeous and makes an amazing cup of coffee. I can now safely leave my home.

productreview.author: Freddy2Dogs
productreview.reviewTitle: Who really knows how coffee is made ?
productreview.review: I love this machine.  Fits on your counter, 4 buttons, easy to use, no extra krap.  Push start get coffee.  Who has the time to set up all that equipment, boil water, find filters and a spoon to scoop out a mystery amount of coffee grounds and get a mystery cup of coffee ?  I love that this has a large water tank.  The future has arrived.  Get this. You'll be glad you did.

productreview.author: Isherlaufer
productreview.review: After almost 10 years, I had to retire my original Keurig brewer for my office and this was the replacement. It has a couple of improvements that I like - it heats up faster than the predecessor. Also, I like that once I drop the K-Cup in, I can select my brew size while it's heating up. The water tank is a bit smaller than my previous Keurig, but I've just learned to fill  a separate jug with water to lower the number of times I have to go fill up the tank. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase.

productreview.author: None
productreview.review: Wéve purchase two at differing times.. Beware as they can cause a instantaneous fire.  The first one burnt our outlets by overheating and luckily the power surge tripped.  The second started to boil on it’s own (never put it on).  Luckily it happened while we were watching TV.  Other reviews on line mention the same.  These should be pulled from the market.

productreview.author: holly
productreview.review: I got my keurig 4 months ago but held off writing a review until I knew how it held up. The plastic taste people are talking about, you don't get that if you don't leave your water sitting in the machine.Only a minor inconvience. I have cleaned mine twice in the 4 months in which I have owned it and it still gets louder and louder.Tho I do like the convience of using the kcups

productreview.author: Brad
productreview.reviewTitle: Can't really complain much for my first Keurig machine
productreview.review: Being my first Keurig, I really do like it. It does what i want it to do, and doesn't make a mess doing it, but my only complaint, and the only reason it gets 4 stars out of 5 is it does feel cheap. The handle you use to lift the top and press it down is plastic, not metal, and I worry about putting too much pressure on it and it breaking. If it was given a metal handle then it would be much better.

productreview.author: Tovah
productreview.review: Nespresso broke down and I can’t go get fixed but I’ve stopped drinking coffee so hubby was never more happy to spend money as he loves Keurig more than anything....including me some mornings! Works great and we used to have the big silver/stainless one waaaayyyyyy back but this has all the bells and whistles and instant hot water for tea. It’s a great machine at a great price and good warranty. I personally still love my Nespresso but since I’m not drinking coffee anymore , I can’t argue. He’s happy, I’m happy.....now...I think diamond earrings are on sale.....

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I receieved it on time, the packaging was really well made. I am super happy with this keurig machine, it took two seconds to set it up. I have not tried it yet, although I will tomorrow! I'm sure it won't be a disappointment. I love this machine it's really well made , perfect size doesn't take a lot of room on the counter. It's honestly perfect and the price is a steal!

productreview.author: The Feeling of Beauty
productreview.review: Love Love Love it! My old coffee maker kicked the bucket, love that I can make just one cup at a time, fresh hot cup every time. Some people complained about a plastic taste, I however didn't have this, probably because I washed it before using it for the first time.

productreview.author: M. S.
productreview.review: I bought this so I would stop with the expensive coffee orders 2-3 times a day.  I knew that the Keurig coffee makers didn’t last very long, but I was hoping I’d at least get a couple years out of it. I purchased this less than 8 months ago and it has already met its untimely death.

productreview.author: BCRON
productreview.reviewTitle: Purchased in late May Quite working September 16 Very Poor Value
productreview.review: This Keurig was a replacement for a previous model that was bigger and had lasted for over 4 years.  Cost of owning previous unit $3.25 per month the unit of this review $25.71 per month.  Only one coffee drinker used and although made very good coffee while working.  This short life span will have me looking for an alterative product.

productreview.author: Derek Gagnier
productreview.review: When I first bought this frother I was really impressed as it frothed well - just as well as my Nespresso unit at home. No longer. It does still frother but nowhere near as much so I'm returning it and buying another Nespresso (this is for my office). Sometimes the old adage "you get what you pay for" really is true. Seems to be applicable in this instance for sure.

productreview.author: Welsh One
productreview.review: I have been using a Tassimo coffee maker for over 10 years.  My latest one is slowly going down hill, so  I tried to obtain a new Tassimo.  THEY DON'T MAKE THEM ANYMORE.  I don't like change but I was forced to switch to  Keurng and you know what - I like it.  Have only used it for a day or so but I like it.

productreview.author: marie-michèle
productreview.review: Très satisfaite de mon achat. À la base je l’ai acheté pour remplacer ma tassimo qui n’avait pas l’option de filtre réutilisable et je ne regrette pas du tout mon choix en plus d’en avoir plus pour mon argent avec les sacs de grains. Le café est excellent et chaud et le format est parfait pour ne pas encombrer le comptoir! Seule chose est qu’un réservoir est bon pour environ deux cafés il faut donc la remplir souvent, ce qui pour moi n’est pas un problème.

productreview.author: Steve Lachance
productreview.review: for the price, its perfect. there are so many flavours to choose from, the hot chocolate was a major + for my kids. I would buy it again.... you cant go wrong with kieurig (not sure about the spelling) :)

productreview.author: Catherine Head
productreview.review: I bought this Keurig for my other half who likes his cup of java each day.  I , am a tea drinker so wanted something that didn't dominate the counter top.  This one seemed to meet our needs.  It is simple to use and my other half is impressed by how fast the coffee is made. My one issue with this item is finding refillable K cups for this machine.  I have been searching high and low to find reusable cups for this model.. K-35. There are refillable cups for the hundred other Keurig machines but not this compact model.

productreview.author: MEM
productreview.review: Encore trop grosse pour ce quel fais... bug toujours une fois sur deux elle ne réchauffe pas l’eau ou dois prend 4/5 essaie avant d’avaler l’eau d’un coup... très décevant... à éviter !

productreview.author: AZ
productreview.review: Since i have been working from home full time now, i caved in and bought this coffee maker. It is the same brand my office was using but in a newer model. I have used it for a whole month now, other than it is a bit loud when the water was heating up, everything else is prefect! It makes coffee super fast and I enjoy my morning coffee every day now thanks to this! Also don’t need to run out and buy a coffee save lots of time! Definitely will recommend to those who are now working from home :)

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I took advice from another review and washed the reservoir with hot water and dish soap before brewing coffee, no plastic taste at all.  The unit is compact and brews a nice, fresh, HOT cup of coffee.  I am very pleased and would recommend this brewer.

productreview.author: Anne Fletcher
productreview.reviewTitle: Not really happy with this model
productreview.review: It looks great but the water holder is light plastic type material and you have to be careful with replacing it every time you clean. I got what I paid for!

productreview.author: Randy DeJong
productreview.review: Had the same model that purchased at a local supplier.  It crapped out, so ended up buying this one off Amazon.  After using it, realized that this one worked so much better from the last one.  The last one must of had a flaw, and that is why it broke.  This new one is smooth and easy to use.

productreview.author: Debby
productreview.review: Had keurig machine delivered on June 2/20 and stopped working on July 26/20!  Have talked to keurig and it will be approximately two weeks to get a replacement! I will have spent the price of the coffeemaker at Tim Horton’s by that time! 🤬

productreview.author: Ryan T
productreview.review: Amazon has great deals! Picked this up on a daily deal and it works great. Kureig products always do work well so it’s no surprise there but it’s always nice to save a bit of money. Heats up quickly, and brews a nice cup of coffee. Grab some reusable pods if you want to reduce your waste footprint. There are some great ones on here as well. All in all very happy with this machine

productreview.author: moogle
productreview.review: Got this for my mom after her Tassimo died, which she loved but they are no longer available in Canada. Mom is quite happy with this Keurig. She lives in a residence and doesn't have much space but this very compact and easy to use. She's been using it for a month so far and no complaints (and trust me, she'd let me know what f there was anything to complain about!)

productreview.author: Nancy
productreview.review: This is a great coffee maker. My husband uses it twice a day and we have had it for months no with no issues. We started with the single Keurig maker and it lasted 6 weeks. We bought another one and it also lasted 6 weeks so we were reluctant to buy another one. This larger , better made one has been great. It is quick and not too noisy.

productreview.author: Sam B.
productreview.reviewTitle: A Really well designed instant/brewing, single cup coffee maker!
productreview.review: I bought this a little while ago. It is very easy to use, looks great and the coffee pods brew great coffee pretty quickly and cleanly for that matter;  also the water resouvoir refills nicely with my Brita water filter... I  think that it is an overall, very-well designed product! Thanks!

productreview.author: I. M. Annie
productreview.review: This is the 3rd Keurig I’ve bought.  Each time they were around 100 bucks and each one was not quite as good as the last one.  This one has a small reservoir and overall seems more clunky when using.  The water is definitely hotter then my last one and you do get a “decent” cup of coffee from it.  I noticed lately it went on sale for 60.00 which is where a fair price point should be.

productreview.author: BK
productreview.review: For me the K-Cup brewing method seems to be the best to get exactly one cup of freshly brewed (not espresso pressed) coffee. On my last Canada trip I ordered the machine to be sent to my hotel. Everything went fine. AND: Appreciation to Amazon Canada for billing and accounting everything to my German Amazon account without loosing money by currency conversion. Great thing. To be improved: I am Amazon prime member in Germany. I was obviously not Canadian prime member, had to make a free trial membership. Why am I not "worldwide" member ?  And sorry for not rating "durability". Ask me in 10 years.

productreview.author: Allison
productreview.review: I bought this as an Amazon Warehouse item saving about $10. It was 100% brand new, product was still had all manufacturer packaging, outside box had just been retaped. Keurig works amazing and not a single scratch or dent on the actual item. Works 100% perfect! I highly reccomend checking out the Amazon Warehouse deals before paying full price!

productreview.author: Cruz Bonner
productreview.reviewTitle: Turned out pretty dependable after all
productreview.review: Well it worked great for 7 months but then quit, I suspect using those coffee ground adapters put too much strain on it, or it got wet or something as all the lights stay lit constantly. Avoid adapters and I suspect you would be fine, coffee comes out pretty hot too, but if you put it in a cold cup w cold spoon and drown it in creamer it will likely get cold, like all coffee does, as the laws of thermodynamics still apply. This was used fairly regularly at least 10 or more times a day for around 7 months, so I guess that is acceptable. EDIT: It came back to life! long live Keurig!

productreview.author: Jessica
productreview.review: Really enjoying all the different styles of hot beverages available. Coffee (of course), tea, latte, hot chocolate, and all those with flavors as well. I will definitely have a hot drink to keep me warm on the cold winter days. The machine takes up very little room on my counter. Makes a cup within minutes that is nice and hot. Do not regret this purchase for myself.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: The one I got seems to be defective ; It has three settings depending on the size of coffee cup one desires but even at the largest setting it only fills an average coffee cup 3/4 full.. I’m thinking of selling a bag

productreview.author: moxy1948
productreview.review: after 15 years my Tassimo died could not find another to I had to settle for Keurig It's not made as well a little flimsy have yet to find a coffee that I like yes I would buy it again if I could not find a Tassimo

productreview.author: Tan
productreview.review: Felt like I was always filling up the water tank and I don’t like that it doesn’t light up to let you know when it’s ready to be used

productreview.author: Dennis S Hurd
productreview.reviewTitle: Really Glad I Made this Purchase
productreview.review: I came to K-Cups a little late but the switch over has been a life-changer.  I do need and also reusuable pods.  I cannot imagine going back to the old days of brewing a pot.  Having a selection of different flavours for guests is nice.  The size is perfect for our limited counter space.

productreview.author: Tisha
productreview.review: Stopped working after 45 days!!!! Had to buy it from Costco again and even that stopped working after a few months. I finally stopped using keurig and have now switched to French press.

productreview.author: Jph4375
productreview.review: I don't know why it asked me to rate the 'thickness' of it.. but okay.  I've always wanted a keurig and this is a great option. It works well, I make coffee, hot chocolate and tea. I just run a hot water rinse between them so no flavour transfer and works great. Love it.

productreview.author: G
productreview.review: low end machine, pay more get more . water tank to small for me .

productreview.author: Miranda Grant
productreview.review: The keurig coffee maker is perfect I wish it was more adorable it’s very expensive but I am impressed with it so far it’s working pretty well it’s good quality. It’s simple to use very straightforward it’s just a bit pricy but you get what you pay for with it is definitely worth it

productreview.author: Caitlin DelBello
productreview.review: Not as compact as you would expect a "Compact" Keurig to be. But it does have a very compact washer reservoir. It needs to be filled after 2 cups. And it's max size for a cup of coffee is only 10oz. So it definitely isn't great or impressive, but it does make good coffee (because I buy good k-cups) quickly when I'm trying to get out the door at 6AM, so... I give it a solid "it's more convenient than the French press".

productreview.author: Jordan Fortier
productreview.review: I really like this coffee maker - it doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, but it works consistently and reliably, delivering great coffee every time. I'm a new Keurig user - this unit stopped once, and we called support and learned that we weren't cleaning it properly.  They were super nice and walked us through the 3 minute cleaning process and got us caffeinated again. I love the colour, and would buy this again.

productreview.author: Maria
productreview.reviewTitle: Love my Keurig. Got the red one
productreview.review: Love my keurig. I got it during a one day sale during boxing week so it was a great deal! It is really easy to use and clean. I bought the reusable filter so I can use my own type of coffee.

productreview.author: DC
productreview.reviewTitle: Compact, no frills model. Needs smaller cup size.
productreview.review: This model can pour 3 sizes of coffee, the smallest being 6 oz. or 3/4 cup. The portions are too large in my opinion - it won’t pour you an espresso sized cup. Sometimes the volume of water poured changes suddenly, but turning the machine off and on corrected this. Seems to have a computer problem.

productreview.author: Phil
productreview.review: Need help. Bought this machine and was getting a burning plastic taste. Do returned it and got another one. Tried it at home and worked great . Brought it to work this morning and it won't turn on . Lights just keep blinking. unplugged  it a few times still not coming on or heating up

productreview.author: Chantal Bisson
productreview.review: Elle va très bien et mon café est délicieux. Seul problème quand je prend une canne de café et que j'utilise le cup j'ai une trasse de café dans le fond.

productreview.author: Fat Steve
productreview.review: Reservoir is in back and hard to reach.  Brew is weak.  Not impressed so I returned.

products.title: POWER A MOGA Pro Power - Electronic Games

productreview.author: TJ
productreview.reviewTitle: Scam, should be removed from Amazon.
productreview.review: This no longer works.  I bought it and was all excited to use it.  Feels like good quality but one major catch: it will not connect with new phones and requires an app to do so which has been removed from the Google play app store. There is no way to connect it and it is a hoax.  I'm returning this and you should not buy this.  Run, this is a complete scam and is very frustrating.  I work in a major game studio and know what I'm talking about.

productreview.author: deviantintegral
productreview.reviewTitle: I purchased this controller a year and a half ago ...
productreview.review: I purchased this controller a year and a half ago, and only lightly used it. At some point, it started sending inputs from the right joystick whenever I move the _left_ joystick, making most games unplayable. The controller was sold with a 2 year warranty, but I've been unable to get a real response from the company. The phone number listed in the manual is disconnected. I've filed several support tickets with PowerA, and they keep deleting them! Phone support was no help either.

productreview.author: Chris M
productreview.reviewTitle: Decent, but I've had some problems
productreview.review: I've had this for a while and it's a decent controller with some issues for me.  The controls feel a bit stiff for my liking and don't have the refined feel you get from a Xbox or Playstation controller but I have little worry that this controller will break.  It feels solid, and it has a pretty good built-in battery so you can actually use it for a while.  I did find it difficult to actually get it connected to my phone at times, and I had some issues occasionally in some games with delayed input and sometimes the controller would completely stop working.  This could all be my phone, and I've had it work great for me sometimes as well, so who knows.

productreview.author: Reagan M.
productreview.reviewTitle: Very Nice and Responsive. App and Manual Useless.
productreview.review: Bought this to use with my Android and love it. It can be top heavy if you're playing with the phone in the holder. I usually set my hands on my knees to avoid fatigue. Very responsive, love the joystick movement. Not entirely sure what the app is for, it literally does nothing. When you open it it just gives you some controller mapping options and a list of the games you want to use it for. But you can usually do the same thing Inside games with controller support. The instructions that some with it are meh. Basically, the main things to know is; Bluetooth (flashing buttons = connecting, solid button = connected); pressing the battery button beside the charging LED will display your charge level; and the flashing battery LED means it's plugged in. It won't tell you if it's done charging. Still don't know what A and B mean on the Off Switch. Highly recommend for Android gamers.

productreview.author: Eric
productreview.review: I've had the Power A MOGA Pro Power controller for a little over a month and thus far I've been pretty happy with it. First the bad stuff; I've had some issues with the controller pairing with my phone (OnePlus 6) and for some reason when I turn the controller on by flipping the switch to the left, the A side, it won't pair. But when I flip it right, the B side, it works fine. It also seems to sometimes have problems pairing to my phone. But that's not often. The controller also feels a tiny bit too wide, but it's such a minor complaint. The good is it's a pretty quality build. The buttons, triggers, analog sticks and d-pad all feel good. I'm actually surprised by how good the buttons feel; they're not quite at an Xbox One controllers level of comfort and quality but it's close. I'm using it right now to play Hexen and Doom on an N64 emulator and it's fantastic. Everything is responsive and buttons map to the emulator without issue. The built in battery is without a doubt worth the higher price. Charging your phone from the controller is great. It won't charge it super fast, but it gets the job done. I was skeptical when I first decided to buy this controller, but I'm very satisfied with it. If you're like me and mostly just want to use it for emulators I think it's a great choice. It works well with the GC emulator; N64, PS1, all work great. If it didn't have the pairing issues I probably would have given this a 5 star, but it's pretty close to it.

productreview.author: S. Hetu
productreview.review: I bought this controller in 2016 and only played with it a couple times until recently, when I started using it for 3-4 hours a week, but after about 2-3 weeks the left joystick started going. It was sending inputs to my device as if pressed to the right. According to someone on the internet, making circles with it and turning off and on the controller would fix it, which it did, but only for a couple minutes. This issue makes it unusable as characters or cars in game keep going right when the joystick is centered. The warranty was still valid so I contacted support through their website on multiple occasions but they never got back to me. There is no phone number that I can find to call them so I'm out of luck. I can't tell if I simply got a bad unit as this looked like a quality product at first, but one thing it for sure it's worth nothing now if I can't even get a repair or replacement under warranty. Instead of this product, I bought an Xbox One S (bluetooth) controller and a phone holder, both sold on Amazon. And now my controller also works natively on the computer. It's worth noting that the games that will be compatible on Android with the Xbox controller versus the Moga may vary... and phones as well, but I've personally been using it to play computer games over the Steam Link application and that works beautifully.

productreview.author: Joshua Wood
productreview.reviewTitle: Well built, but lacks app support
productreview.review: Controller arrived on time and was well packaged.  I was surprised at how solid the controller felt, it feels well built.  Connection to my phone was easy.  This would be a 5 star review if it wasn't for the fact that there is no current app by Moga.  Unless a game has built in support for a controller, you will be unable to use this without rooting your phone and using third party apps.  A real shame, because this is a solid piece of hardware and is largely unusable.

productreview.author: Andrew W Baker
productreview.review: When I flip this open in front of people and start paying retro games on my phone, they go ballistic and everyone wants one.  A bit short on range to my TV but thats likely the BT receiver.  Has built in charger which is a bonus, stays charged for a long time. Feels ok in hands but I think the A B X Y buttons are reversed by default on some games using snes emu.  All in all, great for the price! Some reviews state that the Moga software won't work on Android Marshmellow (6.01) I can confirm they've udpated apps in the app store and this device will work in both bluetooth modes A and B

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Like an Xbox 360 controller for your smartphone.  Does exactly what I need it to do.
productreview.review: Have used this a little bit over the past few months, I'm not much of a portable gamer but I wanted something for when I'm going to be away from my other games for a while.  Can't give a durability report, but in terms of comfort and functionality I can say it's quite good.  The Moga App is basically useless for anything other than connecting in Mode A, hence -1 star, but the controller itself is great. I use it on a big Moto X Play phone and the holder accommodates it with ease and holds it snugly.  Buttons all feel great, and battery life seems good (haven't tried charging my phone with the controller, since my phone requires a lot of juice from the wall adapter).  Controller is very comfortable in the hands if you like Xbox 360 controllers. Last but not least, game compatibility is hit and miss, which is to be expected on Android.  Many games will work in Mode B because it either naturally accepts it, or controls can be reassigned in game menus, example: Modern Combat 5.  Mode A will work in some games, but without Moga App support, 90% of the time you'll be using Mode B  (HID).  Mode B doesn't require the Moga App at all, just hooks up with Bluetooth.  Mode A requires the app, otherwise I wouldn't have it. Overall, I recommend this product, it's great for retro / entry level / casual Android gamers like me who hate getting stuck with touchscreens and cramped hands.  By the way Moga, thanks for adding Mode B!

productreview.author: Rick
productreview.review: Absolutely phenomenal device. It's xbox style layout is perfect, even for someone used to playstation style gamepad this one feels good and holds my Samsung s7 snug. Very comfortable to play long hours with, still change how you look at mobile gaming permanently. With built in battery ignore all others that use throw away batteries you can even plug your phone into this one comes with a small wire from gamepad to phone and a longer one to connect the gamepad to a charger. Included was a stand for tablet players. 5 stars, will buy more as gifts, perfectly priced.

productreview.author: Adrian
productreview.review: Good construction. The buttons and sticks are bit noisy, but they're solid. Connectivity with my note 8 is flawless. D-pad doesn't pop as much as I'd like, but it still works well. There seems to be a tiny bit of input lag when I have wifi on, but turned off it seems a tiny bit better. It's overall not really noticeable unless you are trying to play on a tv that it itself has input lag. The lag is not necessarily the controller's fault, though. One gripe I have with this controller, and the reason for it losing a star, is that the flip-up latch that holds the phone isn't as stable as I'd like. It will occasionally fall; my phone's weight with case on is heavy enough that it will cause it to fold onto my fingers while playing. This happens regularly if I tilt the controller toward me too far, or I am playing on my back. If there was a way to lock it in place it would be perfect.

productreview.author: Alan
productreview.review: Unfortunately, the core product arrives DOA. The supporting software no longer exists. The pamphlets inside warn you not to use half of the settings on the controller. It's a shame as this is clearly a well designed product.... It just no longer functions the way it was designed to. Incompatible with major mobile titles such as Fortnite for Android also. Quite frankly, I'm shocked it's " Amazon's choice" when it's not functional.

productreview.author: Louis
productreview.reviewTitle: Excellent controller (Just make sure to use 'B' mode!)
productreview.review: This controller is fantastic! I always loved the Xbox 360/One controller design (which this clearly emulates) so it feels very natural to use. I use it in conjunction with my Samsung Galaxy S7 to play emulators, as well as playing games like Minecraft in virtual reality with my Gear VR. The aforementioned ease of use is especially important in VR when you can't easily look down at the controller (without removing the headset)! The controller itself has all the buttons you'd expect, even including L3 and R3 (ie: the analog sticks click in to act as a button). The buttons and d-pad feel rather 'clicky', which is a double edged sword; it's nice to have the tactile response, but in practice it can be a little loud when the action gets heated. The analog sticks are excellent, and the triggers, while just a shade less satisfying than the Xbox versions, are responsive and have a nice amount of 'travel'. The battery is huge, and still shows full charge after I've used the controller for quite a few hours. (Full disclosure: I'm still on my first charge, and, while it's a welcome option to have, I haven't yet attempted to charge my phone via the controller battery.) Word to the wise: Never put the controller in 'A' configuration (even though the instructions will tell you otherwise). To the unaware, the controller lets you turn it on in either 'A' or 'B' mode. The former is supposed to be used in conjunction with an app, which has limited support (and, from what I've heard, is no longer being updated). The latter is just a standard Bluetooth controller mode, which has been 100% compatible with everything I've tried. I've seen a lot of people complain about the controller, when all their issues would be resolved if they just used the 'B' configuration. Ultimately, although I initially thought this controller was a bit on the expensive side, I now see it to be worth every penny. Definitely pick it up if you're looking for console-quality Bluetooth controller.

productreview.author: Jolan Sergerie-Jeannotte
productreview.review: For a mobile controller, it is really great.  Works great with my Galaxy S7 and my emulators without needing to use their app. Works also great on my linux laptop with Steam games (tho it needed some configuration on Steam).  Didn't try it on my desktop as I have a wired controller. Great battery life, as a life saver feature where it turns itself off when not used for a time and it can be used as a power bank.

productreview.author: Geoffrey J.
productreview.review: Works great for my Samsung Galaxy S6 phone. I use it for my "Gear VR" and haven't had a problem with any games yet!! Just make sure you put it to "Mode B" The battery life is amazing on it too, I can even charge my phone from it when getting low while playing VR games!!! Definitely get this controller for the Samsung Gear VR!!!

productreview.author: Takabay
productreview.review: this game controller is awesome battery life is amazing I like how they have some ports on the back so you could charge your phone and your controller great finger exercise honestly because likes the right trigger and left are kinda stif and it is kinda tiring to hold it so it's like a finger workout but you would get use to it. you don't need the app if you want to use the app you could go to aptido and get the app there and battery life is so good like you don't need a charges the controller for like 3 or 4 days sorry not good at english

productreview.author: James
productreview.review: It's a good product, but I really regret buying this. The controller feels comfortable and it connected easily to my phone, but the moment I started playing a game I could feel massive amounts of input lag. I could play the game but the lag was just unbearable. I know input lag is common with these wireless controllers, but this was my first time using one and I just couldn't stand it.

productreview.author: Ryan Crouse
productreview.review: I have only owned it for a few days, but so far so good! It's a solid build and does what you want it to do. When turn on, use "B" as "A" does not work. I didn't even install the app as suggested, just turned on the Bluetooth on my Samsung s9 and the connection was instant. Works great for Dungeon Hunter 5 :)

productreview.author: Kyle
productreview.reviewTitle: Unfortunately it doesn't have USB-OTG support and the Bluetooth suffers from pretty bad delays even when it's right next to the ...
productreview.review: The controller feels solid, and if I could I would actually use this on other consoles. Unfortunately it doesn't have USB-OTG support and the Bluetooth suffers from pretty bad delays even when it's right next to the device I'm using. The software appears to have been abandoned but if you REALLY need a full sized wireless Android gaming controller, this will do the job. Just keep in mind, it does have delay.

productreview.author: Aaron
productreview.reviewTitle: Outdated Software that isn't compatible and won't be updated
productreview.review: You can use this controller as a standard HID device, but the only reason why I would buy this over another controller is to use it with "MOGA" compatible games, to which you can't even get the app anymore and you have to download it off of a 3rd party website to even use it as an HID device. I don't know why this is still even being sold when MOGA isn't even a thing anymore.

productreview.author: PersonBuyingStuff
productreview.reviewTitle: Driver support non-existent, HID mode only half functional (triggers do not work). Cheaper controllers like BEBONCOOL better.
productreview.review: When the cheaper BEBONCOOL controllers fully support all applications and do it for less money you know this controller is a bad deal. I've only given it two stars because the controller is legitimately very nice, which is why it's such a shame that the drivers are awful and nearly useless. It didn't matter what 3rd party apps I tried to use to get my S7 Edge to recognize the triggers, nothing worked. Get a BEBONCOOL instead, it may not be as nice (though still pretty decent build quality), but at least you know it'll work in all circumstances.

productreview.author: navin Rai
productreview.review: I was looking for a controller to use alongside my Gear VR headset. The options that Samsung recommends is either their controller, the Steel Series Stratus XL, or this one. This has the edge in my books. It is the size of a PC/console controller and is therefore comfortable. The flip to hold your phone comes in super handy when playing emulator games, etc. The fact you can charge your phone from it is a bonus, making it a 2-for-1 and handy for travelers who get bored in airports. None of the others have these mix of features. Drawbacks: for my taste it's a bit light and I wish it came in more colours. It doesn't fit comfortably in a pocket. Overall assessment - good quality, a has multiple uses, and is a bit cheaper than some alternatives.

productreview.author: Evan Prentice
productreview.reviewTitle: The Moga app is meh at best. The documentation is also meh at best
productreview.review: This is so mixed. It works well, when it works with a game. The Moga app is meh at best. The documentation is also meh at best. It holds the phone firmly, and the battery life is great. Charge times are fine. The build quality is mid range, but solid enough. I'm not a fan of the glossy plastic, and would have liked a more textured / softer grip, but ergonomics are also fine. I've had problems with mappings, and analogues behaving like digital pads. Overall it works, but requires some effort.

productreview.author: Canuckle
productreview.reviewTitle: it's really sad. I'm better off taking a PS3 controller
productreview.review: Not impressed really.  Finicky bluetooth connection that sometimes drops.  Tried relegating it to my shield tv for some multiplayer mayhem, and takes forever to connect, drops connection frequently...it's really sad. I'm better off taking a PS3 controller, connecting it wired to my Shield TV, and using it.  Works WAY better, and the usb connections I have are shoddy.

productreview.author: JF
productreview.review: Amazing product honestly. I use it to play with my Gear VR and to play emulators on my S6. The clamp is big enough to accomodate my phone. Can't see any negatives with this gamepad. The only thing I would have preferred is to have AA batteries, because with eneloops they can be easily and rapidly swapped, but that's just me. Overall great product.

productreview.author: Jhevon
productreview.review: Feels remarkably close to an Xbox controller. The spring loaded triggers take some wearing into but still provide emense accuracy. While playing graphic heavy games such as Minecraft, Grand Theft Auto or Need for Speed, the controller doesn't quite give enough power to charge my LG G5 but rather keeps the phone at its current percentage. If the phone stays in standby the controller will charge your device.

productreview.author: Jacinthe de-Chevigny
productreview.review: It worked fine the first time I switched it on, and during that time, it was a perfectly adequate controller, with good thumbsticks and analog controls which made my mobile racing games feel much better to play. Sadly, once I had turned it off, it would never turn back on again, no matter what I tried with recharging the battery. Only got one use out of it before it completely died and I returned it.

productreview.author: Jose Fernandez de Castro
productreview.review: But like many people report, this has issues with the left stick reporting and up/right pull constantly. Makes the controller unusable. Company does not reply to warranty requests.

productreview.author: TeeJay
productreview.reviewTitle: Good build, easy to use, worked with several apps with no set up
productreview.review: Great product. Controller has a good weight to it. Build quality is good and feels great. Basically no set up required. Battery lasts a long time and chargers my phone well. I used to to play a ROM of Pokemon diamond with the DraStic Gameboy DS emulator and it worked perfectly. Also used it the FF9 android app and it worked perfectly including the joysticks. Took a few minutes to remap the controls in the game but had worked great since. Would highly reccomend.

productreview.author: Tom
productreview.review: I love the idea that the mount for the phone can be folded in when not in use, for playing on a Android TV or tablet when not mounted. The build quality is feels really good,  and the ability to charge your phone while playing is just amazing. This is easily the best Android Controller I've used.  I highly recommend it to others.

productreview.author: FreakishOneYT
productreview.review: It's a great Bluetooth controller l if you do any mobile gaming. The incontroller phone holder is very strong. It's easy to sync. It's got some uncomfortable hard edges, but I still love it.

productreview.author: Matt
productreview.reviewTitle: Button sticking after moderate use; unfit for serious play
productreview.review: Y button sticking after a few hundred hours. Not unusable, but makes precision play frustrating, and I just decide not to play instead. Dual connection mode system is confusing to boot. All in all, unimpressed.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Devs pulled the software rendering this useless
productreview.review: Controller requires the MOGA Pivot app to work, which was pulled from Googleplay and Apple stores and the website sends you to a dead link. Not. Compatible with any games I've tried that have controller support. DO NOT BUY THIS CONTROLLER. This shouldn't even be available to buy if the required software is discontinued.

productreview.author: Masters2150
productreview.review: Works great as it's supposed to but two major issues. One is that mode a, the official moga mode for their app and games, my 0hone just won't connect. But mode b, just input and and app that supports game pads works fine. While this may be my phone, it's been two weeks and Moga support still hasn't responded. If they respond and it's my phone, I'll change the rating. Until then 3 stars.

productreview.author: GuiltyOne
productreview.reviewTitle: Fun to use but all in all in A HEADACHE
productreview.review: I like this controller.... The only thing that sucks is the company MOGA is no longer in business and the L2/R2 bumper pads tend to come apart inside the controller.... So I have to open it up and that's a hassle and a half cuz the screws they use are of a type I've never seen before and it's almost impossible to find a screwdriver for them

productreview.author: Tony T.
productreview.review: Works well with my lg stylo 2 plus. Excellent with emulators nes, sega, snes little slow with the psp because of the phone not by the controller. Battery really good and controls are smooth. Playing ff crisis core psp for the 1st time and hope to finish it and go to my other games.

productreview.author: colin
productreview.review: I bought this controller to use with my samsung gear vr. After some research it seemed this was defintley one of the best options out there for it and although I came across the occasional forum where someone was comlaining of compatibility issues I've never had any such issues myself. If you do intend to use it for the gear vr always have the controller in its B mode setting as the A mode setting is intended for moga pro games and usually wont work. That is where alot of peoples problems arise with compatability and its a very simple fix.

productreview.author: Artur
productreview.reviewTitle: Most of the games work perfectly
productreview.review: Already have it for half year and it's very good device, however not all games work.  Some games just are not compatible with joysticks. I use octopus app to map keys to the screen for some games.

productreview.author: ROXY
productreview.reviewTitle: its not bad, took me some time to get it properly ...
productreview.review: its not bad, took me some time to get it properly setup with emulator. However, one negative thing i would like to point out is that keys are pretty loud when you press on them, might be because its new.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Bought for play VR games with a Galaxy S7.  Works like a charm.  Good weight, well made and feels good in the hand.  It's thinner that an Xbox controller, but it will defiantly feel familiar to you if that's what you use  The fact that it can charge your phone is a huge bonus.

productreview.author: Craig Robichaud
productreview.reviewTitle: Awesome for Android Gaming (works amazing for KOTOR)
productreview.review: I've had this for about a week now, and so far I love it! I got it specifically because I recently discovered KOTOR was available on Android, but with newer Samsung phones that offer Bluetooth HID support, this controller works awesome! I haven't tried a ton of games, but it works on most apps and the OS too. I got it the next day, and everything was packaged nicely. Great experience.

productreview.author: Myles Cullen
productreview.review: Using this with the Samsung Gear VR and Note 5. Works perfectly and delivers a great feature set. Can't be used with every software title,  but still awesome. Love that it's also a charger for your device.  The included tablet stand is a great accessory.

productreview.author: Mike Milson
productreview.reviewTitle: Doesn't work on many games at all
productreview.review: Apparently old and not supported any longer ....works for the odd game but very frustrating.  Seems like it could be a pretty great product with support

productreview.author: SirGoldenTaco
productreview.reviewTitle: Useless since it has been abandoned
productreview.review: Short version: Don't buy it since it's been abandoned. Long Version: So after buying it and trying to figure out why it wasn't working, it appears that MOGA (which is hosted by powerA) seem to have abandoned the project all together. So since the app that makes the controller work is no longer in effect well you can't use it properly.

productreview.author: Lynn
productreview.review: Was fun for app store fps (barely any of the good ones are supported, doesn't work with any MOBAs) This product is no longer supported by Moga, the app has been removed from the store. Does not work with complex games.

productreview.author: Babak Akbari
productreview.review: Good battery life. Unique design . Compatible with all emulators I've ever tested but not very durable if it falls down even from 30 centimeter , bottons stop working or D pad getting confused and sticks to one side

productreview.author: John
productreview.review: You need to download an app to use the controller for games which the app doesn't exist anymore so now they're selling a product that doesn't work anymore.

productreview.author: Wlee
productreview.review: It took a minute to set up but the MOGA is a very well built and very functional controller for use with mobile phones.

productreview.author: Elric
productreview.reviewTitle: As advertised:  Connects well, performs well, great deal
productreview.review: No problem connecting bluetooth to Samsung Note 8 and chromebook/chromeos.  Great deal for cost.

productreview.author: Some Guy
productreview.review: The buttons have a noticeable click click when pressed. Can become irritating to anyone nearby. Need a bit too much force to press them down. Hopefully it will loosen up during prolonged use.

productreview.author: Erik
productreview.reviewTitle: Don't buy unless you ply emulators
productreview.review: Limited game support. Dev doesn't even work on supporting anymore..

productreview.author: Benoit G.
productreview.reviewTitle: A great companion to your Windows 10 devices (Surfaces, WP phones, etc.)
productreview.review: Work perfectly with Windows Phone and Surfaces running Windows 10. I use VGA10 emulator on both Windows 10 and Windows Phone 10 to play Gameboy Advance ROMS and it works pretty well. I also map the controller's button with Xpadder on my Surface to play any games using the controller. On mode B, the Moga acts like a HID, so a lot of programs, emulators and others will work. Have fun!

productreview.author: KimK9Lee
productreview.review: I am very happy with my Moga Pro Power game controller. Adds a totally new dimension to my on phone gaming experience. Wish the joysticks were not as sensitive. Feels good in your hands and holds my LG G4 securely. Thanks again Amazon for the speedy delivery to a very happy gamer.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Works just fine. Some thought was put into the product
productreview.review: Easier to setup than I thought. Works just fine. Some thought was put into the product. Using with a Samsung S8+ w/ case

productreview.author: TVGuy
productreview.review: Excellent, works well with my Gear VR! There are two settings, A and B. When using with Android, set this to B. Paired no problem and feels sturdy and high quality. Would definitely purchase again.

productreview.author: Jeremy
productreview.reviewTitle: Works great with no issues for feedback or input
productreview.review: Works great with no issues for feedback or input. I use it for my Galaxy Note 5 to play emulators. Only small complaint is the spring stiffness of the triggers are a little too firm, but that's all personal taste.

productreview.author: Scott
productreview.reviewTitle: Works well for Note 5 and Samsung Gear.
productreview.review: Works as advertised for the Samsung Gear with a Galaxy Note 5.  It's not a Microsoft Xbox controller but it's more than adequate for the job.  The fact it can charge your phone as well is nice.

productreview.author: RazzEM
productreview.review: Used this a few times and have no complaints

productreview.author: Davis Ellwood
productreview.review: Literally had this controller for a day and the R2 button stopped working. Feels great in your hands and worked well for the first day but having the r2 button stop after a day is unacceptable

productreview.author: Saty
productreview.review: this thing is awesome. works great for my chromebook(mainly for need for speed games/racing

products.title: Travel Electronics Organizer, Waterproof Cable Organizer Bag for Electronic Accessories Double Layer Large Shockproof Cable Storage Bag for Cord, Power Bank, Tablet(Up to iPad 11 inch) - Black

productreview.author: Joe O.
productreview.review: Nice case

productreview.author: d carder
productreview.review: Good solid product with sufficient room for all those smaller necessities.

productreview.author: LONE STAR BRAND
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2020
productreview.review: It is small with few wire compartments, for the it's average/ below rating. Material is fair but it's not rain proof, easy traveling case for the price needs improvement.

productreview.author: Teresa
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020
productreview.review: I really like my case the color, the amount of space for storing, I even like the fact that you are able to put a lock on your bag securing your personals. Very good buy for the money. I would shop, as well as recommend Travel Electronics to other's. There's one issues that require your attention. The stitching is not good mine is coming apart. I'm going to return for that reason alone. Everything esle receives 5 stars, on a 1-5 STAR scale. Thank you.

productreview.author: strongman
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
productreview.review: it's very roomy but inside zipper arrived damaged and outside zipper arm was missing  must have been a return. i exchanged for another brand.

productreview.author: Christian
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2020
productreview.review: Way too small for anything except travel. Maybe a small iPad and a mouse, external HD and some USB cables. I purchased thinking I could store my bunch of leads, usb, camera batteries and adaptors etc but it's just not big enough. I went for the Phitx gig bag. My main issue with this is, it's too small for serious cable and accessory management but its also a tad too big to drag this around when you are flying from place to place. You would need to stick this in a suit case or carry on.

productreview.author: Evelyn Greshake
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
productreview.review: For multiple cords this is a great case. Had a 1inch high case before with lots of pockets did not work. This works so much better. Go No to school, work and travel I’ll stick with this one.

productreview.author: Kevin Lam
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
productreview.review: Haven't used it yet, but it seems like great quality and exactly what we need. Its wrapped up under the tree right now. Will update my review with more pros and cons after I get to use it more.

productreview.author: Raymond
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020
productreview.review: very happy with it, works great.

productreview.author: Anonymous
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
productreview.review: Well padded, fabric feels durable, zippers feel strong. Convenient carrying handles.

productreview.author: Jodi S.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020
productreview.review: The item I received is only 152mm x 228mm, far smaller than listed.  I need to return because it is not big enough.  Other that's that it seems like a nice case.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
productreview.review: As advertised, however the top part of the case has too many slots and could be a.little thicker.

productreview.author: mike
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020
productreview.review: It works great and has space

productreview.author: Lawrence D. Brown
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
productreview.review: Good product met all my expectations.

productreview.author: Spencer Brickhouse
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
productreview.review: Great room for all cables needed when traveling. Has pockets for wall input boxes. Also has extra storage in below pocket for tablets or other tablet size needs. Good water repellant material. Easy to carry around with a durable handle. Great product

productreview.author: Emma L.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
productreview.review: I like! It’s not as big, but the depth make up u for it. I put 2 corded stage mics in it with the cords. Plus some other cords and jacks I need.

productreview.author: D. Pires
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
productreview.review: Room for a lot of storage of cables and chargers

productreview.author: Courtney
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
productreview.review: Good quality, matches color shown.

productreview.author: Anton Johansson
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
productreview.review: A liitle bit to big if you don't have a ton of things

productreview.author: michelle
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019
productreview.review: Perfect for tablet and headphones

productreview.author: Jacob Lincoln
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
productreview.review: Disappointed in the product

products.title: Dockers Men's Agent Slip On Loafer, Black, 7

productreview.author: Andrew Gomes
productreview.review: These are great, this was my second pair. I bought one two years ago and I liked it so much that I replaced it with the same pair.

productreview.author: Luis Guaimare
productreview.review: I loved them, very good quality, They were a bigger size, and I'm already waiting for the replacement

productreview.author: Amir
productreview.reviewTitle: It is look great when it's new
productreview.review: It is look great when it's new. After using it for few months, it turns out that it quality is so cheap and doesn't worth your money.

productreview.author: Kathy C
productreview.review: The sole is hard but it’s a well made pair of shoes.

productreview.author: Bill
productreview.review: I have been wearing these shoes for work for almost ten years which is why i keep buying it.

productreview.author: John
productreview.review: love this shoe for work. comfy, durable, and professional looking

productreview.author: Grubsy
productreview.review: Fit and feel perfect!

productreview.author: ARKE
productreview.review: Very good shoes. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Highly recommended.

productreview.author: Kenn
productreview.review: Perfect

productreview.author: Nathan
productreview.review: Great pair of shoes for a great price. I will probably end up buying this exact pair in brown.

productreview.author: Ronnie
productreview.review: Just arrived today and I love it.

productreview.author: Darren M Morrison
productreview.review: Fit great and comfortable

productreview.author: Raysa Katz
productreview.review: Excellent shoes!!!

productreview.author: José Manuel Del Rivero Trujillo
productreview.review: Me quedaron un poco grandes, aunque no lo suficiente como para devolverlos. Fuera de eso, son bastante buenos y me sorprendió que puedo correr con ellos sin que se salgan (como me ha pasado con otros zapatos de este tipo). Me gustaron mucho. Totalmente recomendados.

productreview.author: Angel CC
productreview.review: Uno de los mejores calzados que he comprado. Cómodo como pocos. Fuerte y muy agradable de usar.

productreview.author: Fernando Anguiano Delgado
productreview.review: BUENA CALIDAD Y PRECIO

productreview.author: Scott Simons
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2018
productreview.review: These shoes are very comfortable. I bought them before a trip to NYC, where I do a lot of walking. I only had 1 day to break them in, and I was concerned they'd be uncomfortable after a few hours on my feet. I was very pleased that my feet were fine every day I wore them. They have lots of cushion in the soles. Fit was as expected. I will update this if they show signs of poor durability, but so far they look like new. Update January 2020: I have had these shoes for more than 1 year now. I wear them to work about twice per week.  They look almost new.  Admittedly, I am in an office environment and I am sitting most of the day.  But I have had no complaints about durability.  And they are still very comfortable.

productreview.author: quis
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
productreview.review: Original review: I bought the correct size for my feet, but the when I get it, it feels the shoes are too small. After several days of using it, it expended to the right size. I guess I just need to loosen the shoe's materials. Update: 2018.09.30 I got the 7.5 M US last year. The first issue was when it was brand new, the shoes were really tight then eventually (may a week of wearing it) it would feel normal. The second problem is about ~9 to10 months of use, the shoes felt it was getting loose. It seems the threading is starting to break. If you step, in a wet ground (not a paddle), you can feel the water is getting into in the shoes. I will give it two stars because once you broke in and before the shoes starting to break, the shoes were comfortable to wear, but it does not last. I work in an office environment and I don't stand or walk a lot during the time I was using this pair of shoes.

productreview.author: agilford
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2017
productreview.review: This was the 2nd pair of shoes I've purchased over a 2 years span.  The 1st pair are holding up good.  I wanted/re-ordered because I wanted a backup shoe and I usually have a hard time finding what I want in the future... unfortunately, my 2nd pair was a littles discolored on the top and side of the right shoe.  Because I'm not in a rush to ware these shoes, I requested for them to be exchanged.  Amazon responded quickly and I'm able to return at no cost to me.  I like the product and I'm ok with the process as long as I'm treated fairly.  I would buy again.  The shoe is very comfortable and meets my needs...

productreview.author: Pat Sidz
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
productreview.review: I got a set of these 3 years ago at a store. The soles do crack as mentioned in the other Reviews but overall I like this set of shoes. Very comfortable o e they wear in. I bought my second set so I can have a clean set to use and still use my old set when I do miscellaneous work that will get my shoes dirty but doesn't require anti slip soles or work boots. When these break, I wouldn't be surprised if I get another set.

productreview.author: Metal Element
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2018
productreview.review: I really love the fit, look, and feel of this shoe.  I'm on my second pair.  1st pair developed a sole crack break in the ball area after a year so I bought a replacement pair.  Low and behold, after another year, I am experiencing the same problem again.  I'm going to have to try another brand.  I loved the shoes and wore them to work every day the first year and then about 3x a week this past year.  I work a desk job.  I really wish these had held up.

productreview.author: SandraY
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2019
productreview.review: As an airline pilot, I usually buy one pair of these shoes every 6-12 months.  I don’t know what happened this year. I ordered my usually 9.5 and they were way too small. So I ordered 10s, too big. Finally, I ordered 9.5 wide. Still took months to break in, my little toe is still crushed, and the sole isn’t soft like it used to be. Something definitely changed for the cheaper with these shoes and this will be my last pair.

productreview.author: Nan
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2020
productreview.review: Im not sure qhat is happening to shoes. I bought these for my son, he has had numerous pairs and they always were bery comfortable.  This was the first time he had to break them in.  They caused blisters and had no arch support.

productreview.author: Nathan Z.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2017
productreview.review: 1 day of wearing these shoes and the leather is more wrinkled and damaged than 7 months of wearing my previous pair of dress shoes.  They pinch in the toes and are slightly loose in the heel.  Definitely will not be going with another pair of Dockers shoes in the future.  Absolute garbage!

productreview.author: uhtred6
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2018
productreview.review: These are not good - sole on both shoes is cracked with normal daily walking amounts (4 blocks a day) and leaking dirt and water. Very disappointed; the fit of these was good and they came highly recommended by amazon reviewers but there is a design flaw in the soles - both shoes cracked in same place. See photo attached.

productreview.author: Patrick Reed
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2016
productreview.review: While the shoe is comfortable, the soles wear down quickly.  This is my second pair of these and this time, the soles only lasted 6 months.  Still, they are comfortable enough that I am considering buying them again.

productreview.author: B. Wolfe
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2017
productreview.review: Very comfortable. Easy to slip on and off but they feel snug enough to be comfortable to walk in. The insole support is well cushioned and works well for my flat feet. (This is a first impression review; I'll update in a few months if they start to wear out too quickly)

productreview.author: T. Strokes
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
productreview.review: The regular laced version of these shoes are perfect and my favorite value shoes. This product, same size and wide width is way too narrow near the tip. Actually painful at first. Only thing that helps are thick socks.

productreview.author: R. Bellman
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
productreview.review: Zero insole padding. Need to get an insert to make these wearable everyday for work. Luckily they ran large and there's plenty of room. Look very nice though

productreview.author: Trixies Treasures
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2016
productreview.review: I asked hubby how I should rate lol, he said a 4. He's on his feet for 10 plus hours and says they are comfy, nothing special though. He normally wears a 10 to 11, we went with 11w since the others fit tight. Fits great. Light weight. For the money..... I think nothing makes him say wow... still looking for the perfect shoe.

productreview.author: VDAWG&Vandelay
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2017
productreview.review: The only thing good about these shoes is the "look". the only reason they got 2 stars. Everything else is poor. These shoes run large, are stiff, very uncomfortable. The other surprising and disappointing thing is that they have metal in the soles, and if you have TSA PRE, they must be removed at the airport screening. I travel weekly. I can put up with the stiffness, hoping they get better in time - but setting off TSA scanners when you walk through is unacceptable. Who makes shoes, in this day and age with air travel with metal in them? I travelled out with these, and will be 2 weeks away for business. Too much wear to return them. They'll be donated to Goodwill. If Dockers reads these posts - GET WITH THE TIMES. You cannot make shoes, with all the awesome materials available that are this uncomfortable and can't be used for Air Travel unless you take them off.

productreview.author: Rick Pilon
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020
productreview.review: These are excellent shoes.  Comfortable and very well made.  This is my third pair of these shoes and they will probably not be my last.  They are my everyday work shoes.

productreview.author: DB
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
productreview.review: I use only 1 shoe for work. I expect shoes to last 2+ years. This shoe's rubber base developed a crack and water easily seeped in.

productreview.author: G. PERRY
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2018
productreview.review: Bought these less than one year ago. I wore them occasionally for dress casual use in an office environment. The stitching started to come lose after two months of use. Now the sole and heel are coming apart. Very poor quality. I bought these shoes as what I thought was an identical replacement, but it's obvious the manufacturer was changed since my first purchase. I suggest people avoid these.

productreview.author: Albert T.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2020
productreview.review: The shoe is a good fit, is easy to slip on and take off and looks good. Rubber soles make shoe comfortable to walk in.

productreview.author: Direland
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2016
productreview.review: I bought these shoes for work and wore them 4 days a week. But they don't have fraying, or holes or major signs of wear as if I wore them out. One shoe split open across the bottom sole, so much so, that I can see the cushioning for the inside sole. The other shoe is starting to split as well.  Overall they were comfortable to wear every day, but I wish they had lasted longer. I bought almost identical shoes from GH bass, so we'll see if those last longer.

productreview.author: taintedelephant
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
productreview.review: Just a bit tight, but I expect they will be fine when broken in

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
productreview.review: These shoes are sturdy and look nice.  I've been wearing them daily now for several months and they really hold up well with little care and they still look great.

productreview.author: Mike & Kim
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
productreview.review: Description says all real leather but inside the shoe under the tongue it says man mad uppers, aka vinyl.  Ended up returning.

productreview.author: toolejit
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2017

But that's not the shoe's fault. Other than that they are very nice which is why I gave it 5 stars at any rate.

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2019
productreview.review: to me it squeaks because I don't slip. fits great for me.

I sent them back and got a half size larger and they fit really well, and are very comfortable. Dockers makes a good shoe.

productreview.author: Quasae
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2018
productreview.review: Shoes seemed fine and the one that was not damaged fit fine but dockers QA department let one slip through the cracks this go around.  Thank god for amazons return/replacement policy!

productreview.author: Brock Landers
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2015
productreview.review: I typically wear a 11.5 sneaker and my old work shoes were Aldo which come in European size only.  These shoes fit a bit large for me although they are extremely comfortable compared to my worn out Aldo's.  They slip on easily so hopefully there won't be any issues with rubbing on the back of my feet from them being a bit longer than expected.

productreview.author: RM
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2016
productreview.review: Fit nice and they are more comfortable than the shoes they replaced, which had no sole cushioning. I stand much of the day so a comfy shoe is important, but I also don't want something which looks "old-mannish" like many of the well-cushioned alternatives seem to.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2015
productreview.review: I like the look, the materials quality is good, and the fit is almost perfect.  Unfortunately, the opening is too small, so it is difficult to get them on your feet.  I have to use a shoehorn, and still the back on one shoe has torn.  Once on, they are heavier than most shoes these days - a reflection of the quality - and are very comfortable with a great fit.

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2019
