productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
productreview.review: This is a good looking Quality built shoe. A little stiff on the sole. Leather could be a little more pliable. Shoe seems to be clunky and heavy. Overall not a bad shoe but I can tell it will take little bit to break in.

productreview.author: Paul S. Greene
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2019
productreview.review: Just what I needed to replace my old shoes.  They fit like a glove.  Excellent shoe.

productreview.author: William Hayward
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2017
productreview.review: These shoes are amazing. Comfortable, perfect size match, and stylish. I prefer no laces due to the lost of a finger a few years ago but am very wary about the look/style. These keep true and I put my shoes through hell. Definitely recommend!

productreview.author: Star
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
productreview.review: I bought these shoes for my husband for Christmas and when he wore them for the first time, they cut into the back of his heels causing him to bleed. We are very unsatisfied with these shoes and I would like a refund.

productreview.author: J. Marranca
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2018
productreview.review: Solid, sturdy shoes -- but there could be a bit more padding on the back of the heel. I've had to break them in very carefully to avoid blisters. On the flip side, they feel built to last.

productreview.author: Glen C.
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
productreview.review: Only tried them on and walked in the house.  Don't want to get them dirty in case I do want to return them.  So far they seem to fit, the left shoe is a little snug, but will stretch in with wearing.  So far satisfied.

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2019
productreview.review: That's what the listing should have said. I opened the box and I could see the creases on the front from wear. The "Dockers" logo inside the shoe on the heel area was very worn, very faded. I didnt even try them on. I immediately went online to arrange their return.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
productreview.review: The shoe was comfortable from day one both hand function

productreview.review: I listened to the other reviewers and got a half size smaller than i would normally(9M) but its still too large so i suggest you get at least a full size smaller which i think is ridiculous. Their very comfy and seems like durable quality. Even though their a slight bit big, im still going to use them as i intended so i guess its not that bad... 4 Stars only for being difficult to size...

productreview.author: John M Kelly
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2018
productreview.review: Fit really well on my averaged sized feet (size 9).  Very comfortable and look great.  They don't breathe at all, so my feet get pretty sweaty at end of the day.

products.title: Yahtzee Handheld Digital Game

productreview.author: Mr. Christopher Train
productreview.reviewTitle: I love playing! But it is the 3rd one I ...
productreview.review: I would suggest NEVER BUY ANYTHING SMALL ELECTRICAL DEVICE FROM "Hasbro Gaming'! They are the makers of this. I love playing! But it is the 3rd one I have owned in a matter of 10 years!!! I can't believe that they are not aware of selling this with a flaw. very quickly the far left button will act as if it has a mind of its own. When you "Roll", it will make a "Hold" for you. Or, when you "Roll", it will release the "Hold" that you already had there! SO CHEAP THAT THIS ONE STARTED BREAKING DOWN 3 DAYS AFTER IT WAS DELIVERED !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I can't believe that after all these years they don't already know of this flaw.

productreview.review: Overpriced.  I bought several last year for about $9.00 & worked for a long time. The ones I bought recently were very expensive  & one isn't working anymore. Not impressed. Won't buy these of Amazon again.

So I had to pay an extra 8 dollars for a new battery, but other that that I love the game.

products.title: BESTVA 1000W LED Grow Light Full Spectrum Dual-Chip Growing Lamp for Hydroponic Indoor Plants Veg and Flower (1000 Watt)

productreview.author: Chris
productreview.review: I live in Canada..so yes..I grow a plant or two..this works good for 1 plant start to finish but would recommend you get 2 lights as I did and two plants did really nice at 3 months I got avg. of  10 Oz.  From each plant with good soil and bloom nutrients added

productreview.author: Paul B Mackenzie
productreview.review: I started my tomatoes and peppers for my garden under this light. They are such a dark shade of green and so healthy, I’m really impressed. It easily has a footprint large enough for the 150 seedings I use it for. My plants look way better than the ones I usually buy from a greenhouse. It also runs cool and quiet.

productreview.author: Neil MacKinnon
productreview.review: Bought two of these lights cost me over 400 dollars. Both ended up being defective. Contacted bestva and they sent me 2 newer units very quickly and they work amazing. My plants love them. Highly recommend.

productreview.author: Hondo
productreview.review: This light is good for vegging. I have had it for a year. It still works.

productreview.author: Ernest
productreview.review: Very happy with This! Just finished setting up last night. Light is great quality, nice and sturdy frame. Installation was super easy, just basically removed my old energy eating light and hung the new led light. Pretty excited about the energy savings. Light should pay for it self fairly quick. Keep our peppers growing all year long!

productreview.author: Bob Ross
productreview.review: This is my second one. Very pleased. I’ve bloomed high light orchids (vandas and cattleya) and have had to move my cactus further away because the light was so intense 2+’ away that they were getting pink pigment. To say I am pleased is an understatement. I also have a 3’ wide and tall medicinal plant that is so dense and happy growing under it that I’m just about to order a third for side light in flowering as the plant is so dense there is no way light from above will penetrate very far. What a great light! Stays cool with fan. No issues.

productreview.author: Brad
productreview.reviewTitle: Amazing LED grow lights for the price!
productreview.review: I own 4 of these grow lights and i must say they work great! No issues at all i really suggest them i have grown from seed to finish with them and got 2.5 ounce on a short time vegged cannabis plant! *Legal in Canada keep that in mind! If i veg longer i know i can get more close to 3-4 ounces per plant with these lights...Now i also use them for cloning and work amazing!! As you can see this picture here is a clone of OG Kush and it is thriving in this light i highly recommend Bestva brand LED Grow lights and awesome owners. Thank you Bestva.

productreview.author: Martin
productreview.review: I really like the light. Like the chart in the instructions where it explains that 1000W LED replaces 600W HPS. I grow my parsley, chives, rosemary and sweet basil indoors over the winter. I have one 1000W and one 300W lights and plants seem to like it. 16 hour overnight and small fan oscillating. Great for cooking. Package came fine and everything what was promised was there. But cannot wait for the spring to move everything outside. Happy growing everyone :D

productreview.author: Royce Hall
productreview.reviewTitle: BESTVA 1000W LED GROW LITE FULL SPECTRUM
productreview.review: 2 lites work perfect - on timers 12/12 and rotate colors and low heat released and are perfect in a gro op environment for my medical needs - thanks - will get more when needed. BESTVA 1000W LED Grow Light Full Spectrum for Indoor Plants Veg and Flower

productreview.author: Leny S
productreview.reviewTitle: Bestva Led Grow LIgts - Best Grow lights Ever!
productreview.review: Bestva 1000W led grow lights are the best! This is my first time growing my own plants indoor, (I am really a newbie at this). I started my seeds two weeks ago and the seedlings are loving the lights and doing fantastic. At first, I was not so sure as to what kind of lights to pick (as there are so many choices) but I'm sure glad I picked these ones. Not only they come with three years warranty but also 30 days worry free return guarantee and also the price is right! What else can I ask for? I bought two grow lights  and ordered two more (on their way). I can hardly wait for the end result. ....

productreview.author: Mike B
productreview.review: This doesn’t come with a timer. It’s a good light. It’s heavy. The switches and construction are sturdy. The fan noise is noticeable. You’d likely be bothered by it if you had to hear it constantly. The light coverage is quite wide, easily covering a 1 x 2 m table top. My seeds responded well and almost all germinated. I recommend this lighting system.

productreview.author: Sean
productreview.review: EDIT: this company has amazing customer service! And after a month of using this light my garden is loving it and very very healthy! Arrived very fast, a day ahead of expected arrival! Product as described and very solid. Not a fan of the hanging hook supplied, Not adjustable and hook looks weak for the weight.. Also 1 and only 1 bulb is not working upon arrival and set up. Not thrilled but can't complain much about 1 light bulb out of 100. First try with LED so hope all goes well. Super bright btw.

productreview.author: GA
productreview.review: Seems to work fine with minimal heat. However, I have not used it through a complete grow cycle, so cannot comment on results. 2019/01/16 - after using this for a couple months, I am skeptical of its value. Compared to my friends LED grow light, this one appears to be a lot more "blue" and I question it's suitability for flowering. Also, I bought a quantum PAR meter and the test results are not impressive. I compared it to an HPS grow light and there really is no comparison. The HPS light has much more light power and much more coverage. I already had purchased two BestVA LED lights and I returned the one I could. I'm going with HPS and MH instead.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Good value and performance, but watch out for leaf burn
productreview.review: This is a REALLY bright light that seems to be well made and well designed.  The ratio of blue/red/UV and IR bulbs makes good sense based on the research that I've done, and my plants have done well in both vegetative and flowering stages.  The 10w equivalent LEDs are super bright though, and although the light itself runs cool as ice with excellent (and quiet) ventilation fans, it will scorch your plants if you put them too close.  The manual suggests 30" but I would keep young plants even further away than this and monitor them carefully.  Once you sort out that one detail though, this is a great light.

productreview.author: Zombrie
productreview.review: Purchased the light and was excited to use it. When I initially turned it on I remember thinking it's seems slightly blue but figured it's brand new and the LEDs look active. Fast forward 4 weeks after turning it on and I noticed the light was now mostly just blue, put on my glasses and saw only 40% of the LEDs were active. Tried cycling the light from full spectrum to veg, no change, from veg to bloom and no LEDs would turn on. When my light was turned into bloom it would not work at all. So my full spectrum was failing and became a veg only light.

productreview.author: Allan
productreview.review: I have to give high marks to this companies customer service department. I bought 2 of these 1000 watt lights 1 year ago. About 1 month ago the red lights of one of the lights started flashing on and off constantly. I contacted the company and explained situation. We exchanged a few emails and 2 days after I gave them my address, a replacement light was at my door. The replacement light was also an upgrade that has the veg/bloom switches. Thank you for a grief free replacement process... unlike some other idiots I am currently dealing with. I find the foot print claim of 4.7 x 5.1 feet a little excessive as I am running 2 of these lights in a 5 x 6 space at approx. 18 inches from the plants.

productreview.author: Anthony
productreview.review: Still strong with daily use, good product. Actual watt draw 185

productreview.author: Mar car
productreview.review: This is more a question then a review but I have recently purchased two off these 1000 watt lights and I have two completely different light outputs one is 80 percent blue light and 20 percent red and the other light is the complete opposite 80 red and 20 blue not sure if I have a problem or different lights or the quality is just so variable with this product ??????

productreview.author: Jason
productreview.review: I specifically did not want to write a review the moment I turned the lights on because I wanted to see plant growth before submitting a review. This is a plant light and it will only be successful if it grows plants well. After a month of using this light, it blew me away! The growth my plants put on were absolutely ridiculous, much healthier and faster than I would think. I bought this light as my 2 year old avocado was losing its leaves due to low light (I live in Canada). It nearly died but it put on new growth (seen in the photos above) in just a few weeks! The leaves are so incredibly healthy looking too. I have the top of the plant off set from the center of the light as the light is so bright, it was burning some old leaves. Similarly, I sprouted an acorn indoors and had it under some very old incandescent lights. Moving it to the LEDs, it took off like a rocket! When my plants get bigger and I need more horizontal light, I'll be sure to pick another one of these up!

productreview.author: jeff h.
productreview.review: After setting the light up and placing the plant under it I am pretty pissed off to see that my plant is burning / shriveling up  ...  Will it recover ?  WTFF !!!  I am letting it have one more day ..  The plant was beautiful under t5 florescent lights. .  I did move the light up as far as I could and the plant recovered and turned out ok ... Some literature with tips or advice for using this light would be helpful ..  There was nothing like that in the box  ..  The only think that annoys me now is to see that I spent more for it than most people seem to be now ..

productreview.author: JC
productreview.review: for the price its an okay light but I wouldn't recommend it. the bloom switch on mine sticks on and off and the fans in the light don't work. I tried to return it but it was just sent back to me so I just settled and set it up anyways with a fan above it for ventilation. my plants took to it very well and seem to be growing okay but overall im a little disappointed.

productreview.author: Chris
productreview.review: Don't do what I did. Don't buy this light. You can spend a little more money and get 1 light to flower a 3x3. This light will not. It's decent for veg or to maintain 18hrs for a mother plant. As well, I haven't even had it a year and LEDs are burning out. Those aren't the IR LEDs in the pic. They're burnt out LEDs. Cheap cheap cheap.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I was using the product for a couple of weeks when I noticed a few Leds had gone out. I sent an email to support with a couple of pictures and they sent me a replacement right away. Even with a few rows of LEDS not working my plants were healthy and strong and growing.  I recommend this product and vendor. Excellent customer service. Update the replacement is going strong no complaints excellent service

productreview.author: David b
productreview.reviewTitle: Bright, Plants are happy..A little noisy
productreview.review: Have been using this for the last month and a half, and my plants seem pretty happy, the hanger was a little too low for a 2 x 2 x 4 tent, and caused some light burn. My only problem (barely a problem) is the cooling fans are a little noisy, and run consistently. If your grow space is aiming for stealth, this isn't the light for you.

productreview.author: kiel
productreview.review: Lights showed up only a couple days later. Was first surprised at how small and compact it was but upon plugging it in the light blew me away. very powerful and efficient. After about a a week My Plants have responded very well and I look forward to using it right up to harvest.  Amazing quality for the price and the customer service seems great. Will update with any issues but so far so great.

productreview.author: Christina
productreview.reviewTitle: kept cool and they all grew very strong
productreview.review: Used this to keep my tomato seedlings going in the spring.  Installed under the stairs, kept cool and they all grew very strong.  Also used for herbs and lettuce after, same results.  Will probably buy a second one next year.

productreview.author: justin provencal
productreview.reviewTitle: Not Impressed already have burnt Led and No customer service at all !!
productreview.review: They worked great for my first run for vegetative phase I had 2 over 4 plants in a 4*8*8 tent. Flowering I had to throw in the old 600w hps and take these out just wasn't getting the density I should have been getting (wasn't expecting to to be honest). The in my second run I lost 9 leds in one and 8 leds in the other. tried emailed the company just for a replacement led board and still no response. I have tried to remove on of the leds to replace them and its not very easy to get the old one off. I will be able to get them repaired fairly cheaply my self but don't think they should have failed within the first 2000hrs of use. Do your self a favor if you are looking to buy a cheaper led light get something cob style at least if it breaks its not hard to replace the Cob led No customer service what so ever just keep that in mind if your thinking of buying one Update: this store owner has reached out and replaced the leds free of charge

productreview.author: Dan Smith
productreview.review: So far so hood. urchaswd 1 month ago and love this light. Especially for the price point you cannot go wrong. I grow everything from herbs to vegetables and marijuana and it matters not what you use ot for it works grwat. The dual chip for veg and flower is also extremely dy.  In fact i purchased the same light this morning (1200watt instead of 1000 ) because how much i love it. Good deal great value for money.  Actual pull os smaller than expected though so if your growing pot you may need to get higher wattage or an additional light .( hence my second light). Thanks bestVA.

productreview.author: SteveF
productreview.review: Delivery was on time and came packaged very well.  With the correct distance between the light and my plants, the light performed excellently!  Definitely a 5 star product, very powerful light and built well!  Overall assessment, excellent!!!

productreview.author: gord
productreview.review: thank you bestva

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: So far, 2 weeks in it is working great on an 18 hr cycle.
productreview.review: Its really bright, I dont recommend not wearing the glasses. I have only had the light a short time as of yet but no problems. Stays nice and cool. I have it in a 3x3 grow tent and the temperature remains around 27 degrees. It runs 18 hrs a day. If I have problems with it I will post them here.

productreview.author: Chelsy Smith
productreview.reviewTitle: If your stuck on a budget, this light will not disappoint I'm very happy with my purchase
productreview.review: This light is great, very bright, great footprint for the price, combined this 1000w with my two 300ws and my 5x5x7 tent is eye straining without safety glasses, my plants are loving the new light and I'm loving the lack of heat this light puts out, very easy to work with.

productreview.author: Sean Soviskov
productreview.review: So have had two of these lights for about 9months they worked great but this last week I noticed the light was a little different so I took them down and inspected one has 15 burnt bulbs and the has 6 burnt bulbs waiting to hear back from bestva right now I'll give two stars for now will see if bestva fixes this Have now messaged bestva 3 times with no response getting pretty upset now what good is a 3 year warranty if you cant get ahold of anyone at the company not sure what to do at this point feel like I threw 300 dollars away

productreview.author: louis-philippe gougeon
productreview.review: Sorry for the delay, didnt had the time yet To try my lamp but just did it, and works fine, cant wait To see how much stuff ill get out of it!!!! Recommand that product very great product, very fast shipping and very LITTLE noise or heat !!!!! But it youl love it!!!!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Very good light.. super bright but it is a shock to your existing plants be aware.. alternate with a sodium or noen light to get them used to this spectrum. That is my experience so far but love the setup. I will definitely buy the 2000w after! Aslo to mention that it does produce quite some heat so dont put your plants too close.

productreview.author: Bill
productreview.review: It's very simple to set up. Out of the box, onto the adjustable hanger...done! The Veg and Bloom switches are clearly marked. The unit is very light, so its weight also makes it essy to install. It cannot be connected in a seies, but for me, this isn't a problem. So, quick and easy setup, clearly marked switches, and an excellent value overall.

productreview.author: Bryan lico
productreview.reviewTitle: my plants are in blooming now and just love the light
productreview.review: the last light I did a review of decided to stop working so I got a refund and decided to try a bestva ... I’m really impressed with it , my plants are in blooming now and just love the light .. Price is right and works great

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I bought the previous version of this lamp in 2018. Only one switch for both veg and bloom. The lamp literally burnt my plants. The newest version has 2 separate switches for veg and bloom and it is a big improvement. My plants love it.

productreview.author: adara
productreview.review: Bought one of these lights and it worked so good I bought another one. Unfortunately 2 weeks after the second one arrived half of my lights on one side are all not working except for the red lights. Trying to find a way to contact seller.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: It's only been in use a couple of weeks now but so far so good. As for longevity; time will tell but is seems to be a solid product and the warranty is one of the best as far as I can tell. I will reserve a star to see how the company handles warranty issues, if any should arise. At this point I would recommend this product as long as one's expectations do not exceed the lights capabilities.

productreview.author: Totes Magotes
productreview.review: This is a fantastic light, doesn't overheat when left on for hours. It covers a generous area with its beautiful rays. Lightweight, easily assembled and priced right.

productreview.author: Paul
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I not usually the type to write a negative review like this but here we go .. .This light stopped after 3 months!!!!! productreview.review: Package came with little sticker clearly stating contents of package, besides that, the product itself seems to be of good quality, no daisy chain ability, no veg/bloom switch, just a good quality LED, Probably best used in flowering stages.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: First time using a indoor grow light and very pleased with the results. Has created many possibilities with growing vegetables and fruits for spring planting or winter crops. Has even distribution of light and good intensity to cover large area.

productreview.author: AJ
productreview.review: Own 3 and will be ordering more. A great light for the value and if you know what your doing with proper humidity, temp and nutrients you can grow amazing plants with 2 to 3 of these in a 4x4x6 grow tent. Does not trip breakers and can even run other brand lights daisy chained! My go to light is Bestva! Love this company and brand! Want to try more models they offer tho!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Good value for a lot of light.  This light is perfect for a 4x4 tent, good yields so far.

productreview.author: Shad Fridell
productreview.review: The product came as advertised and so far is working well.  I started using the veg mode light on about 17 seedlings and they have all responded well.  In another couple of weeks I will be splitting them up and at that point I will probably need another light.

productreview.author: kent hall
productreview.review: It definitely met my expectations for quality and construction and ease of use. Some online say it isn't a true 1000W output but the price is low enough to just buy another to go with it. The plants are attracted to it. No regrets, but I haven't owned it long.

productreview.review: The light works as intended, it’s on the bluer side of the spectrum compared to others LEDs I’m running. The fan is a bit loud and the light gives off a fair bit of heat. productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2018
productreview.review: The first bottle I purchased in-store from Macy’s. The next bottle through Amazon. Exactly the same scent. Now. I don’t necessarily think the negative reviews are ill-intentioned. But I think maybe people don’t understand the difference between eau de toilette (this product) and eau de perfume. Eau de perfume has a higher content perfume oil and sells for a higher price per ounce. The toilette version is wonderful for misting over yourself and covering a larger area resulting in a fresh scent that’s not overwhelming.

products.title: Electronic Components Kit, Electronic Components Assortment LED Diodes Transistor Electrolytic Capacitors Resistors, 1390pcs

productreview.author: David Murray Holland
productreview.review: I went through and labelled everything that's bagged also adding tape so you don't immediately destroy the bags. The Transistors I received are as listed C1815 GR331 A1015. Gr331 The complimentary pair.. A733 p331 S8550 S8050 S9012 S9013 S9014 S9015 S9018 A92 C945 2n3904 2n3906 another nice complimentary pair I've used already. 2n5401 2n5551 MPS A42 There's a decent choice of diodes.. I haven't sorted the ceramic caps but for my fuzz pedal builds this stuff is perfect.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Great way to get into the hobby.
productreview.review: Excellent selection.  I ended up buying a binder and 9 pocket card protectors and did some organizing.  I did a couple spreadsheets with some basic values of the the diodes and transistors for reference, (note: PN2222 were not included in this kit but I had some)

productreview.author: Daniel R.
productreview.reviewTitle: Good selection but nothing is identified
productreview.review: Lots of components and pretty nice to stock up on basic components. Unfortunately nothing is labelled and you'll have to get out the microscope and multimeter to identify everything yourself.
As a hobbyist, I like this product. It is a great collection of basic components.

productreview.author: Steve R.
productreview.review: Great for electronics projects or repairs

productreview.author: Heggles
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2020
productreview.review: You tend to expect a mess of stuff shoved in a single box loosley or in a bag all mixed together. So color me surprised to find each type of component was, by category, placdd in seperate bags and then sorted by value into theor own smaller ziplock bags. Quick check with meter showed reasonably accurate values. Only thing that could improve this purchase is if i didnt have to go elsewhere for a container. That aside, for the price ill likely order a couple more as gifts.

products.title: ProCase Electronics Travel Organizer Storage Bag, Double Layer Universal Traveling Gear Accessories Carrying Case Pouch for iPad Mini Cables Phone Chargers Adapter Flash Hard Drive and More –Black

productreview.author: Paul Magruder
productreview.reviewTitle: A great fit for your budget, style and electronics+ storage needs!
productreview.review: Needed an electronics organization bag that holds all of my needed cabling and devices on the go. This holds 95% of what I needed it to do, excluding a Bluetooth speaker that is too tall but will fit if you squeeze it in. The three separate storage areas are very versatile and I was pleased with how much I could fit and customize the bottom dividers. I even found room for my Xbox controller with the connected attachment to have its own spot! I would not recommend it for your tablet to go in if you are storing other components with hard or sharp edges. Quality materials I can see lasting a number of years. It is a decent weight with semi-firm walls. It is waterproof for spills and rain on the exterior. The colour is pleasing to the eye as well as the quality of zippers. Having dual zippers on both is a useful feature for ease of access. This is a great value for what you get. The size is easy enough to fit into a backpack or luggage but too big for an average size purse, for reference. My next purchase would only be for something larger with a hard case but that may be venturing into the next price and size category. An excellent fit for your budget, style and electronics+ storage needs!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect size for a large battery pack
productreview.review: I've been struggling to find a case for my 50 000 mAh battery ( https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B01BLXY3B6 ), but this case fits perfectly. Plenty of room for the battery pack, its charger, charging tips and cables. The dividers are velcro, so I just stuck them to the inside of the main compartment along the perimeter and it's still a very nice fit. Could fit a few more cables in the top compartment as well - maybe a small travel USB charger. Fully packed with my battery pack, it's a little large for every-day-carry; but if you knew you were going somewhere you'd need it, the carrying handle makes it an afterthought to grab and toss in the car. Too big for EDC, but very portable, we'll say.

productreview.author: Ian
productreview.review: I initially meant to order something else but kept this one in my order by mistake. However, after receiving the organizer (within 10 hours of placing my order) my mistake turned out to be a blessing. This bag is has endless uses for anyone who likes to keep anything neatly organized such as daily essentials (wallet keys, hand sanitizer, portable phone charger, multitool) or specific tools like (voltage testers with the appropriate accessories)

productreview.author: Brandon D.
productreview.review: I purchased this case to transport my RPi, wireless Rii keyboard, and various cables. The case is probably much lager than I need. It holds the RPi, keyboard, power adapter, a 6' hdmi cable, 8' 3.5mm audio cable, a couple of usb cables, and a usb wall wart. There's still plenty of room for more things!

productreview.author: Tyler C.
productreview.review: I've used something else from ProCase and love it, but this one was delivered completely smooshed. It was warped and the material was too soft to try and manipulate it back to it's regular form. Really cheap and flimsy in my experience (obviously) and I definitely do not recommend this particular product to anybody.

If they can fix this it would have been a 5 star review.
