productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 16, 2019
productreview.review: I found this case to be ideal for my needs and kept all my cables etc in one place. The quality of the case was 5 star.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 4, 2018
productreview.review: Great item suited my needs down to the ground

productreview.author: NoHomeCook
productreview.review: I originally purchased this case for my tech gear but as soon as it arrived I knew this case was destined for greatness... Those of you that wear chunky wooden beads and quirky, unattractive brooches will know that it’s impossible to find travel cases for such treasures. Yet here it was, a case like no other, with room for both beads and brooches. My only problem was...where do I store my tech? The solution was clear, another case was ordered and the chaos of cables became a harmonious symphony of order. Now, if only the case came in different colours, I wouldn’t be pulling out my precious jewels in business meetings when scrambling for my travel mouse. #HintHint

productreview.author: Tony
productreview.review: Acabo de sacar de varias cajas y cajones los distintos conectores, tarjetas de memoria, adaptadores, y demas aparataje auxiliar que tenia en diferentes cajas y cajones. He tirado a la basura los que no sirven y cooocado ordenadamente en este bolso los que van bien al movil, camaras fotos, bateria adixcional y iPod. Así cuando salga de viaje o vaya a utilizarlos sé dónde están. De momento una compra acertada. He ocupado bastantes de los distintos departamentos apartados. Recomiendo nada mas abrir el paquete y las cremalleras dejarla que se airee. El material parece aprpiado para el uso que se va a dar.

productreview.author: Mac
productreview.review: I've been looking for many cases and often it's a lottery because you don't know how it'll work out until you can inspect it in your hands. This fabric case has plenty of storage for SD cards, thumbdrives, phones, wifi hotspots, cables, or headphones (if you can fold them flat). One compartment can fit a Samsung S10-sized phone, and another compartment will fit larger phones or tablets, around 8 inches I think. One compartment is configurable, you can modify the layout and sub-compartments by re-arranging the velcro dividers. Important to mention - the velcro dividers are quite sturdy and will prevent the case from being squashed. No, it won't protect you if someone stands on it or puts a 100-pound box on top of it, but it will survive most travel scenarios. This is something that wasn't mentioned in the product descriptions so it exceeded my expectations. Finally, I was extremely surprised to receive it within just a couple of days, this is unheard of in Western Australia, especially during the Xmas rush when the post is always delayed. I don't know how they pulled it off but props to the team for such speedy delivery.

productreview.author: Kathrin S.
productreview.review: Ein halber Stern Abzug, weil die Netztasche im unteren Reissverschlussteil der Tasche etwas schief angenäht ist. Ansonsten bin ich sehr zufrieden mit dieser Tasche. Das Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis stimmt. Ich habe meine diversen Kamera-, Handy-, Tablet-Kabel, Speichermedien, Ministativ, Powerbank und sonstigen Dinge alle schön übersichtlich verstaut und kann jetzt bei einer Reise einfach nur die Tasche greifen und habe alles dabei, was ich brauche. Das war das Ziel. Die Tasche ist (bis auf den einen Einsatz) sehr gut verarbeitet. Die Qualität der verarbeiteten Materialien (Obermaterial, Reissverschlüsse) verspricht eine lange Haltbarkeit. Für diesen günstigen Preis kann ich die Tasche uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen. Update: Einen chemischen Geruch konnte ich nicht feststellen. Riecht halt ein klein wenig neu, so wie andere Taschen und Koffer auch, aber nicht intensiv und nur wahrnehmbar, wenn man direkt mit der Nase rangeht.

productreview.author: El Tortas
productreview.review: Me dedico al mundo del cine, en el apartado de audio en ocaciones conseguir estuches o donde guardar el equipo es complicado, vi este producto en oferta y le dí una oportunidad, la primera vez vine defectuoso, pero el reembolso fue rápido y sin problemas, al llegar no me arrempetí de nada, tenía suficiente espacio para mi grabadora TASCAM DR-40 y más accesorios, el exterior es más robusto de lo que parece, me a protegido bien el equipo y lo a mantenido en orden. Una buena compra para un sonidista independiente

productreview.author: Roberto Ciccarella
productreview.review: Dire che è capiente è poco; ci posso inserire qualsiasi tipologia di cavi, e nelle tasche dedicate alle chiavette spesso posso farne entrare due nella stessa se sono sottili. Nello spazio non delimitato da cerniere ma dalle fascette a strappo( che reggono bene) ci ho potuto inserire il mio speaker bluetooth e un paio di caricatori. Le cerniere di chiusura della valigia sembrano molto resistenti e permettono di portarla comodamente a giro senza rischi di dispersione cavi. Per chi deve fare cambi continui di cuffie, chiavette e caricatori vari, è il prodotto ideale.

productreview.author: TANOLOM
productreview.review: I materiali sono abbastanza buoni, al tatto anche le cuciture sembrano resistenti. La facevo un po' più grande, effettivamente è un po' piccola, ma nonostante questo sono riuscito ad far entrare svariati accessori per la fotocamera è smartphone, cavi usb e carica batterie. Mi sarebbe piaciuto un po' di imbottitura in più, ma per il resto va bene.

productreview.author: Romain DESLANDES
productreview.review: Bonjour à tous, Me déplaçant toujours avec d'objets (caméra, enceinte, disque dur, etc) j'ai décidé d'acheter un sac de rangement afin de centraliser tout ces objets dans un même endroit. Ce sac est très pratique et comprend de nombreux rangement comme vous pouvez le voir en photo. Cela dit, une bandoulière serait apprécié afin de porter plus confortablement celui-ci. En tout cas, je recommande vraiment cette saccoche pour les gens désireux de ranger soigneusement son matériel informatique et/ou électronique.

productreview.author: Leonel
productreview.review: Cabe bastante bien cosas pequeñas y de uso personal, es un buen compañero de viaje y sus materiales son muy buenos, la verdad tarde en calificarlo precisamente dando tiempo en usarlo pero muy satisfecho con la compra

productreview.author: Seth Rafael Meza Muñoz
productreview.review: Personalmente lo he estado utilizando para la universidad, no para viajes. Por tamaño, se ve que cabe perfectamente en una maleta. Los materiales son totalmente premium y son resistentes. Tiene su espacio dedicado a cables en el "piso" de arriba, pero en la de abajo trae unas partes desprendibles con velcro, para que que tú le des el tamaño deseado al "piso" de abajo. Me ha protegido de manera exitosa cables, mouse, disco duro y en ocasiones un Nintendo 3ds. Indispensable tanto para transportar como para dejar los cables y aparatos pequeños de tu hogar ordenados.

productreview.author: mada1991
productreview.review: Materiali di bassa qualità i divisori interini si sono staccati al primo utilizzo dopo due attacca e stacca le cerniere non sono affatto fluide ma si continuano ad impigliare guardate altrove ve lo sconsiglio non è affatto fatto bene l'idea è buona ma i materiali sono troppo di bassa qualità

productreview.author: Nowonder
productreview.review: Muy buen producto. Las cosas quedan muy bien recogidas con las cremalleras y gomas. Pero lo que más me gusta es que una parte del estuche es más alta y permite meter con cierta comodidad los cargadores. He llegado a meter una bomba de bicicleta pequeña también junto con cables y demás. No lo veo para una tablet pues debería ser más grande.

productreview.author: Cliente Amazon
productreview.review: He comprado este organizador para llevar de viaje todos los accesorios para los móviles. Es cómodo y espacioso para lo que yo necesito. Llevo usándolo un par de semanas, parece bien hecho y acabado, hay que darle más uso para ver la durabilidad.

productreview.author: Nicola83
productreview.review: Ottima borsa per organizzare tutta l’ Elettronica da portare in viaggio, io la utilizzo per cavi, batterie esterne, hardisck, gopro e tante altre cose che mi servono in viaggio o per lavoro. Prodotto di buona fattura e tessuto resistente. Lo consiglio anche per l’ Ottimo prezzo.

productreview.author: Michael Collyer
productreview.review: I was surprised at how good the quality of this item was when I first opened the package. Lots of room for cables, hard drives, leads and much more. Plenty of space. Great for travelling, or put it in your work bag or laptop bag. Would definitely recommend this product.

productreview.author: Planetary Consultant
productreview.review: Ce Procase contiens mon chargeur USB RAV Power avec son cable alimentation, Batterie Jackery Giant+ 12000 mAH, Airbox Orange, Souris Logitech, Chargeur PC Asus dans le grand compartiment, et mon DD Samsung T5 avec 6-8 divers fils USB dans le petit compartiment. Tout y rentre et est bien protégé. Par contre, le Procase est un peu volumineux, trop de mousse a mon point de vue.  Il est utile pour des grands déplacements en mission: tout a sa place donc moins de chances d'oublier quelque chose, et on ne fouille plus dans son sac a chercher des objets migratoires tous en noir.  Par contre, il est trop grand pour le quotidien, mais c'est pas pour cela que je l'ai acheté. Points coutures et zip paraissent bien solides.

productreview.author: Raúl
productreview.review: En esta época donde tenemos muchos aparatos eléctricos, es indispensable el orden. Este estuche me vino excelente, nunca había tenido tan a la mano todos los cables que necesito.

productreview.author: Luis Coiro
productreview.review: Muy buen organizador de cables y accesorios para un llevar organizadas las herramientas de trabajo. El cargador de mi laptop, diadema plantronics, mouse alambrico, audífonos, memorias usb, memorias sd,. Lo que no me gusto, es que no se siente con materiales tan durables o de mejor calidad.

productreview.author: BF-SW
productreview.review: Ich hatte eine Tasche für meine 2 Transmart Bluetooth Lautsprecher gesucht und diese "auf Verdacht" bestellt. Passen optimal und es ist sogar noch genügend Platz für Zubehör. Klare Kaufempfehlung.

productreview.author: Flowerpot
productreview.review: We're travelling extensively and needed something to hold all our electronic accessories in an organised way that we could easily access - this is it! Great little bag, good quality and well thought-through design - very practical. Highly recommend.

productreview.author: NilsR
productreview.review: Ottima borsetta, la organizzo in base all'esigenza con cavi vari, Hard disk, batterie delle fotocamere e gingilli vari. Insomma abbastanza capiente.. un MUST HAVE per un vero NERD! :)

productreview.author: Mike
productreview.review: Excelente producto, me encantó, tiene un buen espacio interior pero sin desproporcionado las dimensiones externas. Además esta construido con material de calidad

productreview.author: Gabriel Benítez
productreview.review: Excelente producto y de material de mediana calidad. Cumple con el objetivo para ordenar y mantener tus cables y componentes en un solo lugar.

productreview.author: Cliente Kindle
productreview.review: È un comodo porta tutto, con scomparti suddivisi e comodi elastici ferma oggetti, tacche chiuse con cerniera. Lo utilizzo come porta accessori per il cucito e ho tutto quello che mi serve a portata di mano. Una buona capienza.

productreview.author: José Luis González Taboada
productreview.review: util para ordenar componentes electronicos de movil y pc

productreview.author: Jorge
productreview.review: Perfecto para lo que necesito. Incluso me vendría bien un poco más grande. La volvería a comprar.

productreview.author: Paulus Macro
productreview.review: Cumple con las especificaciones presentadas. Tiene almacenamiento abundante y útil. Lo recomiendo encarecidamente.

productreview.author: Clément Bernard
productreview.review: J'ai reçu cette sacoche semi-rigide aujourd'hui, elle était assez froissée et tout aplatie à l'ouverture du colis. Cependant, elle a repris de la forme après l'avoir rempli. Combiné à un système de velcro, j'ai pu y ranger et organiser mes câbles qui étaient à l'origine fourrés dans un tiroir. Mais la taille de la sacoche n'est malgré tout pas suffisante pour tout ce que j'ai à ranger. Je pense donc en effet qu'elle est surtout faite pour voyager et préserver temporairement son matériel plutôt que de stocker en  grande quantité. Niveau qualité, la sacoche semble assez solide, mais je trouve  que les coutures assez irrégulières, cela n'a pas l'aire de poser de problème sur sa solidité, mais peut être qu'il pourrait y avoir quelque points faibles dans sa résistance. Je trouve que les fermetures sont assez bien travaillées et ne laisse pas présager de futurs problèmes de fermeture. Question esthétique, le tissu est assez joli mais parait salissant. Et la forme générale de la sacoche qui se voudrait carré finit en réalité avec un aspect assez "patatoïde". Mais ces critère sont largement négligeables pour la fonction principale de ce produit. Je vous laisse juger tout ça par mes photos !

productreview.author: Helen Clancy
productreview.review: Great, fits all our cables and charges and has made travelling just that bit easier.  Great to be able to say to my travel partner (husband) “check the case they are all in there” instead of having to search around for cables and chargers.

productreview.author: Ludovic
productreview.review: J'avais besoin d'une petite sacoche et les dimensions données correspondent, seulement l'intérieur est moins logeable que prévu et les bords arrondis n'aident pas. Pourtant j'avais anticipé cela en mesurant chaque objet à y mettre. J'ai peur qu'en forçant les fermetures éclair ne tiennent pas longtemps. Puisque j'ai pas mal de chose à ranger j'en ferai un autre usage.

productreview.author: Joel Sandoval
productreview.review: Muy práctica, en lo personal yo la ocupo para colocar mi material de trabajo, me funcionó bastante bien cabe todo muy bien

productreview.author: Mikee
productreview.review: L'emballage était un peu léger mais pas de dégats à l'arrivée. Le produit correspond bien à la description mais il y a toujours un objet trop volumineux qui ne rentre pas dans cette boite de rangement. Elle semble bien fabriquée et solide et les options de rangement sont multiples. Il faudra maintenant voir à l'usage car je ne l'ai emporté qu'une fois lors d'un voyage. Convient bien pour la câbles, chargeurs et batteries de rechange. Bon achat !

productreview.author: JM
productreview.review: Points forts : - prix - agencement de la sacoche modulable - 2 poches distinctes : d'un coté les clés usb/adaptateurs ; de l'autres les disques dur, chargeurs, etc. - grand volume : on peut y ranger beaucoup de choses - facilement transportable Points faibles : - la matière : le tissu extérieur n'est pas très agréable au toucher. Il pourrait être de meilleur qualité. Toutefois, on s'y habitue et ce n'est pas très dérangent. Par rapport au prix affiché, c'est cohérent.

productreview.author: Gustavo S.
productreview.review: El producto llego a tiempo, de buen material y buena distribución de secciones, solo que no es buena opción para ahorro de espacio ya que si esta amplia.

productreview.author: Carles
productreview.review: El producto es de buena calidad, lo único es que no revise las medidas ofrecidas por el fabricante, me deje llevar por las fotos y al llegar pude comprobar que es pequeño para lo que necesito.

productreview.author: Isabel Vidagany Fombuena
productreview.review: Ya no voy como loca buscando los cables, todos van al sitio

productreview.author: Danilo Mesaros
productreview.review: Si vede subito che è di qualità ma è arrivato con delle parti mancanti

productreview.author: undso
productreview.review: Die Verarbeitung an sich ist für den Preis okay. Leider sondert die Tasche auch nach mehrtägigem Lüften einen starken chemischen Geruch ab - daher ging die Tasche auch zurück.

productreview.author: Cech
productreview.review: Estoy satisfecho con este producto, ya que correspondió tal cual a lo visto y ofrecido, excelente capacidad para evitar que cables, tarjetas de memoria y accesorios de Go Pro anden por todos lados.

products.title: BAGSMART Electronic Organizer Travel Universal Cable Organizer Electronics Accessories Cases for Cable, Charger, Phone, USB, SD Card, Black

productreview.author: FT
productreview.review: BAGSMART makes some very nice, well thought out products & this one is not an exception. This particular size is ideal for traveling. If you are looking for cable storage/organizer for your home then get the larger size. This one has 7 cable pockets, 5 of which are sized for usb charging cables while 2 are big enough to store larger chargers (like laptop/Nintendo switch) & Ethernet cables. Then there are 3 dedicated pockets for sim card and memory card storage. And many other zipper pockets for storing other necessary traveling stuff like travel plugs & sockets. The only thing that could have made this is even better will be including an additional pocket on the outside of the bag so the more frequently used cable will be readily accessible or maybe a phone sized pocket on the outside so you can quickly stick your phone in there while going through airport security. Overall, a very nice product & in my opinion a must have for every family.

productreview.author: S Katak
productreview.reviewTitle: Good storage - solid construction - don't like the big logo
productreview.review: Good storage unit. It's small enough to go into my day bag and wrap up all my electronic junk that always bothered me. My only complaint is that there is a big obvious logo tag on the outside of the unit advertising that there are electronics inside. I travel a bit overseas, so I like being discrete about what I own so it's a bit of a negative to have a big label you can't remove on the outside of your storage case. It's not like I have much to have stolen but I've also learned that once you start showing labels, logos and images of what look like important electronics or expensive equipment, then you set yourself up as a target. Otherwise, the storage unit is great, I like it and it does what I need it to do ... it feels strong, zipper feels solid and the storage spaces and tie downs work great.

productreview.author: Keith A.
productreview.reviewTitle: Netting Issue.  Company went beyond to correct the problem.  Wow.
productreview.review: The netting that holds usb drives had torn from the elastic-type band that keep it in place.  The size is the pouch is exactly as I had imagined it. EDIT: The company went to great lengths to sort out this problem for me.  The gesture of reaching out to me on its own is enough to give them 5 stars, let alone the fix that was done to correct the problem.  If I had a need for more products like this, I'd be happy to continue being their customer.  Great job, Bagsmart!  I really appreciate it.  :)

productreview.author: Loban
productreview.review: This case serves its purpose and holds all my chargers and adapters for travelling.  I bought the blue version so I can find it easily in my suitcase and in darkened hotel rooms.  I only rated it four starts because I feel it is larger than it needs to be.  Having said this, the larger size makes it easier to organize and find the individual cables and adapters.  The case is 7.5 inches by 10 inches.  My only suggestion for improvement would be to add a pocket on the outside for easy access for phone or the most commonly used charger.

productreview.author: Julian
productreview.review: Great if you're an average packer with average cord needs.  If you're a photographer or have a ton of cords, maybe a little small.  I managed to pack the following: 3 phone cords, 2 plug-ins, an international travel adapter, vape batteries and charger, a GoPro and charger, headphones, 3 plug block and an extra power cord.  It stayed fairly low profile and could easily accommodate 2 people.

productreview.author: Gino
productreview.reviewTitle: Super lightweight and top notch quality and design
productreview.review: Super lightweight and top notch quality and design. Keeps my cords and plugs organized and neatly placed in my bag everywhere I go. Compartments are just enough to hold plugs and garters to keep the cords from tangling. The USB pockets and other compartments are made of mesh so you can easily see what's inside without having to open it all the time. Zippers are smooth and sturdy enough to hold everything inside without having a hard time opening and closing it even if it's fully packed. Highly recommended!

productreview.author: cyrusrivers
productreview.review: This is a great sized bag for carrying all your cables and adapters that you would need for travel or simply having it to organize. It fits many different wires and materials. I found no issue with sliding regular rubber cables or braided cables in between each compartment. Plenty of space for you to bring what you need to keep everything neat and tidy. The bag itself is made of a decent material. It's soft but able to hold a lot of electronics inside. Even with the bag bulging somewhat the zippers still close and hold without bursting. Be careful to stick robust items with corners like credit card sized chargers in the bigger slots as sometimes this makes the liner on the inside tear but is easily repaired with some glue or sewing.

productreview.author: Ken K
productreview.review: I have a couple different pouches for various dongles, adapters and cables. This one does not fit as much, but it's slim profile is perfect for day to day use, and I keep my most frequently used accessories in it. The outer zippers open around far enough that the whole bag can lie flat on the table, allowing for ease of access to all pockets and pouches. There is only one inner pocket with a zipper. I wish the other inner mesh pocket also had a zipper, as small accessories do fall out whenever you open up the bag.

productreview.author: canadiangirl13
productreview.reviewTitle: Holds all my stuff in one place!
productreview.review: This is a pretty good, medium-sized electronics holder. I wanted something to hold my little cables and external hard drives all in one place without being too bulky. This is perfect for that! If you’re looking for a travel case that is sturdy, this isn’t it though. The case itself is pretty flimsy so don’t except it to protect anything if you drop it. All in all, it was what I was looking for and is very useful. Only thing that bugs my is the plastic on the micro card slots and the front - super unnecessary and hard to get off. Even after picking at it with my nails, I couldn’t get it all off. Not that important, just a bit annoying and unnecessary in my opinion.

productreview.author: Debs
productreview.reviewTitle: Very Good for Travelling and organizing  electronic accessories
productreview.review: This electronic accessory organizer bag is lightweight and compact. It held my cords, charger and camera charger and extra batteries. I would have liked just a little more expansion to the elastic slots for cords as it is a little fiddle to get them slipped under. Also a couple cm more in overall expansion of the bag to allow larger chargers to fit more easily. Durable and appears well made.

productreview.author: czechyourself
productreview.review: Last year, I purchased a cable/electronics organizer case from AmazonBasics and although it was great quality, it was waaay too bulky. I was in the market for a thin and portable organizer and saw that this one had great reviews. It's totally perfect. Has lots of little compartments and even holds my external hard drive. Really happy with it!

productreview.author: SKL
productreview.review: I like this bag for keeping everything together. Its built well and feels good quality. but I have some ideas that might make it better. For someone with cables that are braided it can be hard to slide them through, cables that are thicker or braided are harder but my earbuds and micro usb cable for my powerbank fit fine. If they made it a little bigger for some cables or had one or two a bit bigger. also there is three pockets for sd cards. If you carry a camera its a smart idea but it would be better if there was just two one for sd and micro sd. Or maybe a pouch on top for sd cards or coins. I like it because it can hold my 5s you might be able to fit a 6 with no case. it can also hold usb ac adapters i can hold two apple ones and one with two ports i got off amazon. this bag is amazing for carrying everything when traveling but i thinks it more for putting in a bag. i would be nice if they added something to carry it like a Velcro handle that goes over the zipper, it would make holding it easier. But besides somethings that could be added to make it better its a good quality bag a you can add a lot of different things which is nice but it cant hold an tablet or ipad. 9/10

productreview.author: Label J
productreview.reviewTitle: Per initial handling, looks and feels good.
productreview.review: I just received this and will be using it when i travel in 10 days - but it seems like it would do the job exactly as described by the seller. I am keen to see how much of my stuff it will take, shouldn't be a major issue. A little concerned about long term quality when it comes to the fabric netting and internal zippers, only time will tell.

productreview.author: Mooselander
productreview.review: Using this primarily for travelling and it is helpful to have the cables and associated hardware sorted out. This allows quick & easy access and use also cable tangles avoids tangles. The variety of storage methods within the case will accommodate most cables, charging and storage devices.  Pleased with the functionality of the case.

productreview.author: LowercaseD
productreview.review: It looks like a very nice case with solid zippers. I've looked at it and touched it so far - feels nice. Looks tiny, but I hope it delivers on its promise of being sturdy. The blue colour will stand out inside a crowded backpack. While I have yet to travel with this item it looks like it will do the job and I look forward to organizing all of my tiny cords, power dealies, and plug thingies into this pleasant looking case. The idea of having my electrical cords etc. take up less space than the ' let's dump it all in this  larger sack' I typically use for travelling - well, that appeals to me.

productreview.author: Lawrenceliketheriver
productreview.reviewTitle: good quality for price but their slim bag is a better option if weight is a concern
productreview.review: i ordered a bunch of these to compare weight, and features. This Bagsmart weighs 140 grams and has good organization for a good price, although i would recommend their slim bag as that is 1/3 lighter and offers the same features but only if your luggage has wheels. My carry on bag is not on wheels so every gram counts which is why i am returning it. I ended up going with a MEC bag that, although not as good for organization, comes in at 65 grams. Last thing i want is for any bag/packing cube that i use, to be heavier than the actual stuff i carry!

productreview.author: TEGS
productreview.review: It's convenient to have your stuff all in one place, but not all of your stuff can fit in here.  It doesn't hold quite as much as the picture would make you think -- looks can be deceiving.  This may be more suited to a miniature world where everything is smaller than in real life.  But the organizer in me thought that I should give it a try.

productreview.author: Lovetobuybooks
productreview.reviewTitle: One Place for all my gadgets and cables!
productreview.review: I finally had a bag to hold all my electronic accessories while I travelled. It fit in my travel purse and I was amazed how much I was able to fit in the bag.  The bag material is sturdy and I was very happy with the design. Now I have everything in one spot ready to go anytime I am off on a holiday, long or short.  I would recommend this bag for your electronics.

productreview.author: Suzy-Q
productreview.reviewTitle: Perfect for keeping all electronic cords together.
productreview.review: Great product.....durable and well made. It has tons of space for all your cords headphones and pockets for everything. I was able to keep everything neat and tidy as I was using a plastic bag and elastics for the same purpose. Love the color too as it matches my tote bag. My daughter thought it was going to be too big but she says its the perfect size so I bought her one too. For the price it is a smokin deal!

productreview.author: Gus Chan
productreview.review: Nice small kit to take for travelling.  The only improvement I would see is giving it a bit more slack to increase vertically in height - perhaps just a bit more material where the zippers are so cables and power adapters have an easier time fitting it.  They do fit, just that you need to make sure they are compacted to get inside the zippered pockets. Time will tell if the mesh holds, but no problems so far.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I bought two of these - one for my camera bag to organize chargers, cables, etc. and one for electronic cables and chargers when travelling.  My only regret is that I bought the small ones, but that is my bad, not the companies fault!!  The bag is well laid out, lots of compartments and feels pretty sturdy. Absolutely recommend (but buy the bigger one!!)

productreview.author: Kajury
productreview.review: I love the fact that this pouch has pockets as well as straps.  I considered buying the flat piece that was interlocking straps, but I thought that prongs etc. could maybe hitch up on other items and I wanted a smaller overall size.  This bag works perfectly.  It is deep enough to hold my battery recharger, wall plugs, bluetooth headphones and various cords and still remains only 2.5 inches thick.  Easy to carry in one hand.

productreview.author: Jonathan
productreview.reviewTitle: Don’t WASTE Your Money / AVOID Like The Plague
productreview.review: Don’t WASTE Your Money This thing is too small to hold anything. Even a basic iphone cable doesn’t fit under the elastic band.  Now I have to waste time returning this to amazon for a refund.  Save yourself the headache and avoid this product like the plague.

productreview.author: Isabelle M.-B.
productreview.review: À la hauteur de mes attentes. Vraiment géniale pour le rangement organisé! Nous l'utilisons à chaque fois que l'on voyage! Prend pas grand place dans la valise! Très utile! Reste seulement si les zipper à long terme seront efficace.

productreview.author: Brian C
productreview.reviewTitle: better than the plastic bag that I was using
productreview.review: Solid product. a bit more plastic covering the logos and whatnot than I like but it lets the consumer know that the company care about their products; they even give you a quality translucent ziplock bag for your bag! it's soft shell so it does flop a bit but once things are placed within, it's pretty sturdy and more rigid.

productreview.author: Will Wong
productreview.reviewTitle: Great organisation solution for on the go
productreview.review: Excellent product to keep all off my cables, chargers, and usb keys. I also use it to keep pens, spare change, lens cloth and a small pair of scissors. I like that i can open it and see what i have at one glance than having to look through our dump out a pouch. It's a good size to throw into my everyday backpack. I can't do without it.

productreview.author: Stephany Steele
productreview.review: So I bought this bag mostly to fit a large capacity battery pack. I double and triple checked the measurements for the pack to fit in this case. And it doesn’t fit. I can still use it with a smaller capacity pack, and it does work for the cable I need to bring with me for work.

productreview.author: Barbara
productreview.reviewTitle: Love it! It helps me stay organized and know where everything is!
productreview.review: Do you know the best way to tie a knot??? Put all your cords and headphones in a ziplock bag for a few minutes and when you go to reach for the cords they will be perfectly knotted up!  But now with my BagSmart, everything is organized, nothing is knotted up and I don't spend half my flight trying to un-tie my headphone!  I had it at my last meeting and my two coworkers sitting on either side of me saw the bag and were so impressed by it they ordered their own right there on the spot!  If you want to stay organized I highly recommend this bag.

productreview.author: TJ
productreview.review: I needed a small electronics carry bag for my backpacking trip. It was absolutely perfect. It had slots for all my cables, and I was even able to fit my 1Tb portable hard drive to transfer pictures on the go. Awesome compact bag, no issues with it at all.

productreview.author: Vivek Puthran
productreview.reviewTitle: Smart bag for all electronic accessories
productreview.review: Got this bag recently and looks like a good place to put all your electronic wires and small accessories in one place. Put my small sony camera my travel adaptor and multi usb plug in it plus some other usb charging cables and a memory stick and headphone jack cable without any issues. Lokks like a good thing to have so u can have all your small electronics in one place.

productreview.author: Marguerite
productreview.reviewTitle: Great purchase!!! You won’t regret it!!!
productreview.review: I received it within a couple of days. The quality of the product is great. The textile is sturdy. I’m impressed to test the organisation skills of this bad. You could actually fit as much objects as the demo video and when you close it, it’s actually flat. I definitely recommend it.

productreview.author: jac
productreview.reviewTitle: Great Case for All Those Messy Cables and Connectors
productreview.review: This item is perfect.  I travel with an iPad, iPhone, Apple Watch and Laptop.  This is the first case I've found that has space to neatly store everything.  I had another case from an expensive luggage brand that cost 5 times the price of this item and is not nearly as useful.

productreview.author: Cat_Happy
productreview.reviewTitle: Great Value and Space for Price
productreview.review: BAGSMART Small Travel Electronic Accessories Bag, Blue arrived on time and was as described. This is my 3rd Bagsmart and have been happy with the quality, size and price. It holds a lot in a small space plus packs away well inside a suitcase.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.reviewTitle: Great bag for small cabling and accessories
productreview.review: It's pretty flimsy but works perfect for charging cables, memory cards or headphones. Don't bother with a power supply for a laptop or a DJI Drone, it's too small. Might order a bigger version of this, the pockets and elastics are great!

productreview.author: Brian
productreview.review: Exactly what I needed... Space always an issue when travelling. As much as I wanted hard shell case this is better cause it takes up less space in luggage.. Hold everything I carry, Camera, USB sticks,travel chargers and E-Cigg accessories very neatly and compact... surprised at how many things fit inside... Have Already told my Friends about this great Pouch...

productreview.author: Kévin
productreview.review: Really awesome, I’m a IT ans wanted something to Cary my million item on my bag. This is awesome. Lots of place, amazing quality and robust. Will by another one for my colleague. Really well made and small.

productreview.author: Mark Logan
productreview.reviewTitle: Not exactly what I required but the fault is my ...
productreview.review: Not exactly what I required but the fault is my own.  I was hoping for something a bit larger.  I have a lot of cords in my backpack and they tend to sit in the bottom.  I was hoping for something to spread the cords out vertically, something that would sit with the laptop in it's compartment.  (This makes it much easier to stow under an airplane seat.)  The bag I want needs to be twice as large and able to hold a laptop charger or two.  I didn't check the dimensions carefully and the item is exactly what I ordered (it is quite handy for the smaller items and cables and I have found it useful) but it isn't exactly what I wanted.

productreview.author: Natalia
productreview.review: Travelling to Europe, where we need transformers and adapters, cables and everything, it was a huge convenience to have everything neatly organized, collected in one place and compactly packed without taking any significant place at your luggage.

productreview.author: Winston S.
productreview.reviewTitle: Keeps all your little gadget, card and cables organized and in one place.
productreview.review: On my last trip I was able to store a extra cell phone, portable wifi, extra sim card, extra sd card and all the cables including a charger I needed in one place.  Folded nice and flat and was easily stored in my carry-on backpack.

productreview.author: Tina Cassibo
productreview.review: I wanted a case that would keep my cords organized at home and then just grab for putting in my bag for travel; this does all that with a fun light colour to find it easy in your bag. It holds my cords and 2 extra chargers (a wireless and a brick one) and my Versa charger.

productreview.author: Aequitas
productreview.reviewTitle: This thing is the best coolest little cable organizer
productreview.review: This thing is the best coolest little cable organizer. I carry 4 USB 2 go pro batteries 2 sony batteries plus charging docks for both go pro special cable a pile of SD cards a remote for the sony an aux adapter an SD to USB adapter and a 8 inch tablet in this thing with room to spare.

productreview.author: Marie S
productreview.review: Great item for travelling, especially if you have many electronics. I like how it has the additional camera features like the SD card holder. I travel with quite a lot of electronics and items for my camera so this came in handy. Wish it came in more colours!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: This has not yet been used.  I purchased it as a gift for someone.  As far as I can tell, it seems like a very handy bag. It seems well constructed and sturdy.  It is a good size for packing into luggage.  The pockets are see-thru mesh, which is convenient.  it has several sized slots and sections for all manner of cords, adaptors, etc. for electronics.  I think my gift recipient will be pleased.

productreview.author: Parms
productreview.review: I'm huge tech geek so everything I own needs to be charged. Bough this for a trip I was going on and it was amazing. Kept everything organized and neat. ITS VERY SMALL compared to the pics so beware but it's still great.

productreview.author: Cherisse Brewster
productreview.review: No more lost sim and sd cards for me lol. I like having all my smaller electronic cables untangled and in one place. Should've done this before but was lazy.

productreview.author: BensMom98
productreview.reviewTitle: Too small for my needs but otherwise great
productreview.review: I can't stand all the messy charging cords in my suitcase and flight bag so I ordered this organizer.  It was too small for the amount of cords I need so I had to return it.  Recommended for a smaller number of cords though.

productreview.author: Madalayne
productreview.reviewTitle: Not super durable, but VERY convenient
productreview.review: I use this to keep most of my cords in, my hard drive, my mouse, my memory cards, etc. Definitely great to just holding it all, but its not the most durable. I wouldn’t want a lot of heavy things to sit on top of it, but its a great portable case for all of those things!

productreview.author: Can.Camper
productreview.reviewTitle: a place for everything, and everything in it's place . well not exactly , but a good try .
productreview.review: looking for carrier /organizer for these items , for a while . nice to find a purpose made product instead of attempting to adapt carriers designed for some other purpose .

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Bag is very good quality and holds all my electronic accessories.  It is small enough that I will be able to take it on trips with me in my carry-on luggage.

productreview.author: Tarek Amin
productreview.reviewTitle: Great for organizing cords during trips but wouldn't use everyday
productreview.review: This was great for organizing all the cords and other items when travelling but I wouldn't use it everday though as it can be a little bulky in a laptop bag.

productreview.author: Jay
productreview.reviewTitle: ... I had hoped for but overall this is a great little case to carry and organize my cables when ...
productreview.review: Slightly smaller than I had hoped for but overall this is a great little case to carry and organize my cables when I travel. I keep my spares in here full-time and when I travel I add the few extras I need and am good to go. Well worth the price, very happy with this item!

productreview.author: Cathy J.
productreview.review: Great organizer for aminimum amount of tech items. Things like larger charger banks and long cords don’t fit very well. But I love it for times when I don’t need to carry a lot of cords, fits nicely in my purse or tote bag,

productreview.author: Craig Miller
productreview.reviewTitle: Nice travel case. Happy with purchase
productreview.review: Great little travel case for cords and chargers. I wish the slots for cords were a bit wider. Need a few options for the longer travel cords. Other than that, the construction is solid.

productreview.author: B. Kempin
productreview.review: This product has made traveling with my electronics simple and easy. Well worth the money if you want to store your wires in a neat and tidy way that avoids tangles.

productreview.author: ELIZABETH MCMILLAN
productreview.review: Slim yet fits everything we need for traveling. No need for ziplock bags :) to carry all of our cables, etc. Just what we needed. Keeps everything organized.

productreview.author: Mariah MacKeigan
productreview.reviewTitle: Easy to organize wires, chargers, etc
productreview.review: I probably could have gone for the larger version to fit all of my different chargers, cords, etc, but having the smaller one has actually helped me to downsize my collection and throw out some of the cords I no longer need. Its so much better to have this with my cords all organized than having them all mixed up in a drawer together! I definitely recommend this purchase.

productreview.author: tanner
productreview.reviewTitle: Great product. The pictures may be a little Disproportionate ...
productreview.review: Great product. The pictures may be a little Disproportionate as it seems bigger than it actually is. You will be able to fit all the small wires you can think of, plus extra small camera/phone/computer gear. Don't expect to be fitting in anything bulky such as a power brink or anything. The build quality is fantastic, this thing will NOT rip. Fits perfectly into a back pack and I highly recommend this product. Again, for wiring and small accessories it is PERFECT.

productreview.author: K. Stone
productreview.review: A good solution to messing cable storage,a s well as a place to organize USB keys, ipods, etc for quick retrieval. The bag is well made with a good selection of pockets and cable "bungees" to keep it all in palce. Unfortunately, I lost mine by leaving it in the seatback of a flight I took, so I am now looking to replace mine, I am likely to buy the same item again!

productreview.author: Mj T.
productreview.review: Regular-sized external drives—either WD my passport or Seagate, fits on the zippered pocket. No seams are exposed, and there are two zippers to close the pouch. Nicely built, and I feel like it will last long.

productreview.author: Sohrab Esmaeil-pour
productreview.review: Very compact and organized method for storing your tech gear; I’m using this for school and currently have 2 SSDs, 4 USB flash drives, an Ethernet switch, and a bunch of cables all neatly stored in this bag. Durability and material is good after a few weeks in, will update if anything detoriorates.

products.title: UGREEN Travel Case Universal Electronic Accessories Bag Case Double Layer Cable Organizer Portable Carrying Pouch for Tablet, Switch, USB Cable, Memory Cards, Power Bank, Battery, Charger, Hard Drive

productreview.author: J. Dirom
productreview.review: Case has two separate compartments, with one side with pouches and cable holders, the other strictly cable holders. Does an extremely efficient job of storing cables in a compact form. Fantastic for travel! In my situation case managed to store all the cables that I had in a ;large box at the side of my desk. Way more efficient for finding and storing cables!

productreview.author: Robert
productreview.reviewTitle: as advertised, but if you have a lot of two metre cords or thick battery packs get something larger
productreview.review: As advertised, but if you have a lot of two metre cords or thick battery packs get something larger. one zipper separated already but went back to normal and seems to be staying that way - Be careful how much you stuff in it. It has lots of places for cords, but it is not big enough for two or three metre (6' to 10') USB cords in all of them.  Fine for a few cords, some memory chips, earbuds and a couple of thin battery banks, but don't expect to put a ten foot cord in every pocket, it really isn't that big, and it isn't that thick - consider the dimensions before choosing this one. Not unhappy. It could use a heavier zipper and a handle would be a nice feature, but overall it is what I asked for, and what I got. Good price. Would be good for lots of things other than USB cords, like Vape equipment, Pens pencils and ink cartridges, a small sketch pad, dry erase marker set if you are a teacher, small shave kit or maybe a makeup kit, small item tool kit, collection of fancy pens, or anything else you can think of.

productreview.author: Tyler Bellinger
productreview.review: I was looking for a small, thin organizer for all my wires and other small electronics for my travels. This product delivers. There enough compartments for a power bank , hard drive, various wires and other small things like sd cards. The look is sleek and quality seems good. I will update as I use it over time.

productreview.author: Hybrid Shooter
productreview.review: This is a nice case for my additional camera accessories such as cables, tablet or small monitor etc. It’s not a hard case so it holds nicely in my camera bag or backpack. Keeps everything safe and secure and easy to access when ready. Bag feels quality and they package everything well too.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: For the price this thing is of great quality. Stitching and build quality as well as material are all great and good for wear and tear during travel. Everything is as advertised. Comes packaged with a great little white material carry bag. I've put several cables, adapters, chargers, memory cards and a mini projector in them. Bought 2.

productreview.author: Jack
productreview.review: I liked the build of the product as it seems to be constructed out of durable materials. I also like having 2 zippers per compartment, this is helpful if you tend to overstuff the compartments. The tablet sections hold a 7 or 8 inch tablet comfortably. Compartments are well thought out for storing cables, ac adapters and even power banks. This holds all my accessories I need for travelling and one of the best purchases I have made. Oh, and the small tote bag was a nice touch.

productreview.author: R. Szymczak
productreview.reviewTitle: A bit thinner than I would like. Tried to put my tough camera and a ...

productreview.author: BanHim!
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2017
productreview.review: I'm comparing these directly to the Howard Leight by Honeywell Impact Sport Sound Amplification Electronic Earmuff, Classic Green (R-01526) . Wins for the Walker's: 1. The control knob is easier to locate and operate while wearing the headset. That's not to say the Howard Leight set is difficult, just that the Walker's set has a larger, more pronounced knob. 2. The AUX input has a built in cover and is in a slightly superior orientation (towards the bottom of the headset and recessed). 3. The battery door is more obvious/easier to remove. Could be considered a negative, as the Howard Leight battery door has a more affirmative "click" when removing. I've not had an issue with either. 4. The headband is thicker and uses superior materials IMO. It uses a neoprene like material as opposed to a faux leather on the Howard Leight set. 5. Thicker pads on the ear cups that seem to seal slightly better. I wear glasses and I prefer the fit of the Walker's. Tight and light (bowchickawowow). 6. Built in mic has metal covers that are flush. The Howard Leight set has foam covers that protrude slightly. 7.The way the Walker's modify incoming sound seems more subtle and natural. The Howard Leight set has a pronounced change in volume. The Walker's also produce less chirping, static, and interference sounds. The advantage in overall ear protection is negligible. 8. The Walker's just look cooler by my taste. Angular and refined, hence the "Razor" name. 9. This is anecdotal at best, but I feel I can just throw the Walker's on with less initial adjustment. Wins for the Howard Leight: 1. Noticeably smaller profile while equipped and while folded up for storage. They fit well into a pocket or pack. The weight difference is negligible. 2. The wires from the headband to the ear cups are thicker, shorter, and have superior protection at the connection points. 3. The arms connecting the headband to the cups are ever so slightly beefier. Time will tell if that means stronger. 4. More distinct omni directional reporting. The Walker's are more like natural ears in that both sides hear a sound regardless of direction, but the Howard Leight set makes it way more obvious what direction it actually came from. Walker's are more natural, Howard Leight are more modified. 5. No giant grey brand logo on the headband. They just have a more subtle and traditional appearance. The Walker's are more aggressive stylistically. 6. On most days they are $10 to $20 lower in price without feeling noticeably cheaper. Note: I paid less for the Walker's due to a sale. I'm a marginally above average size male and have shared both sets with larger and smaller men as well as very small women. No one complained about either set, but I think the Walker's were more impressive to most. I believe it's very obvious that Walker's set out to match or exceed the Howard Leight earmuffs in all regards and were successful. If you're a range day tripper or hunter, I'd recommend the Walker's.

productreview.review: Amazing. I could hear the pheasants in the corn field before the dogs did!

productreview.author: Todd
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2020
productreview.review: So far I've used these 5 times for Goose hunting and they work great; better than I had imagined. And, for ~$40 they are an excellent purchase/ value. However, similar to other reviews, the only negative thing that I have found is that you cannot hear or tell which direction a noise is coming from. All you can tell is that the noise is coming closer to you. Considering that I am using these primarily for duck/ goose hunting, it is a little challenging pin pointing which direction they are flying in from. My way around this is to rest them above my ears and then quickly more them over my ears once I visually see the birds flying in. With all this said, these are a very smart choice for hunters to save our, what, hearing...

productreview.author: Rooster
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2019
productreview.review: I wanted to like these, but caved and sent them back. I simply cannot use them for hunting. The band appears very durable; however, that causes excessive tension on my ears. The padding is simply empty rubber with air in it that gets expelled when they are attached to my head. Thus, no cushion at all. My ears still hurt from using them twice. In regards to sound, they appear to amplify close sounds, while muting distant sounds. Nearly impossible to hear deer walking in the distance. Furthermore, they have a constant white noise like rushing water of a shallow fast-running creek. Very distracting. In regards to hunting, the omni-directional microphones make hunting exceedingly difficult, as every sound sounds like it is in the middle of your head. You will spook deer turning your head trying to find where the sound is coming from. I didn't deduct points for this because it is clearly stated that they are not stereo, but I didn't expect it to be as bad as it was. These ear muffs were supposed to be designed for hunting, hence the color and slim profile. Therefore, the manufacturer should go the distance and make them usable for hunting. My recommendation to people buying these is to purchase them only for sighting in your rifle outdoors if you spend 30 minutes or less doing it. You cannot wear them for more than 30 minutes without excessive ear pain and they are useless for hunting.

productreview.author: Happy Dad
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2018
productreview.review: I’ve been using these for about six months now. Overall I’m impressed with the quality of the air muffs, they are robust, and have held up to a little abuse. I use these for listening to music and other media purposes as well as ear pro.  I did opt for customizing mine a little bit, and I will probably replace the OEM speakers with some higher quality speakers out of a regular set of studio headphones next, as well as replacing the speaker wire with the higher gauge studio quality wire and soldering that in place. I am also adding a 1/4” aux cable with 3.5mm adapters. I have gotten to adding patches and Velcro as well as the headband cover. Eventually I’ll replace the mics if necessary. May do an extended mic project. If I get into it like that I’ll throw it up on YouTube. I am hoping that by over-building this base product, I will have a stout set of ear pro muffs that will last me for many years

productreview.author: Sean E
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
productreview.review: I'm used to shooting with in-ear protection (military) so having muffs took some adjustment, but I'm glad I made the switch.  On the range I can hear my spotter but don't go deaf shooting a 300 winmag, 338, or .50 BMG.  In the field hunting, they're a big help.  I have about some pretty significant hearing loss in my right ear, so I'm trying to keep what I have left.  These let me hear better than I can unaided in the timber (direction is a little tricky at first), but I'm protected when things go boom.  They work well enough that I bought an additional set for my girlfriend and I've had a couple buddies ask me for the link to buy their own after borrowing mine.

productreview.author: BeckyBee
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2016
productreview.review: Got these for my husbands birthday and he just raves about them every time he uses them. He wore them hunting and also to the gun range to a turkey shoot where there were at least 60 people shooting. The sound of the gun shoot didn't even hardly register in his ear yet he was able to hear even the quietest of conversations.  He said they would even make for great spy wear you can hear what people are saying from great distances. LOL He highly recommends these Walkers Game Ear Razor Slim ear muff's. Spend the extra money on a good pair of ear muff's you won't be sorry.

productreview.author: KKor3216
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2016
productreview.review: These protectors are great! Used for 1st time at indoor range and could hear normal sounds very clearly while saving what's left of my hearing from the .45 in next lane. Some reviews mentioned the "seal" breaking around the pads but I didn't experience that. Like the flat compact size and folding capability. Way better than what I had. 1/12/18 update: had these over a year now and sadly my stars drop to three from five. The muffs function satisfactorily at in & outdoor ranges. Cancelling bangs works fine (tho not as good as older pair of non-electronic) and normal sounds/voices are heard very well. The ear pads are still somewhat stiff even after a year + use and tend to leak noise slightly. My main beef is with customer support! The plastic part that connects the muff assembly to the overhead wire broke and won’t hold the muff tightly to the ear. Called customer support Dec 20 and spent about 45 min ordering replacement part ($12 user install). Recalled support again Jan 10 and they informed me they were out of stock and no estimated restock or shipping date. These parts must break a lot if Walkers is out of stock so should be a manufacturing defect and repaired or part replaced free in my opinion. Almost a month w/o use and counting...

productreview.author: The Wood Man
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
productreview.review: These work well as advertised, but they are way to tight on my head.  I don't see a way to adjust that and after 20 minutes you're looking to take them off.

productreview.author: Mstr Beekeeper
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
productreview.review: I think for the price... I like it. It will do what is designed. I noticed when I clap with the headset on, I can't hear the actual clap but I can hear it via the microphone. This is good. I'll try lawn mower or weed wacker this weekend to see how applicable it might be for use other than just the range. I am pretty hopeful. It seems like it is a good move if you are looking for something that you can use in other areas (skill saw, table saw, mower, etc).

productreview.author: TBone 1967
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020
productreview.review: I got these to replace my full size "Mickey Mouse" muffs. Other muffs were cumbersome and intrusive while trying to shoot. These are very slim line, minimal interference when shooting or using a scope. Also good for hunting, had these with me to prevent hearing loss while hunting. No more critters sneaking up on you while wearing these things.

productreview.author: Timothy
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2017
productreview.review: These muffs are amazing. Hunters, shooters, anti-noise lover, or sound lover, these ear muff are for you. As a shooter, there is a volume switch that you can turn up so you can talk, and hear the person next to you, or 50' away, but instantly shut off when you fire your weapon. Amazing. I am wearing them today to listen to birds singing, chicken clucks, or now, my neighbors talking. If you turn the volume switch to off, silence. No, I mean nothing. Looking for muffs for total sound protection on a plane, baby crying, the talker next to you? These muffs are it. Rarely do I rate, review an item like this, but these are 5 star no doubt.

productreview.author: JERRYRN
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2019
productreview.review: I own several Walkers, and this pair is not even close in quality as the other, more expensive pairs. The microphones aren't as good because when you hear the sound, you can't tell which direction its coming from. I use these for waterfowl huntimg and am not impressed. Pay the extra money and get the more expensive Walkers with external microphones. It will be worth the extra $.

productreview.review: Well if you want comfort and design looks..it's a perfect 10/10 but aduio wise the hd speaker sound like your hearing someone from a stage microphone at a school auditorium and no enhance audio you can't even hear a mouse fart just sounds as if you speaking with them off plus the horrible whistle and crackling when handling the head phones. I have tried 2 different pair and same issue...Going back to my Peltor which has the best audio ever and better than the Howard light

productreview.author: A. Mango
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2016
productreview.review: I purchased these for my nights at the shooting range and am not at all disappointed. They fit great even with earrings, ballcap and ear protection and are comfortable. The volume adjust comes in handy for range instruction. I can hear the range master (and other background noise) very clearly and all sound deadens when loud noises (such as gunfire) is picked up. Would be handy to have around the house for family members who can't quite hear the tv at lower volumes OR if you want to eavesdrop on conversations nearby. Everyone can see that your wearing earphones but probably have no idea that you can hear their conversations clearly. (teeheehee) They do get sweaty after awhile but wipe clean with a wet wipe. Would definitely recommend.

productreview.author: GL
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
productreview.review: Looking for something to Dove hunt with, getting old and going deaf on my gun side.  They are a bit hot, but overall i thought were very effective.  I wear glasses so the fit over the ear was a bit loose, but not concernedly.  They do effect your ability to line your gun up normally, but i do think they are probably as good at that as anything else i looked at.  I will continue to use them, wish i would have started when i was 30!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2018
productreview.review: I absolutely love these muffs. I have 3 pairs for my two kids and I. They are a must have for kids on the range. Normal muffs require you to speak louder or yell for others to hear you, especially on the range but these don’t require that. You can talk in a normal voice and they’ll hear every word. It amplifies all sounds then immediately mutes when you fire a shot. There is also a volume control. They are compact, comfortable and come in several colors for everyone in the house. I highly recommend these muffs.

productreview.author: We The People
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2017
productreview.review: Very comfortable and fit great. 2 problems I have is the wind noise, like most other electric muffs it gets annoying with the wind. I’m going to try and glue on some foam over the microphones. And see if that helps. Use them for yote hunting in N.D. and SD so it’s always windy. The second thing is the rubber seal for the headphone jack won’t stay in and just hangs down.. not a big deal but can be annoying when turning my head with a heavy jacket with hood.

productreview.author: Stephen
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
productreview.review: I used these yesterday at the shooting range and they are amazing. You can talk and have normal conversations without having to remove them and as soon as you fire, it blocks out the loud noise of the gun. I was truly impressed with these. And they are quite comfortable. I even used it to fire rifes without any interference looking through the scope.

productreview.author: CeCo Deputy
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
productreview.review: This is the 2nd pair I've purchased. They work great for hearing range commands or woodland critters while hunting. productreview.author: Mr. Pibb
