I like that is has an audio port which i've used while hunting to listen to books on take from my iphone to pass the time.  Great product.  No complaints.

productreview.author: Cmdr. Justin
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2018
productreview.review: Product is fantastic. No longer do I have to hold one side off my ear to listen to people talk! Other reviews said these aren't good for indoor ranges, but I didn't have any issues. Very comfortable and easy to use. The sound adjustment is nice, because they cam actually work to amplify sounds/voices off in the distance. Has the 3.5mm headphone jack if you want to listen to music (not safe for the range in case you need to hear commands/warnings)

productreview.author: chrt396
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2016
productreview.review: Great fit...even with a fat head!  They amplify a great deal to hear others speak but at the same time really shield against the sharp sound of gun fire.  The only negative is...when there are floor or overhead fans running, the sound of these fans makes it difficult to hear others talk.  If all is quiet except gunfire...they are great.  Any background noise tends to fool the circuitry in the muffs and renders them useless.  However..they do as intended.  The Impact Sports by Howaed Leighton are a little less and actually do a better job at letting you hear ALL sounds clearly.  They just are not as comfortable.

productreview.author: Tastlikchikn
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
productreview.review: They are awesome for shooting but I also wear them on the  mower and tractor connected to my phone and listen to music instead of engine noise. They do not need to be turned on for this you control the volume with the phone.

productreview.author: Ryan Surrell
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
productreview.review: They fold up small so they fit in my range bag and are comfortable. Easy to adjust the volume and if the batteries die they still have the ear muffs for protection. I will always own a set and will most likely get these as gifts for other hunters in the family.

productreview.author: K. Walker
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2018
productreview.review: For entry level electronic muffs, these work great.  With six people shooting around me at the out door range, I was still able to talk with my friend in normal voice levels and hear every word.  When the shooting stops, it is amazing how they amplify every sound around.  They will work great when hunting.  I'll be able to hear deer walking in the woods better than ever.

productreview.author: DIESEL****
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020
productreview.review: Love the slim profile of these and the mic works great!! Noise cancellation is amazing --I highly recommend!! I do a lot of outdoor shooting and it gets very loud when everyone brings out their toys !!!🤯 Love the design too !!

productreview.author: Roxanne oneil
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
productreview.review: These noise reduction  muffs are not comfortable  on your head dont seal well I can hear my TV with them on not sure if I am keeping them or not but at this point there junk will find out if the work when I am nailing  houses off mon if not they will get returned for somthing that will I bought these for hinting/ work we will see hunting fri n sat then true test on mon at work

productreview.author: D. Benson
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
productreview.review: This was a birthday gift for my best friend who is hard of hearing, but is very sensitive to loud noise.  He had stopped target shooting the past 3 years due to the percussion sound his regular gun ear protection did not protect him from. A friend ordered these from Amazon and recommended them, so glad he did.  My best friend used these the day of his birthday and then used them the following day, he said they were GREAT!

products.title: BAGSMART Large Travel Case Cable Organizer for Electronic Laptop Accessories, Black

productreview.author: Steve D.
productreview.review: Purchased a similar product to this from Bagsmart a couple of years ago & loved it.  I'm finding that I need additional space now for all of the electronic accessories I carry when traveling.  Received this product today and found it to be every bit as good as the last, but larger.  Excellent quality, great capacity for everything I carry including cables, chargers, laptop accessories, camera, g.p.s. unit, phone stand etc. Item is well constructed with heavy duty zippers, durable materials.  100% recommended.

productreview.author: GuruGuido
productreview.reviewTitle: Great way to organize your cables and other gear!
productreview.review: Ordered a couple of days ago, came 1 day sooner via Canada Post, great service guys! Snapped up 4 pictures to share with everyone. Top, side, first and second opened, and finally, for those who may be curious, does my tablet fit? I can confirm my Samsung Tab S 10.5" does fit (without cover) as shown in the picture I attached, and the flip closes nicely. It was the dealbreaker for me, so obviously it's a keeper :) The quality is great, inside and out. Overall, I give it 5 stars ☆☆☆☆☆

productreview.author: Cyrus T.
productreview.reviewTitle: Good quality, but onces it's a full bag....
productreview.review: It isn't a bad bag.. it's just that when it's full, the sides clinch inside and makes the back look very "squished"? It has a good amount of pockets and places to put your stuff, but when it gets "full" I don't like how the bag basically clinches or compresses itself.

productreview.author: Kelly
productreview.review: I currently travel a lot and the bag is great for that as it keeps everything organized. Outside of travelling, I would use it just for storing cables, USB drive, attachments, Fire TV, iPad Air 2 (fits with protective case) cameras, batteries, Bluetooth mouse etc. Really this is a great bag. One thing that I am confused about is the small  SIM, TF, SD marked area inside the cable part of the bag, there is no way to put any card inside that area, however, even if there was I would not store my sim cards in such a small pocket. I would highly recommend this bag for any form of business travel or organization

productreview.author: Jay MCC
productreview.review: Sorry, pictures are not available at the moment lol. This bag is everything a person who is organized and detailed needs. The brand designer truly did a awesome 👏🏼 job by far creating this. I use it for all lose cords and all types of other things! Top of line product special thanks 😊 to the brand designer of the bag 💼 thanks 😊 to amazon amazing customer services and team members wonderful delivery 🚚 of this great 👍 product for any and everything you need!

productreview.author: DSH
productreview.review: Perfect size for organizing home-storage or suitcase-segregation of my small Canon 620SX, and all its gadgets that I travel with (travel-router, backup hdd, batts + dualbatt charger, storagechips and their case, cables. AND maybe also iOS chargers/cables.  AND might carry a lot of complex medications, weekly pilltrays. AND the blue color and material are good. BUT NOT for dslr or bigger-sized anythings.

productreview.author: Downtown Montreal
productreview.reviewTitle: Premium quality - this review has been updated
productreview.review: The material is premium, inside and outside. There is no chemical smell. The tablet compartment fits my iPad Air 2 with gel skin perfectly, with protection on all sides. There are two separate outer zippers, but you have to get used to this (I would often unzip the wrong zipper). UPDATE, WITH ONE STAR DEDUCTED (5 stars to 4 stars): I liked the case so much that I bought a second one, this time in pink (to distinguish the two colours). But this pink-colour case has a strong and awful chemical smell, especially in the upper compartment. I wanted to return it, but I am too busy, so I will just let it go.

productreview.author: Don Crawford
productreview.reviewTitle: Well made, very good bag. Rigid construction.
productreview.review: I like this bag but ended up returning as I wasn't a fan of the rigid construction for use in camera backpack. Was looking for something with some flex. However, that being said, it still deserve a high star rating. It is a very well made bag. The organized storage below works great and is handy. Quality materials and a great looking product. If your looking for a rigid formed storage bag, this is a great option.

productreview.author: Scott Darlington
productreview.reviewTitle: Just What I Was Looking For!
productreview.review: I had a small, desk-side, blue recycling bin that I was using to hold a bunch of electronic parts (travel routers, Apple TV, etc.) and cables that we take out of our trailer when we store it. However, all of the cables get jumbled up so that when you take anything out, half the other things in the bin come out with it. I got tired of that. I went looking for a way to organize these parts and found this travel case. It's perfect. It has lots of places to tuck cables. It also has a larger compartment to hold bigger items like the travel router and the Apple TV. So, everything stays tidy and organized. I'm very happy with this. If I need more space, I can buy bigger versions or two smaller ones. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one.

productreview.author: Keifer M
productreview.reviewTitle: Initial review: Bigger than thought, Holds everything nicely
productreview.review: So far this is just a first impressions review, just recieved the product today and transferred all my tech into the bag. Design: the product looks like it is a durable sturdy bag, time will tell how the fabric and zippers hold up with being thrown in and out of bags, I do wish the interior had a bright colour to make things easier to find / Stand out more . Size: this bag is large, simple as that. I recently purchased a different bag that was way to small from bagsmart, so when purchasing this one I wanted to make sure I could fit everything into it. And sure enough I could and then some. I have 3x Anker chargers, 6 heavy duty Anker cables, 3 data sticks, 4x AAA, 4xAA, wired headphones, wireless headphones, USB C Hub, portable SSD, 3 SD cards, 2100mah battery pack, Phone controller, ,Xbox controller, Mousepad (in tablet pouch), Mouse & smart watch charger. Uses: I envision this would be a good bag for people going in a trip who wants to carry everyone's charger in one bag, or as a quick grab Go Pro bag, holds your Hub, batteries, Chargers, Cameras and accessories, I think this bag is a little to big to be carrying around in your backpack all day when you fill it to it's potential, it also takes up a bit too much space in that regard as well. I will come back in a month of use to update this review as needed.

productreview.author: Kristina
productreview.review: I bought this because I seem to travel with so many different things these days that need charging and it was such a headache trying to sort all the cords out and make sure I had the right ones.. not to mention they all got tangled when I stuffed them in the same bag/pocket. The bag works really well for keeping all cables and plugs organized, plus there are spots for SIM and SD cards.  It is a little bulkier than I would have preferred, but I take advantage of the extra space by putting a book in the bottom compartment, just in case I get tired of screens. The zippers and material seem to be of a decent quality and have held up well after a month of use.

productreview.author: Anne L
productreview.review: Produit de belle fabrication, il répond à mes besoins. Quant à la durabilité, j'ai mis un 5 étoiles, car, à première vue, il me paraît résistant et j'ai eu à le surcharger et la fermeture éclair a tenu. Donc, je suppose que ce produit est très résistant.

productreview.author: Mushrooms
productreview.review: Love this bag, it's filled with a variety of cables and small things that I use daily. Charge cables, power banks/bricks, SD cards, thumb drives, etc. Material feels good, the foam separations in the bottom section can be adjusted to allow for a better fit. Zipper sometimes catches on the corner which makes it a little difficult to open at times.

productreview.author: Serge Campagna
productreview.review: Je suis très satisfait de ce sac de voyage avec un bonne fermeture éclair. Il est composé de deux sections, séparé par un sac central avec rabat. Il est bien divisé, et assez spacieux pour intégrer tous les fils nécessaires pour mes téléphones, les chargeurs, les batteries, les mémoires etc. J'ai fait un bon choix en prenant le plus grand et aussi le plus profond.

productreview.author: Valentina
productreview.review: Parfait pour mes besoins, j’ai fait rentre tous ce que je veux, par contre je peux garder soit mon i pad air (3ème génération) ou ma caméra Ninon 3200, pas les deux en même temps, pour bien le fermer et que les articles soient sécuritaires. Pour moi c’est correct j’ai un autre étui pour le i pad.

productreview.author: James Glazier
productreview.review: This bag is amazing. I can pack my laptop power brick,mouse,various USB cables and even my vape batteries. There is still enough room for my compact computer tools as well. I definitely would recommend this bag. Keep in mind it is larger than it looks in the photos but still fits in my backpack with my gaming laptop comfortably.

productreview.author: Elizabeth Undershute
productreview.review: This is turning into my favourite purchase. I can't travel yet, but it's so great for keeping everything organized that I use it everyday now. Deep enough and adaptable for phones, chargers, cables and HD's. Recommend. Blue is a lovely color.

productreview.author: Christian
productreview.review: The zippers never functioned properly and split open every time I attempted to zip them shut - as a result the case was more trouble than it was worth and a zip lock bag would have been better and more organized.

productreview.author: Jennifer welsh
productreview.reviewTitle: No regrets. The blue is so nice!
productreview.review: This bag is so nice! It’s functional and very spacious. I don’t really have any complaints. Obviously it’s not the highest quality electronic pouch on the market but the zippers are great. The materials are quality. Especially the outside material of the bag. I recommend it because of the price point. I’d compare it to the quality of Jansport. Won’t regret it.

productreview.author: Ezequiel Lopez Friscia
productreview.review: Excellent bag ! I fill it with 2mts cables (x9 units), 10x USB adapters, DVI adapter, WiFi external NIC, USB to SATA adapter + AC adapter, 2mts HDMI Cable, x100 zip ties, x100 cable ties, and guess what? There’s plenty room still, enough for a external DVD/BD Burner + 72w PD USB charger.

productreview.author: Karen
productreview.review: This bag holds a lot!  It’s sturdy even for a soft sided case. The fabric is also durable.  We use it to fit all our cables for phones, cameras and tablets when we travel.  It keeps everything so organized.  This bag is a game changer for organization in our suitcase or carryon when we travel.  Love it!

productreview.author: Ms Kiwi
productreview.review: If you travel and hate losing your electronics wires or searching for sim cards and sd cards at the bottom of your back pack or carry on, this is the travel case for you. I fit a tablet, wires, different memory cards and a small camera. I took it on the plane with me and it kept border checks a breeze but I would have enough confidence to put it in my suitcase. Everything is organized and stays put. I love it!

productreview.author: kale
productreview.review: We have a daughter with bilateral Cochlear Implants. We use this case to keep her processors, batteries & accessories together in one place. It works very well for organization. Would highly recommend to parents in a similar situation.

productreview.author: Russell Schumacher
productreview.review: If you plan on travelling with an iPad using this bag be sure to remove the iPad from it's case (if applicable) as the pouch will NOT accommodate the tablet with a case. iPad mini's should have no problem just the 9.7" ipad's are the issue

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Love the size of this bag, its the first time I have been able to keep all my electronics and schools supplies together in one bag! Zippers and material feel great and now a bunch of school friends have ordered

productreview.author: ecmisera
productreview.review: It's everything it promised to be, just as illustrated in the description.  Great quality and oh so handy to keep all my cables and electronic equipment organized. Exactly what I was looking for, and then some.

productreview.author: Fallguy
productreview.review: I like the size and flexible layout of this travel case and I'm sure it will have more then enough room for all of my cables and tech gear. Unfortunately the space for the tablet is not larger enough for my iPad pro 10.5" with its case on, I think the iPad would fit without the case but I'd rather not take the case off.

productreview.author: GeoKs
productreview.reviewTitle: Keeps everything in Its Place While Travelling!
productreview.review: Essential to keep all your electronics gear, wires, chargers, etc. organized.  Seems well made and durable.  Somewhat pricey but it is a quality product so...  Recommended.

productreview.author: Tanya
productreview.review: I ordered this case to take away on vacation because I hate having all of our cords/headphones etc everywhere. This was perfect. It held all of our cords perfectly as well as 2 ipads and 2 e readers. I would definitely recommend this. I carried an oversize purse and I was able to put it in it instead of my carry on luggage on my way down and my husband just carried it on our way back. That way it didn't have to put in the bin above us and could access it on the plane no problem.

productreview.author: Cathy
productreview.review: Great little bag for everything I need on a motorcycle trip.  Holds my usb power bar and all the cables I need for Scala, phones, GoPro for when we get to hotels. Even enough room for some GoPro accessories and fits easily in back compartment of touring bike along with my other baggage.

productreview.author: S Jackson
productreview.review: We've taken 1 trip with it so far and couldn't be happier. There are more than enough pockets for all the cables that belong to all the electronics that it carries. The flexible compartment dividers is brilliant! The only thing it doesn't carry is our phones, but that's ok because we want to carry them on ourselves. Highly recommend!!!

productreview.author: David and Tara
productreview.review: I love the case!! It for many of my cords and external hard drives as well as my MacBook mouse. I even have room left. It’s well made and I expect it to last. I only just received it and if I feel at a later time it doesn’t stand my five stars I will make it a point to revise my review. I do recommend this case.

productreview.author: Keri Mullin
productreview.review: I am going to be traveling for the next 6 months and so I bought thus bag to organize all my electronics. I am very impressed with the organization of this bag and how much fits in it. It's also really well made and great quality. Would definitely buy it again

productreview.author: William
productreview.reviewTitle: Best travel case for your buck!
productreview.review: Everything fits tightly, my 9.7 inch iPad fits just fine in the pocket and all my electronics are nice and tidy inside. No complaints what so ever, great product.

productreview.author: D. Davis
productreview.review: It’s a well-made product and is exactly as described. I did find it to be too large for my application and ended up returning it but if you need something that is the size I would recommend it.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Better than I expected with nice padding.  Holds all my travel electrical/electronic items in once place.  Very happy with the purchase. Fits nicely in my carry on under seat backpack.

productreview.author: Travis
productreview.review: I use this to carry my Nintendo switch dock, controllers, accessories etc. It's great makes my backpack more organized and is sturdy, fits perfectly and works great

productreview.author: Ron McCallum
productreview.review: Product was great, built well, looked pretty sturdy but it was just too big. I didn't need this much space to carry items so I returned it. Nothing wrong with the product, just more than I needed

productreview.author: Yvonne Jackman
productreview.review: I love this case! I like to be very organized and this case is just the ticket! All my electronic accessories are all in one place now and not all over the place, in my car when I travel, in my purse, in my suitcase! I now know where everything is. Thinking of buying one to use as a bathroom / make up bag for travel. Not sure it would work, though!

productreview.author: sb.
productreview.reviewTitle: Great quality I would def. recommend.
productreview.review: This case is very good quality. Zippers on mine are  working great so far. I crammed alot of stuff in mine and will post a pic later.

productreview.author: Manpreet Walia
productreview.review: Completely satisfied with the purchase Holds everything nice and easy. Lot of space in the bottom zipper. Love it

productreview.author: Ayon Mitra
productreview.reviewTitle: Good product but could be better
productreview.review: Good quality for the price, quite spacious inside. Would be nice to see a bit more substantial cushioning for protecting fragile items and also a few more removable dividers for better space management of the main compartment.

productreview.author: Baris Senol
productreview.reviewTitle: Great for cable carrying and travel
productreview.review: I bought 3 of them great product definitely suggest for people work on field and need to carry little cables.

productreview.author: Simon
productreview.review: I'm using this for GoPro storage and it's just perfect. Lot's of storage space and storage types to suit any needs.

productreview.author: David Schroeder
productreview.reviewTitle: It’s all in the bag. Grab and go!
productreview.review: I bought this as a result of a recent trip where I had forgotten several adaptors that I needed. Now I have no excuses. All adaptors are in the bag. Each adaptor in its own little holder. Perfect. Grab the bag and go. Worth the buy.

productreview.author: Clive Huxley
productreview.reviewTitle: Nice quality bag, missing one of the velcro dividers though...
productreview.review: The bag is aesthetically pleasing, but it arrived missing the small velcro divider which I am pretty disappointed about.

productreview.author: Jean-Nicolas
productreview.review: Honestly is perfect for all my electronics, it’s big enough, but not big enough for iPad.

productreview.author: ME
productreview.review: a litte bulky.. but can carry all your cables for the whole family.... we will be well organized now

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Top pocket a little thin, to store things but it hold a lot of stuff and worked great on my trip.

productreview.author: PNGBoy
productreview.review: Very handy case.  big enough to accomodate all your gadgets! Highly recommended!

productreview.author: Heidi
productreview.reviewTitle: Use this for work to carry all my electronics in ...
productreview.review: Use this for work to carry all my electronics in one place. I have my iPad mini, phone UE Boom Bluetooth speaker, solar battery pack, phone block, and all the cords with room for more.

productreview.author: RumLine II
productreview.review: This is a must for electronic equipped travelers. Your able to carry all electronic accessory needed while traveling...

productreview.author: FrancescaP
productreview.review: I love it! I get to organize everything.

productreview.author: ADM
productreview.reviewTitle: Well constructed and designed but very large
productreview.review: A good bag but too big to be carried around when its fully loaded. More of a home storage case than a travel case

productreview.author: Melissa Hall
productreview.reviewTitle: Great cable bag to travel with
productreview.review: Great bag to transport all your cables, drives, your mouse & head phones. I 'm very happy with my purchase. I travel for work and having all my computer accessories with me in a safe protected place really helps me stay organized.

productreview.author: Beauvaidos
productreview.review: It's a bit bigger than I expected but it holds ALL OF MY ELECTRONICS ... my cables, chargers, batteries, accessories, ChromeCast, FireStick, Roku, FlashDrives, Hard Drives, Spare Tablet, Vape, etc etc etc... It's a beast @ 4.5 lbs but I keep everything with me all the time.

productreview.author: Michelle R
productreview.reviewTitle: Good size, multiple pockets/holders to choose from
productreview.review: Shipped quickly, no issues.  Exactly what I was looking for to organize wires and camera accessories for trips.  Good size, multiple pockets/holders to choose from.  Great product.

productreview.author: ElMo
productreview.review: That's exactly what I was looking for. All my cables, chargers, mouse etc.. fit in. Plenty of room

productreview.author: Eric Marco
productreview.review: Great bag for tech accessories and cables. I use it every day and it's perfect. It doesn't have any single issue so far.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Can fit a rechargeable folding lamp, small speaker, charging cube and other with all the cords.  Fully recommend!

products.title: Red Kap Men's ESD Anti Stat Tech Coat

productreview.author: LO
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
productreview.review: Since I normally wear a 4xlt shirt and 5xlt jacket/hoody, I was worried this wouldn't fit. However it does fit and allowed me to do my job because the company I work for was unable to get anti-static gear in my size.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
productreview.review: Work!!!

products.title: JONZOO LCD Business Writing Tablet Memo Board Digital Notepad eWriter Graphics Tablet for All Ages, Suitable for Home Record,Office Noting,School Writing(11 inch, Green)

productreview.author: Mr AA
productreview.review: Very comfortable for making to do notes . Light weight , easy writing with stylus. Quick erase using one button . Display is pretty good and does not hurt your eyes. Recommended if you need to write quick notes or use for rough work.

productreview.author: I love shopping
productreview.reviewTitle: slim and easy to write on
productreview.review: Working from home, sometime you need to write a few things down. I want an environment friendly way instead of writing it on a piece of paper every time so I bought this. So far it doesn’t disappoint. It is lightweight and slim. It is smooth to write on, easy to erase. It has a magnet at the back if you want to stick it somewhere.

productreview.author: ChinoChico
productreview.review: In my line of work I do a lot of notes, I pretty much always has a piece of paper beside me, and this helped me a lot to reduce clutter and of course paper. The device is really responsive and light weight, quite convenient. It has a couple of issues like I can't adjust the intensity/brightness of the writing so don't expect to be super readable if you have the lights off, and the material feels like a cheap plastic, but overall it gets the job done

productreview.author: Caroline
productreview.review: J'adore! Sérieux j'en veux d'autres. Je dis ça comme ça, c'est bientôt Noël et j'ai été sage :) Mon utilisation : prendre des notes pendant mes rencontres. Je suis du genre a aimé gribouille et je me note des petits Todo de rappel. Le point négatif : pour conserver mes notes je dois prendre une photo avec mon cellulaire. SAUF QUE pour le prix c'est parfait. PS : le produit est livré avec une batterie de rechange!

productreview.author: Tofik
productreview.reviewTitle: Light to carry and saves you a lot!
productreview.review: I received the package yesterday and it was just as I expected small and light to carry around. I bought this tablet to do some calculations on it, as a student and a person who does a lot of calculations I was wasting a lot of paper. But by buying this I I will save so much money which I would have spent on papers.

productreview.author: T
productreview.review: Magnets are very weak and slides off the fridge pretty easy. The pen is kind of annoying to get out. Have to take it off the fridge to get apart and that’s if it doesn’t fall down from the weak magnets.

productreview.author: Paramvir Singh
productreview.reviewTitle: Works great as notepad on fridge✌🏻
productreview.review: This has solved a very big issue we were facing. I live with school mates as tenants and it was very tricky to write notes as we all had to be at work at different times. The clip notes i had earlier were very hard to edit, and this tablet makes it so easy. Now everytime somebody wants to leave a note. They just write on it. It sticks magnetically to the fridge, so no residue is left. I didn't imagine i would like this product so much.

productreview.author: Amy
productreview.reviewTitle: Got it for my brother for Scrap Work
productreview.review: I got this for my little brother as an incentive to write things down during online classes. I honestly always wanted a "Boogie Board" as a kid but they were wayyy to expensive. This is a great alternative and is probably from the same manufacturer anyways. My brother likes it which means I like it too

productreview.author: dan yu
productreview.reviewTitle: It is a good product ，worth buying
productreview.review: When I received the product, I couldn't wait to open it and I found that it was the product I had been looking for a long time. The function is simple, the appearance is fashion and generous, and it is convenient and quick to use. The stylus is sensitive and the writing is clear，I like the green color of the font. The button clears all written words when you  press the  button at the bottom. You don’t have to manually wipe it by yourself, it saved  a lot of time. And you can take it out and use it as a notepad. A very satisfactory shopping.

productreview.author: Sunny J
productreview.review: Good product for drawing some random sketch, writing down some information, show some calculations etc. Very easy to use. Just press the button and everything Will be erased. Also can be put on the refrigerator to write down some listings. Comes with a pen.

productreview.author: Bhavin Pansuriya
productreview.review: Display is pretty much wide and good. I have attached this display to my fridge, so whenever some grocery items are missing I can write it down. I want an environment friendly way instead of writing it on piece of paper every time so I bought this. So far it doesn’t disappoint. Also it is very light  in weight and slim.

productreview.author: SG
productreview.review: I'm using this product when teaching my kids math and a replacement for scrap paper. It's very convenient to write on because I can put my palm on the surface when I write. I give this product 5 stars because it serves a purpose well at low price.

productreview.author: harshil patel
productreview.review: Perfect for writing to do list. Using it daily. Comes with an extra battery. Hand touch doesn't work, it requires that pen so we can rest our hand on the pad, no problem.

productreview.author: Dave Frebrowski
productreview.review: Excellent but I needed something larger.  Ordered a fifteen inch. Needs to be more rigid. Requires a locking feature. Styles too thin and light. Feels like a toothpick.

productreview.author: Ashley
productreview.review: Very effective screen, doesn’t damage vision like a computer or iPad screen. Very thin screen, easy to carry and I can stick it to the fridge.

productreview.author: maria pineros
productreview.review: My coworker had this product (not the same brand but same item) and I decided to give it a try because I wanted to stop using too much paper and I love it! This one was cheaper than the one my friend got, so I was a bit nervous but it's perfect, it works great, it's light which I really really like. I recommend it %100.

productreview.author: Mr. D16
productreview.review: This thing is pretty cool. I wish it was brighter, but it’s eink. At 17$ it’s well worth it. Strong magnets for the fridge.

productreview.author: ALEXE
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Mémo pas de gaspillage de papier. Cool

productreview.author: Karl gaillard fortin
productreview.review: j'ai acheter sa pour ma fille de 7 ans Exactement ce que je m'attendais pour le prix une single color mais c'est très bien.

productreview.author: Nadia
productreview.review: We were under the impression this device came with a lock screen button. We communicated with the company. They were pleasant and easy to deal with. Otherwise great product.

productreview.author: Xiaofeng Chen
productreview.reviewTitle: It should be on every student's desk
productreview.review: Bought 3 pcs of this product and gave kids and they love it. It saves tons of scratch paper and now the kids' desks are much cleaner less clutter. Recommend it to every parent

productreview.author: Kerim
productreview.review: Not as bright as indicated on the photos. Still not a bad product for the price.

productreview.author: Atheris
productreview.review: So far so good, pretty cool actually.

productreview.author: Kate
productreview.review: In the bottom section, I was able to fit in an external hard-drive, external voice recorder, portable charger, 6 AAA batteries, 4 packs of Lithium 2032's, 4 packs of camera SD cards, and my phone plug AND there is room to spare. In the top section I was able to fit 5 charger cables, 2 10-ft USB2go cables and some miscellaneous small items AND have room to spare.  It's still only 4" high, 6-I/2" deep, and 9" wide. The handle will allow me to pop this sideways into my under-seat airplane personal item and still have easy access to everything.

productreview.review: Love the bags.  Great for all sorts of size objects, from tablets and their cables/chargers, to camera and wires, to a go pro look alike with all its attachments/brackets.  Gave one to family member to keep his own stuff organized and he can see what he is missing as he is now absolutely and completely responsible for the stuff in that bag.  If he loses it, it is now wholly his fault.  The bags are lightweight, love the ability to use the velcro pieces to create holders of various sizes.  Little pockets and the elastic straps really hold the memory card cases, cords, etc. all in place.  Easy to see if there is something missing.  Happy : )

I was able to pack several usb cables, a 3DS charger, headphone cables and splitter, a Samsung bluetooth speaker, a 20000mAh battery pack and my 3DS with room to spare. When I'm not travelling, it keeps everything in one place and untangled.

productreview.reviewTitle: Very useful product, however the sides are almost too strong
productreview.review: Very useful product, however the sides are almost too strong. What I mean is with other electronics organizers, the flat panels are hard enough to protect the electronics inside, however the side seems can be compressed. With these, the side panels are as stiff as the flat panels making compression impossible. Placing this inside a suitcase or backpack, the actual backpack is extended outwards because these things will not push down at all. When using this to save space, it actually ends up taking up more space in some situations

productreview.author: Bitte_Danke_Gerne
productreview.review: Ich nutze das Case für Sticks, Kabel, Stecker, Adapter und ein kleines Wischtuch. Es dient mir dabei, diese kleinen Utensilien, die für mich als DJ wichtig sind, kompakt zu halten. Das Case ist stabil gebaut und wirkt robust - wie es sich über längere Zeit verhält bleibt abzuwarten. Verarbeitung sieht gut aus und Style ist hübsch. Durch die harte Außenhülle ist es schwierig das Case etwas zu überladen bzw. zu stopfen. Wenn die Seitenfächer voll sind, bleibt kaum Raum, in der Mittelwand noch Dinge, die leicht auftragen unterzubringen, da diese Wand direkt auf dem Reißverschluss der tieferen Seitenabteile aufliegt. Meiner Meinung nach hätte man das Case minimal dicker gestalten müssen, damit zwischen Trennwand und den Seitenabteilen noch etwas Luft ist. Im Prinzip kann ich nur die Seitenfächer nutzen. Ich war so schnell an der Kapazitätsgrenze und musste etwas quetschen.

productreview.review: Più rigida e grande di quanto mi aspettassi, ma un ottimo prodotto ben fatto e di buona qualità. productreview.author: JayySur
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2019
productreview.review: I can see how some people will find this case too big or bulky. However (for my needs) this is perfect, and most importantly, very protective. The padding is very nice inside as well. I can confidently know that if I accidentally drop this, my stuff will be protected. I also like how they added a hand strap... it has a nice texture to it and it feels very secure to the bag itself (you cannot remove the hand strap, however). Surprisingly, the company’s logo is nowhere to be found on the outer part of the case. Rather, it’s found in a small spot on the inside of the case. This is a small observation, but I can imagine some people will be happy with this decision if they don’t like logos showing. For reference, I have a 21000mAh portable battery bank , 5 charging cables (of various sizes), and a 30W USB-C wall charger. I like how I was able to easily fit these items in this case; I tried to do this with this company’s folding accessories pouch, but it wouldn’t fold properly with all those items inside. The middle flap can be secured with the small velcro strap that’s inside. I actually love this design since I made it so my primary items that I need right away are in plain view right when I open the case. My other stuff that I rarely need is on the other side, where the velcro is securing the flap. In conclusion, I highly recommend this to someone who doesn’t mind a bulky accessories case who wants to make sure their stuff stays protected wherever they go; for someone who doesn’t mind having an all black design who doesn’t need a colorful case. The build quality is really exceptional for the price you’re paying. I can tell that this company took the time to make sure they made a good case that would be great for someone like me. Thank you.

productreview.author: Sarah Byrnes
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2019
productreview.review: This thing is big and bulky.  Like, really big and bulky.  It takes up more than 1/2 a backpack.  It's not convenient.  Yet, relative to it's size, it doesn't hold much.  It has a bunch of "pockets" for organization, but they really hinder the case from storing more than 3 items.  If the items you are trying to store are thicker than 1/4 inch, and you add more than a few items, the case can't close.  I bought this for an international trip to store and organize all of the A/V stuff we would need for the airplane and it was a bust.  We brought multiple audio splitters and auxiliary batteries -- and the case was overloaded and wouldn't zip.  The only reason I am giving it 2 stars is because it is a sturdy case.  It will keep those 3 items that actually fit really safe and protected.

productreview.author: Honestly...
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2019
productreview.review: Utterly fantastic case for traveling with lots of cables, plugs, chargers, and back up storage batteries. The zippers are sturdy, their are several nice individual storage areas. The outer wall is a semi hard rigid shell. I expect to get a good few years of daily use with this rugged travel case. Small enough to fit in nicely corner of my carry-on bag but large enough to securely carry all of my electronic extras I need for for daily use.

productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
productreview.review: Just received this today and for the past hour I've been emptying other hard case organizers I've gotten in the past and putting what I keep in this. I bought this for the BLAVOR Solar Charging Power Bank 18W, QC 3.0 Portable Wireless Charger I order the same day. Not only does this hold all my magnetic charging cables plus adaptors; it has room for my RAVPOWER power bank and an small Bell and Howell Solar charger (Pic above) just in case. I'm making sure that no matter what happens if I have this case with me I'll ALWAYS have a charged battery on my phone/iPad and whatever else that needs charging.

Padded enough to safeguarrd electronic components but you need to still be diligent and handle your devices with care.The zippers work smoothly and unbound. A touch of lubricant (teflon)will greatly enhance the zipper to allow it to work unhampered.

productreview.author: Jennifer B
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2020
productreview.review: I've been traveling back and forth to a dr specialist 3 hours away and have have been on crutches for months so I needed something compact& light to substitute as a purse/wristlet yet sturdy & big enough for my EarPods, iPhone and other electronics, medicines, some minor personal hygiene products & a mini card wallet and it seems to be working out very well.

productreview.author: Reba Jane
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
productreview.review: Pretty good size but holds a lot too. If you have a lot of electronic cords and small stuff to organize this will do the job nicely.  Too big for your pocket, but would fit in your suitcase.  I use it to keep cords and small electronic stuff organized so I can find it when I want it. I am happy with mine.

productreview.author: Beltway insider
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
productreview.review: Needed a carrying case for insulin pens, measuring devices and a couple of daily indexed pill cases.  This holds everything I need up to one week. The zippered compartments keep caps and lancets safely tucked away.  I have a couple of other cases but withe few or no zippers, making it hard to retain small items when opening.  However, this one is perfect!  Highly recommend for insulin users!

productreview.author: REF
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
productreview.review: Easy to zip this durable hard case. Exterior zipper has 2 pulls to operate a smooth opening zipper.  Interior has a useful insert panel with 2 mesh pockets and 2 zippers pockets for charging accessories.  Each interior wall has full zipper pockets for the solar charger and enough room for the charging plug.  The other is the same size. Lovely.

productreview.author: SHOCK77777
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
productreview.review: Very happy with this purchase.  The case is very durable and holds a lot of gear quite easily.  Will hold large cell phones, such as the iPhone 11, Samsung S20 and large 10,000mAh chargers and all of their connecting cords with ease.  I am sure I will be buying others for gifts.

productreview.author: Lydia
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
productreview.review: Fits four 3TB external hard drives, along with their cables, and numerous other thumb drives, SD cards and adapters. Well worth the price. Was sick of having four individual cases and this does the job beautifully.

productreview.author: Daniel Flemming
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
productreview.review: It's exactly what the description says it is. I've used it for only a couple weeks for carrying batteries, cards, card readers and other stuff for my camera that I don't want in my big camera bag. Can't speak to durability over time but my initial impression is that it will last.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
productreview.review: Good quality

products.title: Skip Hop Foam Baby Play Mat: Reversible Foam Floor Mat, 86" x 52", Vibrant Village

productreview.author: Raíssa Queiroz
productreview.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. We bought this for our baby who will soon start crawling, but our 4yo loves it! We do too! I like the fact it rolls instead of folding, because by reading other reviews, those that fold don’t seem to last as much. The village pattern is beautiful and it’s a toy on itself. And the neutral pattern allows us to play with other toys without too much information from the other side. It’s easy to wipe clean it. It is soft and comfortable and there’s enough grip for our baby to crawl on it. It is also very light and I can easily move from one room to another or to the living room and use the neutral side and no one will even notice it’s meant for children. It seem durable too. Our baby keeps scratching his nails against it and no damage so far. I have tried to scratch it with my nails too and so far so good! Pretty happy with this purchase!

productreview.author: DealQueen
productreview.review: This baby mat is absolutely beautiful! It's versatile, with a whimsical/artistic road map print on one side and a neutral gray pattern on the other side. I can see my baby still playing on the road map print with his own vehicles later on after he's mastered crawling on it. The neutral print side also lets me use it as a substitute for the living room rug. Material is nice and cushioned - my mom slept on this for a few nights when the doctor told her she had to lie on the floor to realign her back, she said it was cushioned enough to sleep on. Note the generous sizing of the mat and make sure you have space for it, I can see this being an issue for those with smaller spaces. This mat takes up a good chunk of my play room. Material is easy to clean, but slippery. You won't slip on it (unless you're running with socks) but my baby is learning to crawl right now and and the lack of grip makes it hard for him to push himself up and forward.

productreview.author: Alexis Zornio
productreview.review: Wow I'm so surprised with the quality of this! I was expecting a gym mat but this is something totally special! Unfortunately there was a stain on mine (pictured) I would return if I bought in the store but too much of a Hassel to pack it back up and ship it back.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I cannot express how much I am in love with this mat. At first I thought it was a bit pricey for a play mat. Now I think it is the best investment I made for my LO. The mat is thick enough (about 1/2 inch) and is pretty large. My daughter is 6 months and rolling all over the place since I got the mat. She lovesssss tummy time and loves to play freely on the mat. It is great to encouraged tummy time as the mat has beautiful images to look at, great soft feel so you don’t have to worry much to let them explore and bump their head sometimes. She’s almost 7 months not and so close to crawling. Even daddy comes to play with us on the mat and gives us plenty of space to play safely. And an added bonus, flip it over for company and they would never know it’s a playmat for babies. I would HIGHLY recommend this for anyone with infants. Great great great!

productreview.author: nadine
productreview.reviewTitle: Awesome, large and good looking playmat
productreview.review: Love this playmat. It’s a great large size, wipeable east to clean with pets and kids. Our dogs nails have cut into it a couple times but it doesn’t gouge / get holes.  it’s a nice design for kids and not tacky. We have two, one in baby’s room and one in our living room that we can reverse to chevron side for a more classy look. Big enough and Comfortable for adults to get down on the floor to play / crawl with kids as well!

productreview.author: tiffany
productreview.reviewTitle: great mat. came with a stain and dent
productreview.review: amazing mat. my baby can lay on it and feel comfortable eveb on ceramic floor. very thick compared to other mats I bought very annoyed that upon opening this there was a stain / dent in the product.  for the price I am disappointed it arrived damaged.

productreview.author: LLTP
productreview.review: This was a very bad mat in my opinion.  It never unrolled flat no matter how I unrolled it the other way. The thickness is more like half a centimeter.  I have the "babycare" playmat and the description stated the same dimensions in thickness.  It is definitely not!  The Babycare mat is so much better!  On top of this, when barefoot..it feels very sticky like walking on plastic bubble wrap.  So that makes it feel very cold as well.  Not intended for hardwood floor.  I am returning this item. The print is very cute though.

productreview.author: Client d'Amazon
productreview.review: Tapis choisi pour sa sécurité ( pas d'émanation toxique contrairement aux tuiles qui s'emboîtent). Très satisfaite, se nettoie facilement, bébé peut être sur le dos ou en ventral sans problème, assez épais pour qu'un adulte assis soit confortable. Se replis facilement pour passer l'aspirateur ou faire de la place. Le temps le dira pour la durabilité.

productreview.author: Christina
productreview.reviewTitle: Quality is not as good as the looking
productreview.review: Before buying, I noticed that some users mentioned the material of this mat is easy to be tore, while I thought maybe if I use it carefully it should be ok. Turns out, even we only put the baby and baby boys on it, for some reason the mat is still broken and it shows the foam inside!!! Also, my baby starts crawling now, his arm is often stuck on the mat because the material creates some sort of suction on bear skin in warm weather, not pleasant. The gray color fades off as well. I took the pictures showing one spot but there are multiple spots. I like it a lot because the looking is very nice but won’t buy it again.

productreview.author: Lila
productreview.reviewTitle: Way too thin and poor quality.
productreview.review: I really liked this mat when I first got it. The colours and patterns are super cute and it covers a large area. I needed another mat in a smaller size and bought a baby care mat. The baby care is WAY more cushioned than the skip hop. The skip hop one has basically no cushioning and you can feel to the other side of it easily. The baby care one actually has some sort of layer of cushioning and you cannot feel your fingers through the other side. I wish I had paid a bit more for the bigger baby care mat instead of spending less and getting poor quality. I also have has several squares rip off easily. It’s not the most durable if you have pets.

productreview.author: Terri Joosten
productreview.review: I bought this for my 7 month old granddaughter after our daughter had mentioned that she would like a play mat for the baby to play on  As I have not had to research this item before, I left it up to my daughter to choose and also had a recommendation from a friend of hers.  I like the fact that it rolls up, not folds like an accordian.  We have only had it a couple of weeks and I can honestly say that it is super cute and the sizing is perfect. I can see how it can get damaged from animals or sharp toys rubbing along the mat.  There is no avoiding that unless you keep EVERYTHING off of it - but then what is the point.  So my concern is that, for the price,  I had not expected it to be made in China.  I had gone into a chain store and they sell similar mats, the size is just a tad smaller, also made in China but at less than half price of what this one cost.  Therefore, do your research.  For the amount of time the child is going to be on it - you don't have to spend a fortune because in my mind, they are all very similar.

productreview.author: kikolena
productreview.review: My baby loves playing on this mat. He’s crawling all over it and enjoying the bright and fun images. We love the setup and how it’s so easy to clean. Love the reversible side that it’s grey for a more understated look. Also went with this one piece rollaway vs the foam pieces because our kid won’t be able To tear it apart.

productreview.author: J
productreview.review: This is the second play mat that I purchased for my daughter. The first one is from babycare. Have to say this one is much lighter and not as thick as the other. The babycare one is more condensed, but this one is more bouncy and you can feel the cushion. Personally I think both are pretty safe and can protect the baby. Pricewise this is more reasonable. For the color and pattern design I like this one better. The contrast of the color caught my baby’s attention she loves to look at the pattern and play on the mat. Very happy of the purchase.

productreview.author: Breanne
productreview.review: I am extremely disappointed with how this product arrived as it has a VERY large discolored section that is yellow. For the price and the brand this is extremely disappointing and a hassle. I will say that other than it being discolored it seems to be a pretty good mat. It's a little thinner than I thought it would be but still has a good cushion to it. I'm sure my little one will be fine if she falls on the mat. I'm in the process of exchanging the mat. Will update review according to the condition of the replacement.

productreview.author: Katie Grassie
productreview.review: This mat is pricey compared to another playmat we've purchased. I wanted to see the difference, and boy was I pleased with my purchase! It is way cushier than cheaper mats, the images are fun and compliment a modern living space. Having the less "kid like" side allows for nicer look if in your living room (which ours is). The size is also great! Big enough for 2 kids and an adult to play on comfortably. I've been using it as a work out spot too and it's been amazing! Baby stuff is expensive, but this is something we use every single day and will continue to use for years (planning to move it into kids room once he's old enough) Worth the money compared to other short-lived expensive baby items!

productreview.author: Janet Gu
productreview.reviewTitle: Ink Splat on both sides of the mat
productreview.review: I purchased this for my baby to practice her tummy time and for regular play. The mat is a good size and the material was quite nice. There was no smell upon taking it out of the package. However, the mat is quite thin. Also, I was also disappointed in that the paint/coloring smudged when the mat was made, so there were multiple noticeable ink splat. It didn't look appealing at all. I requested a replacement and the second mat also had the ink splat. I wasn't impressed.

productreview.author: Anon123
productreview.review: Worth every penny, such a nice comfy Matt for our baby to play on. Great for learning to crawl. 10/10 the foam is good quality ! Love this Matt! Hit helpful if this was helpful

productreview.author: Sammut
productreview.review: Great size mat. I thought it would have been slightly thicker but it still seems padded enough for my little one who’s still learning to sit, keep his balance etc. The colours and images of the village are nice and seem to entertain my little guy. It’s easy to clean And is the one piece so dirt can’t hide anywhere which was key in my decision to buy. Glad we finally purchased this.

productreview.author: Tee
productreview.review: I order this mat for my little one. What I love about this mat is, it’s universal. The one side is used for the little one to play on and the other is just a simple design.. Once when my little one gets older. I can re use the other side of the mat to put in a spare bedroom or somewhere in the house. Reason why I give 4 star is because it’s kinda thin. I had to put a area rug under it so my little one’s head don’t bang..

productreview.author: elizabeth Smeltzer
productreview.reviewTitle: Cute but falling apart after 2 months
productreview.review: I like this mat because its super cute and reversible. I hesitated to buy it because of the price, but finally decided to go for it. I'm extremely disappointed that it had a split in it after only a few months! It doesn't effect the function of it much but just a bummer considering the price point.

productreview.author: Brittany Picton
productreview.review: A must have for baby! Very spacious, definitely gives them a lot of room to play around on. I love how foamy it is, makes me feel more confident that he won’t hurt himself if he happens to slip backwards while sitting. I can’t speak much in durability because I’ve only had it for a couple of weeks, but I have a 100lb dog who walks on it without leaving a mark. 10/10 recommend!

productreview.author: Stephie G
productreview.reviewTitle: It turned my baby into a little speedster!
productreview.review: I love this mat! It’s super comfy and so far very durable.. I have 2 cats and they haven’t tried to tear it apart yet! I adore the city print it’s just so whimsical and fits in with our decor.. Love that it’s double sided so if I do get tired of it I can flip it over. But most important, my baby loves crawling around on it.. definitely worth every penny!

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I love this play mat ! I waited for it to be on sale as it is pretty expensive... I do not regret buying it ! I was thinking at first I would only use the grey and white side, but my baby loves the colorful patterns and I use it on the colorful side as well ! Black and white designs catch baby's eye !

productreview.author: sassasasha
productreview.reviewTitle: Cute and functional. Kids love it!
productreview.review: Amazing play mat. We've had it for almost a year and it still looks brand new. Easy to clean and provides a soft surface for my little one to lay down and fall down on. Don't put anything on it that can puncture the surface - a chair was put on it with a sharp spot and there is a small tear, but it hasn't torn further or affected the use. Great product - I have recommended this to a bunch of friends.

productreview.author: Mary
productreview.review: I decided to purchase this mat over foam puzzles. It won't fall apart  or break easily. It is easy to clean and waterproof. Love that there are two designs (clouds and polka dots). I like this as it is easy on the eyes and not too colourful - blends well with my decor in some way.

productreview.author: William Barth
productreview.reviewTitle: Not too hard, not too soft, goldilocks' play mat.
productreview.review: This play mat is exactly what we had in mind. It has two sides. The fun play time one and the "I am a sophisticated adult" one. The mat is very squishy and comfy for dad to roll around on and play with baby. Baby seems to like it. Cat claws could prove detrimental, but haven't yet after a couple months.

productreview.author: Mary DL
productreview.review: On adore notre nouveau tapis! Notre coco de 7 mois était vraiment ravis de le recevoir ce matin. Sa texture rend l'adhérence de bébé beaucoup plus fluide et facile que notre plancher. Il est super grand et se lave très facilement. En plus il est confortable pour maman et papa 😍 Les couleurs sont vraiment superbes et le fond est un blanc chaud alors je trouve que ça amène beaucoup de douceur. Il est un peu cher, mais jusqu'à maintenant aucun regret! Le temps nous dira s'il est aussi solide que pratique

productreview.author: Jaylin
productreview.reviewTitle: Will puncture if you have larger dogs
productreview.review: Love the pattern and wipe clean ability. I bought this for my daughter because of the versatility as she grows as my friend has one and loves it however she has small dogs and I have a Boxer and a German Shepherd who unfortunately punctured the mat the very first day it was down. With the punctured side liquid does seep in and cause discoloring so that is disappointing as I was hoping it would be more durable to everyday living but otherwise it’s been great as my daughter has been learning to stand & walk to cushion her tumbles a bit and I look forward to her being able to enjoy the road map side when she’s a little older

productreview.author: KO--
productreview.review: Just received this playmat today and I have to say, it is beautiful. It is long, thick and solid. It fits nicely in the living room & my baby boy likes it too! Soft on the feet 👍 I think any baby/infant/toddler/spawn/child/kid would enjoy this. YUP!

productreview.author: Jimmy Byrne
productreview.review: Super happy with the quality of this mat! It has a great design, it’s thick and super easy to clean even scrubbing the mat the image isn’t wrecked! It rolls up great for easy storage! It’s quit large as well! I have recommended it to all my baby mama friends!

productreview.author: Johnathon
productreview.reviewTitle: Already ripped in less then 2 months
productreview.review: I am disappointed that this has ripped in less then 2 months.  I have to keep it flipped on the blue side so my daughter doesn't eat the inside parts of the grey and white side.  Is there any warranty on these carpets? Any assistance from the company would be great!

productreview.author: Suzy M.
productreview.review: The mat is exactly what I was looking for. It's a great size, soft enough to prevent bumps when my little guy topples over, it stays in place, and has a bit of texture allowing for easy crawling (we have hardwood which is too slippery). Although it cost more than I was hoping for, it was totally worth it.

productreview.author: jobro79
productreview.review: We love this mat! My son loves to explore and look at all the different characters and colours. We don’t use the other side much, but it’s perfect to roll out in our living room for our son and friends too play on. Our dog walks on it as well, and I find it’s pretty durable.

productreview.author: Aya
productreview.review: Great buy. We use it in the baby’s playroom. We love that it’s super easy to clean, and comfy as well. The only drawback I’ve seen is that since it has a bit of a plastic feel to it, it feel cool to the touch compared to rugs or blankets, so in winter I add a blanket between the baby and the rug. We only use the colored side for the playroom. Because of the texture, I’m not sure if could ever pass as « adult rug » even on the less colored side.

productreview.author: Elena D
productreview.review: I love it and I would buy again. Super beautiful and playful for children and easy to clean for mom. The flip side can be great if you are looking for a more neutral design that fits your loving room. I would definitely buy again.

productreview.author: Julia
productreview.reviewTitle: Great size and easy to clean
productreview.review: Beautiful design and perfect size for my living room. Makes a good back drop for photos too. Soft and cushioned. Non slip backing. I use it on my hardwood floors though. Not sure about carpet. Easy to clean

productreview.author: Caley
productreview.review: Received my play mat today and was very excited to open it up. It is exactly as shown and seems very durable. My only complaint is that it came with some of the edges slightly yellowed. The mat is a bright white but some edges have yellowed. Not sure how it could have happened. It's definitely noticeable but not annoying enough for me to return. I bought it for our new baby coming in March but my 3 year old was very excited about the road pattern!

productreview.author: timamzelle
productreview.review: These are great and much better than the tiles mat. They don't slip and baby doesn't get to "destroy" the foam mat like she would do with the tiles (she takes them apart). A lot more cushier also and the walker goes easier over it than the tiles mat.

productreview.author: Johnny
productreview.review: So far it’s been easy to clean. I can’t talk about the durability yet as baby has started using it 2 weeks ago but skip hop’s quality never disappointed us in the past! The mat is perfect size and we really like the colours. It feels quite comfortable and it’s not too soft nor hard.

productreview.author: Elaine
productreview.review: Lovely! But came delivered in a plastic bag that was ripped and the mat was exposed to who knows what. Whipped it down and turned the cloth black. Great product! ... and three months later i found that there was a rip.

productreview.author: Mya
productreview.reviewTitle: Graphic transfers off the mat. Hazard to baby?
productreview.review: This product is concerning to me. It’s made for children yet the graphic transferred off onto another part of the mat. I haven’t even used it yet... it came like this. SOOO frustrating and disappointing. I’m too busy with my baby to go through the hassle of returning it. Should have bought a different brand. NOT impressed. If the graphic was so easy to transfer, could this be a risk to my baby if she touches her mouth to it??

productreview.author: Sherrylyn
productreview.review: This product is as described and great for the play area. It's great quality and well made, we love the fact that it's also reversible! Very easy to clean and put away as well when not needed.

productreview.author: Bobbi Piche
productreview.reviewTitle: Colour is off but otherwise a good mat
productreview.review: From the picture the mat looked light and dark grey on the back side. Sadly in real life it’s cream and light grey. Not what I was expecting! It already has one small hole in it so curious how it will hold up over time. Otherwise I like the pattern side, the cushion and the size.

productreview.author: Andrijana
productreview.review: So beautiful and easy to clean! My baby loves it as does the whole family - inlcuding the dog! Easier to clean than a carpet (especially the dog hair). Would recommend.

productreview.author: Jocelyn
productreview.review: I love this playmat it's great large size and very easy to clean wipeable...my baby is almost 9 months already and he loves to crawl with it because of the wonderful design he makes fun with his toy car...just a little bet pricey but its fine my baby loves it.😊

productreview.author: Jessica Wrinskelle
productreview.review: This is the second mat we purchased - we loved our first one so much we had to get another for our front room! Makes playing on our hardwood floors comfortable and easy for both baby and parents :) The fact it’s reversible is wonderful! The only drawback is it seems to attract dirt; however it’s easy to clean. Would definitely recommend for any play space!

productreview.author: Anastasia Bacon
productreview.review: Très jolie et confortable, un bel ajout pour le coin de jeu du bébé. J'ai donné 4 étoiles car il est arrivé avec quelques taches sur le rebord.

productreview.author: WH
productreview.reviewTitle: Reversible , matches the brands other smaller play mat
productreview.review: Nice play mat, matches the small play maybin color and drawings. Comes in a roll and covers a good area for baby to play and crawl. Can use both side.

productreview.author: Kat Svezhevsky
productreview.review: It's a bit thin (in winter time I will be putting it on a carpet) and quickly got a hole from my dog paws but I'm using it with Skip Hop baby gate so the dog can't enter.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: I've had this mat for my toddler for 7 months now and a couple of months ago I realized that it is making tiny holes on it's own. It's not worth the money, doesn't last a year, I am very disappointed.

productreview.author: a.hill
productreview.review: I absolutely love this mat! Easy to clean, super durable and great quality. Soft for baby and cute front to back print!

productreview.author: Koa
productreview.review: Great toy mat.  Very durable and pleasing to the eye.  Easy to clean and baby loves spending his play time on this mat.  Wish it was wider.

productreview.author: aliaksandr
productreview.review: I bought it a week ago and was really impressed with the quality of the material. It's definitely more expensive than the cheaper mats, but totally worth the money. The most important it doesn't smell. At all! Soft and comfortable for my little one and myself to play at. I am glad I have found it

productreview.author: AmazonCustomer
productreview.review: This may came taped up, no proper packaging. Mat has a couple of tears in it. Otherwise it seems soft and pattern is nice. Returning.

productreview.author: k
productreview.review: I love this mat! Its currently set up in my livingroom for my baby's play time and my friends couldnt believe how discreet it is! Its thick, durable, easy to wipe down, and even I enjoy getting on the floor with baby during tummy time.

productreview.author: Kat S
productreview.review: Excellent durability, very cushiony, and beautiful design (both kid- and adult-friendly sides). Only complaint - mat is slippery, making it a little difficult for my eight-month old to get traction when he's attempting to crawl. Otherwise, very pleased with this purchase. It will last a very long time with the proper care.

productreview.author: Miumiu
productreview.review: I am very satisfied with the purchase, this mat arrived within 2 days. It’s soft and the quality seems durable. I don’t have to worry about the massy food drops on the floor anymore

productreview.author: Daniel
productreview.review: very good playmat for baby. Our 5 months boy loves it. It is cool and very comfortable. The size is good too.

productreview.author: Kristen
productreview.review: Great item. Its a good size and well padded so that even if my little one falls he doesn't hurt himself. Easy to clean, completely waterproof. Great design with reversible option. Not really transportable, but i bought to keep at home.

productreview.author: Mike & Kelly
productreview.review: This mat is perfect, we really love it. We’re using it in our family room and it’s perfect for babies to play on and for parents to sit on. Love the colourful pattern.

products.title: Fuyxxmer 1 Piece Best Friend Hoodies for 2 Girls for Women BFF Hoodie Pullover Sister Hoodie Women Sweater Sweatshirt

productreview.author: Michelle Dee
productreview.review: I ordered these for my daughter and her best friend. Unfortunately, I didn't read everything properly. They are not typical hoodie material, they are made with the stuff that is super lightweight, tends to feel weird to touch. Some people are okay with it, some aren't. Very upset about that because they haven't even worn them. As for the fit, they are true to size. They are really cute. Just crappy material. And unfortunately they were tossed in the wash beforehand, so I can't even return them.

productreview.author: HFR
productreview.review: The product was very nice, looks great but got them at two different times. For some reason they didn’t come in a pack they cane separately. Other than that and that the sizes are a bit smaller than expected. The product is great and a little tip is wash it inside out.

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Shipping was crazy good!!! Sweatshirts are super cute and fit as expected!!!

productreview.author: Jenn
productreview.review: My daughter bought this. She loves how soft it is. Worth the money.

productreview.author: Lise Ruest
productreview.review: La traduction dans la description du chandail porte à confusion. Vous dites dans la description 2 filles, alors nous avons cru qu'il y avait 2 chandails pour cet achat.

productreview.author: Hobi.in.the.house
productreview.review: It’s the perfect size

productreview.author: M M.
productreview.review: love it

productreview.author: Mika soucy
productreview.review: There was only 1 hoodie😡

productreview.author: Shawn Farrand
productreview.review: Item exactly as described. Good quality

productreview.author: Mylène
productreview.review: Belle qualité du matériel.  La grandeur est parfaite.

productreview.author: Mélanie Lavoie
productreview.review: Bon

productreview.author: Shauna Davies Belich
productreview.review: Only one sweatshirt was sent. Do not buy.

products.title: oGoDeal Precision Screwdriver Set,117-in-1 Cell Phone Repair Tool Kit with Mini Screwdriver Set Magnetic Bits for Fixing Laptop,PC,iPhone,iPad,MacBook,Watch,Glasses,Toys Pry and Opening Tool

productreview.author: DJ
productreview.reviewTitle: Item either has obvious signs of use, or else shockingly low manufacturing quality.
productreview.review: The suction cup has deep molding flaws that make it unusable, and many of the plastic pry tools have torn edges.

productreview.author: yasin
productreview.reviewTitle: i don't  calls this tools garbage disposal.  Wast of money
productreview.review: This tools  very low value  poor quality  durability  0% everything  . I

productreview.author: Triffid
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 23, 2020
productreview.review: I bought this for working with PCs and laptops mainly but it has come in very handy for other things like my phone, iPad, sewing machine and a couple of electronic toys of my grand daughter's. products.title: Rotibox Bluetooth Beanie Hat Unisex Winter Cap with Wireless Stereo Headphone Earphone Speaker Mic Hands Free Compatible with iPhone Samsung Android for Outdoor Sport Skiing Snowboard

productreview.author: David Cornfield
productreview.reviewTitle: I would buy the Rotibox Music Beany again
productreview.review: I bought this product so I could listen to music while walking our dog in cold weather.  In most respects, I am delighted. The stereo speakers connect easily to my smart phone via blue tooth, the sound quality is far better than I would have expected given the cost, and the hat is comfortable, warm and, to my mind, stylish. There is however a problem that arises out of the design -  the electronics are housed in a unit that sits in a pouch behind a leatherette square and the controls are operated sight unseen through the leatherette. Since the unit slides around a bit relative to the leatherette, it is hard to know which button you are pushing. it means that getting the unit started and stopped is a hit and miss affair and can take a few minutes. A workaround: plug and unplug the charger cable until the unit starts or stops. Again, I am delighted with my purchase, and would order it again, but don't be surprised by controls that are a bit frustrating.

It is still a little big, so if he pulls it all the way down on his head, the speakers are at his ear lobes, rather than directly on his ears. He also says it is very warm. It's easy to charge. products.title: Lekufee Mini Waterproof Carrying Case for DJI Osmo Action Camera and More Accessories

productreview.author: KidsOutFishing
productreview.reviewTitle: Sturdy and Solid Case in the toughest of situations
productreview.review: We bought this case to keep our DJI Osmo Action camera safe and secure on the boat when we take kids out fishing. It really has kept the camera protected while we have tossed it around on the boat and not a dent or ding in it.  We will definitely be looking to get more of these and cases for our other drone and camera equipment Pros: - Sturdy - Good Padding - Tight and secure clasps - Good seal for water protection - Stands up well to being out in the hot sun Cons: - Hinges could be a bit thicker gauge wire

productreview.author: Monty Janes
productreview.review: Through some home testing, the cases floats, and seems water tight. Not Pelican Case quality. Haven't received my cam yet, but cutouts seem accurate.  Some minor manufacturing defects on the outside of the case, perhaps from the mold?  Would prefer to have a little more padding in the bottom.  Bottom and top padding are both glued in place. O-ring can come out, though it is not a smooth surface, and could potentially let water in.  I might replace it. Not bad for the price, I guess

productreview.author: Amazon Customer
productreview.review: Bought this for my new DJI Osmo Action, and it's almost perfect...only thing I had to do was cut out one of the holes larger to fit the battery charger, as the non-DJI brand doesn't fit. Other than that, it's solid, nice snug fit for everything so it won't bounce around, and it's small and light weight for travel. Haven't tested the waterproofness of it yet but it's like a Pelican case so should be good.

productreview.author: JEFF
productreview.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
productreview.review: I ordered a Lekufee Small Waterproof Hard Case for DJI Osmo Action Camera and a Lekufee large case for my DJI Mavic Air 2 drone.  I like to buy quality items and (I know, call me weird) items that are from the same manufacturer that look similar.  After much research I opted for these 2 items.  The drone case is VERY nice and sturdy, it is made out of a nice plastic material.  In contrast, this Osmo Action case is made out of a material that seems very similar to one of the big clear plastic storage totes you can buy at any big box store that seems to last about 6 months before something breaks on it.  Probably not a big deal, but all the photos show the foam removed so you can just put your Osmo Action right in and walk away.  It comes with all foam in place and you have to remove the pieces you need to in order to fit what you want.  I guess this could be a plus for some people, but I was looking for a custom case I could just use right out of the box and not have to worry about removing a piece of foam I wish I wouldn't have.  I am returning this case and will be looking for something a little nicer to protect my investment.

productreview.review: My DJI Fits perfect, feels a little on the cheap side i wouldnt want to drop it in fear it would break, tho i believe it would still protect the camera in that scenario . as far as Water proof or resistance i cannot offer my opinion on such as i received it yesterday and has not nor will it ever come near Water to find out lol if your DJI needs a case this does the job , only gripe is its not big enough for the selfie stick and tripod that came in the bundle i bought
